42022008	Jesus ąįį Peter chan ts'ą' James haa jyaa ahnyąą, “It'ee hoh'oo ts'ą' Passover geenjit ch'arehee'aa diineenjit gohtsii.”
42022009	“Ąįį nijin ch'arehee'aa gwarohtsyaa diinoiinyaa?” giiyahnyąą.
42022010	Jyaa goovahnyąą, “Ch'oodǫǫhk'įį! Nijin kwaiik'it gwachoo nihdǫǫ'oo gwiizhit dinjii chųų tyah zhit chųų haa nakhwats'ą' tr'iheehaa t'oonchy'aa. Nijin zheh nihdeiinzhii ąįį vaa nihdǫh'oo,
42022011	ts'ą' ąįį juu zhat zheh gwats'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat jyaa vohnyąą: ‘Geech'ǫąąhtan jyaa nahnyąą, nizheh gwizhit nijin shitsyaa nąįį haa Passover drin neech'irehee'aa?’
42022012	Zheh gwił'ąįį gwakat chan zheh dagoo'aii nats'ą' googwahaahchy'aa, izhit gwizhit datthak shragahohłyaa.”
42022013	Jerusalem kwaiik'it gwats'ą' gahaa'oo ts'ą' t'ee Jesus deegoovahnyąą chy'aa datthak gogogwąh'ąįį ts'ą' t'ee Passover drin eenjit ch'arehee'aa shrigwigwiinlik.
42022014	Nijin zhat nigwiindhat dąį', Jesus vakaii'aa ts'ą' Tr'ihił'e' nąįį haa naadii.
42022015	Ąįį t'agoovahnyąą, “Khaiinjich'isheheeghit gwehkįį jii Passover nakhwaa noih'aa nihthan.
42022016	Nakhwaa gwaldak. Jii Passover, chan duuyeh nakhwaa neih'aa, dahthee K'eegwaadhat Veegwinii'ee zhit gwik'it gweheelyaa gwats'ą'.”
42022017	Nijin Jesus chųų tyah oonjik dąį', Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'ą' “Mahsį',” nyąą. Ąįįtł'ęę goovantł'eeyiinkaii. “Jii jak chų' nakhwatee googwąąnchy'aa ts'ą' akhwanįį.
42022018	Nakhwaa gwaldak duuyeh vats'an ishinįį dahthee K'eegwaadhat Veegwinii'ee nineegweheedhaa gwats'ą'.”
42022019	Ąįįtł'ęę łųhchy'aa oonjik ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'ą', “Mahsį',” nyąą. Ąįįtł'ęę łeeyiiłnaii ts'ą' goovantł'eeyąhtsit ts'ą' t'inyąą, “Jii t'ee shatthąį', nakhweenjit Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa antł'eehałchaa. Jii shineehoondaii eenjit jyaa dakhwa'in.”
42022020	Ąįį chųų tyah chan gwik'it t'inlik. Ch'igiin'al tł'ęę chųų tyah oonjik ts'ą' t'inyąą, “Jii jak chų' t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deehee'yaa nyąą gwik'it t'iizhik shadaa nakhweenjit gwats'an hahtsyaa.
42022021	“Gooh'in! Jii juu gwintł'eeshahahchyaa, juk dzaa vakaii'aa ts'ą' shaa dhidii!
42022022	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa jyaa nyąą geh'an Gwidinji' niheedhaa, gaa zhit juu gwintł'eeyąhchįį łyaa veenjit gitr'iih'ee!”
42022023	Ąįįtł'ęę nihłagoahkat, diitee juu t'ahnyąą?
42022024	Juu gootee ch'andaa hil'ee eenjit vitsyaa nąįį nihzheedagąąn'ee.
42022025	Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jii nankat gwi-King nąįį datthak nankat gwidinjii datthak eenjit t'aih gii'įį, ąįįts'ą' zhit gwats'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat nąįį, dinjii nąįį ‘Goojyaa',’ googahnyąą.
42022026	Gaa nakhwaa jyaa deegweheechy'aa kwaa goo'aii. Nakhwatee juu ch'andaa hil'ee ąįį zhit khaiints'ą' k'it t'iheechy'aa goo'aii. Ąįįts'ą' juu kįh dhidii chan ch'itsyaa heelyaa k'it t'iheechy'aa goo'aii.
42022027	Juu shrit ch'andaa hil'ee, zhit juu ch'ihee'aa eenjit dhidii akwat zhit juu ch'itsyaa nilii? Zhit juu dhidii reh. Gaa shįį ąįįt'ee nakhwatee ch'itsyaa ihłii gwik'it t'ishi'yaa.
42022028	“Shaa gogwantrii dąį', datthak shaa t'oochy'a'.
42022029	Ąįįts'ą' Zheekat Shiti' t'aih shats'an ąhtsii, izhit gwik'it shant'ee jyaa danakhwahihłyaa.
42022030	Gwats'ą' k'eegwaldhat gwizhit vakat ch'ara'aa kat ch'ahoh'aa ts'ą' ch'akhwanjyaa. Ąįįts'ą' Israel nahkat neezheedijii ch'ihłoaatin ts'ą' neekwaii (12) nąįį gwich'įį eenjit k'eegwahaadhat.”
42022031	“Simon, Simon! Ch'oodǫǫhk'įį! Satan nakhwatee gwąąnchy'aa nakhwaa tr'agwahaah'ya', nizįį nąįį iizųų nąįį ts'an tr'iheelyaa, dinjii gwąąhshii dagwanzhih tee tr'igwilii gwik'it.
42022032	Gaa neenjit khadigiidi' t'oonchy'aa Simon, nigwik'iinjigwiighit akhagoohiinjyaa kwaa geenjit. Nijin shits'eeneenahoozhii tł'ęę, nachaa nąįį gook'injigwiighit t'aih neehahtsyaa gwizhrįh.”
42022033	Peter jyaa yahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat, it'ee zhee gwaazhrąįį naa gwats'ą' hihshyaa ts'ą' naanihihthaa eenjit nanoodhal'in!”
42022034	“Naagwahaaldak Peter, tik agwaanchy'aa shaanandaii kwaa hinjyaa gwats'ą' datthak juk khaa rooster hahchyaa kwaa t'oonchy'aa,” jyaa yahnyąą.
42022035	Ąįįtł'ęę Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą, “Nijin laraa dhah, khwah chan ts'ą' dachan kwaiitryah haa ehdan nakhwahooł'e' dąį' nik'ee k'aiich'i' t'oohchy'a'?” “K'eiich'i' t'eegwaahchy'aa kwaa,” ginyąą.
42022036	“Gaa juk, juu laraa dhah akwat khwah haa di'įį ji' adahaayehee'aa gwizhrįh. Ąįįts'ą' juu vishrii choo kwaa chan di'ik laraa t'įį hahchal ts'ą' shrii choh ooheekwat gwizhrįh.
42022037	Jii geenjit nakhwaagwahaldak, Dęhtły'aa Choh kat gwa'an jyaa deegwinyąą, ‘Law łaahnaii k'it giits'ą' tr'agwah'in.’ Ąįįt'ee łyaa sheenjit gwik'it gweheelyaa gwizhrįh goo'aii. Ąįį sheenjit gwadanakhwatł'oo gwik'it gweheelyaa geh'an.”
42022038	“Shik'eegwaadhat,” giiyahnyąą, “Juk dzaa shrii choh neekwaii dhitin.” Akhai' jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jyaa dohnyąą kwaa!”
42022039	Ąįįtł'ęę Taih Vakat Olives Nahshii chan hee Jesus ditsyaa nąįį haa gwits'eehoozhii.
42022040	Nijin zhat k'eegiidal dąį', jyaa goovahnyąą, “Neenakhwareheen'ee gwizhit gwiizųų tr'agahoh'yaa kwaa geenjit khadagohjii.”
42022041	Ąįįtł'ęę t'ee goołeehaazhii, kii nireheetthaa gąhthee gwa'an nikiigwiintthaii ts'ą' khadigiinjii.
42022042	“Shiti', gwik'it t'ini'yaa ji', jii chųų tyah shats'an oiinjii. Shįį deeyiihthan ąįį gwik'it nǫh'ya' shrǫ', gaa nan deenoo'ya' niindhan ąįį gwik'it t'ini'in,” nyąą.
42022043	Ąįįtł'ęę zheekat gwats'an Zheekat Gwich'in t'aih yintł'eehee'aa eenjit vats'ą' igwiilkįį.
42022044	Ąįįtł'ęę gwint'aii khadigiinjii ts'ąįį gaa viniteiinjat ts'ą' gwintł'oo tr'igwidii ts'ą' dah k'it t'inchy'aa vats'an nankat daa'il.
42022045	Nijin khadigiinjii gwats'an ndak ninehjin dąį', vitsyaa nąįį tr'igwidii haa giłchųų chy'aa ts'eehoozhii.
42022046	“Jaghaii dhohchųų?” goovahnyąą. “Khakyuuzhii ts'ą' neenakhwariheen'ee gwizhit gwiizųų tr'agahoh'yaa kwaa geenjit khadagohjii!”
42022047	Jesus tth'aii hee ginkhii gwiizhit lęįį nąįį zhat k'eedal vitsyaa ch'ihłak, Judas oaazhii, ąįį goots'ii ahaa ąįį Jesus ts'ą' niinzhii ts'ą' yiilts'ų'.
42022048	Gaa Jesus ąįį jyaa yahnyąą, “Judas, shįį t'ee Gwidinji' shants'ų' haa gwintł'eeshąhchįį lee t'ini'in?”
42022049	Jesus vitsyaa nąįį deegweheenjyaa t'igwinyąą gwik'igaanjik dąį', jyaa ginyąą, “Diizhrii haa gooroogha' jaghaii, K'eegwaadhat?”
42022050	Gootee ch'ihłee zhit ndak khii giinkhih choh vi-slave ch'ihłak iłkhaa ts'ą' shriits'ąįį yidzee gadąąhtrit.
42022051	Gaa Jesus ąįį jyaa nyąą, “Jyaa dakhwa'in kwaa!” Ąįįtł'ęę ąįį dinjii vidzee kat naanjik ts'ą' shranaazhik.
42022052	Zhat giinkhih k'įh dilk'ii nąįį chan ts'ą' Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoo gwak'ąąhtii chan ts'ą' Israel k'įh dilk'ii nąįį yuuhaanjik nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Law łaahnaii iizųų ihłii k'it zhit shrii choh, gał kwąįį haa sheenjit t'oohchy'aa gwat'oohchy'aa lee t'akhwa'in?
42022053	Drin gwiteegwaanchy'aa Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoo gwizhit nakhwaadhiidii gaa shǫhjii gwik'eegǫhdaii kwaa. Juk zhat t'ee deekhwa'yaa goo'aii chy'aa gwik'it t'akhwa'in. Khaa hee tr'aanduu digwitr'it t'agwah'in gwiizhit.”
42022054	Jesus goonjik ts'ą' ndak khii giinkhih choh vizheh gwats'ą' giihiłchįį. Peter ąįį gootąįį niighit ahaa.
42022055	Ndak khii giinkhih choh vizheh gokwantee gwigwiiłk'a' ts'ą' Peter zhat juu kǫ' eelin dilk'ii nąįį teiinzhii.
42022056	Nijin gootee nich'it tsal giveetr'agwah'in nilii, ąįį Peter kǫ' ts'ą' dhidii niił'in dąį', yąąh'in ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Jii dinjii Jesus haa neehidik t'inchy'aa!”
42022057	Gaa Peter, “Ąįį nakwaa!” nyąą. “Tr'injaa, ąįį vaashandaii kwaa t'inchy'aa!”
42022058	Ąįįtł'ęę ch'izhii dinjii chan niyiił'in ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Nan chan gootee gwats'an inlii łee!” Gaa Peter ąįį jyaa nyąą, “Shįį t'ihchy'aa kwaa, naihnyą'!”
42022059	Ąįįtł'ęę niighit gwahaadhat kwaa tł'ęę dinjii ch'ihłak jyaa nyąą, “Galilee gwats'an ahaa geh'an jii dinjii t'ee łyaa vaa yaał'ya' t'inchy'aa!”
42022060	Gaa Peter t'iiyahnyąą, “Dinjii, jidii eeginkhii t'iinyąą gaashandaii kwaa!” Zhazhat tth'aii ginkhii gwiizhit rooster haahchik.
42022061	Diik'eegwaadhat Jesus neediil'ee ts'ą' Peter nah'in. Ąįįts'ą' Peter Diik'eegwaadhat deiinyą' chy'aa yiginjik anaanjik, jii jyaa diyaiinyą', “Juk drin rooster haahchyaa gwats'ą' tik agwaanchy'aa shaanandaii kwaa hinjyaa.”
42022062	Peter chyahaazhii ts'ą' gwint'aii iintrii.
42022063	Ąįį juu dinjii Jesus k'ąąhtii nąįį giiyeedlaa ts'ą' giiyąąhkhwąįį.
42022064	Giiyandee tł'an dineech'ahchal ts'ą' giiyųąhkat, “Juu nilgwat? Diinaa gwandak lee?”
42022065	Ants'ą' gwinlęįį geenjit zhideegiiyąąhts'įį.
42022066	Drin neegahoodlit dąį', Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį, giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį chan ts'ą' Law eech'ǫąąhtan nąįį khaihłan nigiinjil ts'ą' nigiiyąąhchįį.
42022067	“Diinaa gwandak,” giiyahnyąą, “Nan lee Christ Diik'eegwaadhat t'inchy'aa?” Jyaa goovahnyąą, “Nakhwaagwaldak ji', duuyeh shik'iinjuhkhit,
42022068	ąįįts'ą' shįį chan nakhwaałkat ji', duuyeh shidiineegoohjii.
42022069	Gaa juk gwats'an Zheekat Gwidinji' ąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa datthak geenjit t'aih di'įį veeghaii shriits'ąįį heedyaa.”
42022070	Datthak jyaa ginyąą, “Akwaa ji', nan lee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' t'inchy'aa?” Jyaa goovahnyąą, “Nakhwan, ąįįt'ee jyaa dashohnyąą.”
42022071	Ąįįts'ą' jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Juk t'ee dinjii yeediinaagwahaandak veenjit t'eegwaahchy'aa kwaa! Diinandah deiinyą' gwizhrįh, gaa gwinzii!”
42023001	Izhit Israel gwakhaihkwaii nąįį datthak ndak nigiinjil ts'ą' Pilate ts'ą' Jesus nagąąhchįį.
42023002	Izhit t'ee jyąhts'ą' giiyeeginkhii, “Jii dinjii t'ee dinjii nąįį teehilii, ‘Caesar ts'ą' tax ohkwat shrǫ',’ goovahnyąą ts'ą' chan King akwat Christ chan adaanyąą.”
42023003	Pilate yuahkat, “Nan lee Jews nąįį goo-King inlii?” Jesus jyaa diyahnyąą, “Nan reh jyaa diinyąą t'oonchy'aa.”
42023004	Ąįįtł'ęę Pilate ąįį giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį chan ts'ą' zhat dinjii dilk'ii nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Jii dinjii jaghaii tr'ahaahkhwaa veegwaał'in kwaa.”
42023005	Gaa łyaa gwint'aii giginkhii ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Judea nahkat gwizhit geech'ǫąąhtan ts'ą' veh'an dinjii nąįį nihłiighan. Galilee gwats'an hiłjik ts'ą' juk chan dzaa k'idik.”
42023006	Nijin Pilate jii gwiitth'ak dąį', jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jii dinjii Galilee gwats'an ahaa?”
42023007	Nijin nahkat Herod gwats'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat gwats'an Jesus ahaa gwiky'aanjik dąį'. (Izhit dąį' Herod Jerusalem dhidii.) Izhit gwats'ą' Jesus yats'ą' nąąhchįį.
42023008	Herod, Jesus niił'in dąį', łyaa shoo nilii. Dee'in yeegwiitth'ak ts'ą' khit nooł'ya' yuunyąą. Jesus shandah nagohts'į' niindhan.
42023009	Herod, Jesus gwintł'oo oahkat, gaa yidii ginkhii kwaa.
42023010	Giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį Law eech'ǫąąhtan nąįį haa k'iindaa nigiinjil ts'ą' gwiizųų datthak Jesus eegiginkhii.
42023011	Herod viniveet'ah'in nąįį haa giiyeedlaa ts'ą' giiyuuzhri' iizųų ąhtsii. Ik łyaa nizįį Jesus anagąhtsuu. Ąįįtł'ęę Pilate ts'ą' nineegiiyąąhchįį.
42023012	Izhit drin gwats'an t'ee Herod chan ts'ą' Pilate haa nihjyaa gaadlit. Gwehkįį dąį' nihłitr'igii'ee.
42023013	Pilate ąįį giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį, Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį, dinjii nąįį haa khaihłan niinlii,
42023014	ts'ą' jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jii dinjii shats'ą' noohchįį. ‘Dinjii nąįį teehilii,’ vohnyąą. Juk nakhwandah gwizhrįh naałchįį, gaa dee'ya' vohnyąą, ąįį ch'ihłak gaa gwik'it t'ee'ya' veegwaał'in kwaa.
42023015	Herod chan diits'eeyihił'e' akwat adan chan gwik'it t'iiyahthan. K'eegwiichy'aa t'ee'ya' kwaa geh'an duuyeh tr'ąąhkhwąįį t'inchy'aa.
42023016	Tr'ahahtrii veenjit gwahałtsyaa. Ąįįtł'ęę vineereheendal.”
42023017	(Passover gwigwiłtsąįį nineegwiidhak hee Pilate zhee gwaazhrąįį gwats'an dinjii ch'ihłak chineehahchik goo'aii.)
42023018	Juu zhat dilk'ii nąįį datthak jyaa ginyąą ts'ą' gazhral, “Vęhdaa tr'agǫh'ąįį! Barabbas diineenjit chinoohchįį!”
42023019	(Barabbas t'ee dinjii ęhdaa tr'igwiin'ąįį ts'ą' chan veh'an dinjii nąįį nihłeegha' geh'an zhee gwaazhrąįį dhidii).
42023020	Pilate ąįį Jesus vineeroonjii niindhan ts'ą' chan hee dinjii nąįį oahkat.
42023021	Gaa gazhral ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Cross kat gohtsak! Cross kat gohtsak!”
42023022	Neekwat gwehkįį gavoahkat ts'ą' chan hee t'agoovahnyąą. “Jidii gwiizųų tr'agwah'ya' eenjit t'avohnyąą? Dee'ya' vohnyąą ąįį ch'ihłak gaa gwik'it t'ee'ya' veegwaał'in kwaa. Jaghaii tr'ahaahkhwaa vaashandaii kwaa. Tr'ahahtrii veenjit gwahałtsyaa. Ąįįtł'ęę vineereheendal.”
42023023	Googaa nihk'it dinjii nąįį ąįįts'ą' giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį gwint'aii gazhral ts'ą', “Jesus garohtsak!” ginyąą, ts'ą' t'ee gaayiideech'igiiłtsąįį.
42023024	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Pilate deeginyąą, “Gwik'it Jesus t'ireheelyaa,” nyąą.
42023025	Ąįį juu dinjii zhee gwaazhrąįį chineerohchyaa giindhan, ąįį chinąąhchįį, ąįįt'ee yaagha' juu veh'an nihłich'eegha' ts'ą' dinjii diłkhwąįį reh. Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Jesus goovantł'ąhchįį, deegiiyuh'ya' giindhan gwik'it t'igiihah'yaa eenjit.
42023026	Jesus gihłeegihiłchįį. Gihłeegihiijyaa gwiizhit Cyrene gwats'an dinjii, Simon oaazhii, kwaiik'it gwachoo ąįį oo'ok gwats'an k'idik łee ąįį adagaajil. Giiyąhtsit ts'ą' Jesus tąįį cross ichyaa giiyiłtsąįį.
42023027	Dinjii lęįį nąįį yatąįį adaa. Gootee gwa'an tr'injaa lat nąįį gwint'aii giiyeenjit itree.
42023028	Jesus goots'ą' neediil'ee ts'ą' jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jerusalem gwitr'injaa nąįį! Sheenjit ohtree kwaa. Nakhwagii chan ts'ą' ideenjit haa ts'ąįį ohtree.
42023029	Niighit kwaa dinjii nąįį jyaa deeheenjyaa geenjit goo'aii, juu tr'injaa vigii kwaa ts'ą' digii ich'iłma' kwaa geenjit shoo oolį'!
42023030	Izhit nigwiindhat ji' t'ee dinjii nąįį, ‘Ddhah diik'aa nooghyii ts'ą' taih chan geegoh'it diinohdli',’ giheenghyaa.
42023031	Ts'iivii tth'aii diłtraa gwiizhit t'ee jyaa deegwehee'yaa, nijin ąįį ts'iivii traa dhidlit ji', gwandaa gwiizųų nagwahaatth'aa.”
42023032	Dinjii neekwaii gwiizųų tr'agogwąh'ya'. Ąįį nąįį chan Jesus haa gigihiłtsak.
42023033	Nijin taih, “Dinjii kiitth'an (Skull)” oaazhii, k'eegiidal dąį', Jesus chan ts'ą' ąįį dinjii iizųų neekwaii haa gagoogiłtsak. Ch'ihłak chan Jesus veeghaih shriits'ąįį dhidii ts'ą' ch'izhii chan tł'ohts'ąįį dhidii.
42023034	Jesus jyaa nyąą, “Shiti', giveenjit oo'an gwihiinlii! Deegii'in t'igii'in gaagiindaii kwaa t'igii'in.” Kii tsal gahahtł'ak haa juu yagwach'aa ts'an hąąh'yaa eenjit tseegii'in.
42023035	Dinjii nąįį tthak aakin gogwaa'įį gwiizhit Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį giiyeedlaa. “Christ nilii ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa gwitee tr'iiyąąhchįį t'inchy'aa ji', ch'izhii nąįį nahshii, akwat adan chan needoozhii jaghaii!”
42023036	Niveet'ah'in nąįį chan giiyeedlaa. Giits'ą' nineedal ts'ą' jak chų' daatł'oo kwaa giits'ą' ootą',
42023037	Ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Jews nąįį goo-King inlii ji', needaanzhii!”
42023038	Vehdee jii danahootł'oo, “Jii t'ee Jews nąįį eenjit King t'inchy'aa!”
42023039	Ąįį juu veeghaii dinjii ch'ihłak giltsak ąįį shraa haa t'iiyahnyąą, “Christ inlii t'oonchy'aa, akwat gwats'an tr'eedaanchįį ts'ą' diikhwan chan gwats'an tr'eediinąąhchįį!”
42023040	Ch'izhii dinjii chan ch'ats'ą' t'iiyahnyąą ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa viyinjiihooh'ee? Datthak ts'ą' diirahaaghan.
42023041	Diikhwan, ąįį łi'didlii haa t'idiirah'in, gwiizųų tr'agwarah'ya' ąįį geenjit diineegwarookwat izhit geh'an, gaa adan ąįį gwiizųų tr'agwah'ya' kwaa.”
42023042	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus jyaa ahnyąą, “Shanandaii, Jesus, King dhindlit tł'ęę!”
42023043	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Łi'didlii haa zhit juk drin zheekat shroonchy'aa goo'aii gwizhit shaa t'ihinchy'aa t'oonchy'aa.”
42023044	Drin tł'an gwats'an gishreen'ąįį kwaa goodlit ts'ą' 3 o'clock gwats'ą' zhat nahkat datthak tǫǫ gwiinli'.
42023045	Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoo gwizhit gihdeiinvyaa gaa teetł'an nihtr'iinch'aa.
42023046	Jesus shraa haa khashraa'iintrat, “Shiti'! Shanky'aa nanli' zhit gwihih'aa!” Jyaa nyąą ts'ą' niindhat.
42023047	Niveet'ah'in nąįį ts'ą' Diik'eegwaadhat deegwiizhik gwąąh'in dąį', Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deehiił'ee ts'ą' jyaa nyąą. “Jii łyaa dinjii nizįį t'inchy'aa łee!”
42023048	Nijin zhat dinjii dilk'ii nąįį deegwiizhik googwąąh'ya' dąį', oo'an digizheh tr'igwidii haa gwits'eegahoojil.
42023049	Gootee juu gwinzii Jesus haandaii nąįį, zhit juu tr'injaa Galilee gwats'an yatąįį adaa nąįį shriit'ąhthee gwa'an gwats'an tr'igwidii haa gwik'eegąąhtii.
42023050	-
42023051	Judea nahkat gwizhit kwaiik'it gwachoo Arimathea goozhii gwats'an dinjii Joseph oaazhii. Dinjii nizįį akwat viyinjirihił'ee nilii. K'eegwaadhat Veegwinii'ee gwiheelyaa geenjit nagwal'in. Ąįį kįh dilk'ii nąįį tee dhidii, gaa Jesus deeroolyaa giinyą' dąį', adan ąįį goovaa gitr'ii'ee.
42023052	Pilate ts'ą' niinzhii ts'ą', “Jesus vichį' shintł'eerohchyaa,” nyąą.
42023053	Yichi' neenąhchįį ts'ą' ts'at dril zhit yahchįį. Ąįįtł'ęę kii zhit gweedii goo'aii gwizhit yahchįį. Ąįį tth'ank'it gwehkįį dinjii gitsii kwaa.
42023054	Drints'ą' drin gweedhaa, ąįįts'ą' t'ee Neegwaazhii Drin nigwiighit.
42023055	Ąįį tr'injaa juu Galilee gwats'an Jesus tąįį haajil nąįį Joseph haa gahaajil ts'ą' nijin Jesus vichį' vanaanjik googwąąh'in.
42023056	Ąįįtł'ęę digizheh gwits'eegahoojil ts'ą' gwinzii vagwaatsan giiyeenjit shrinlik. Law zhit deegwinyąą gwik'it Neegwaazhii Drin tr'agogwąh'ya' kwaa.
42024001	Drin zhit vanh dąį' hee tr'injaa nąįį ąįį jidii gwinzii vagwaatsan shriginlik haa Jesus vatth'ank'it gwats'ą' gahaajil.
42024002	Vatth'ank'it gwadąįį kii gihłeehiltth'at łee googwąąh'in.
42024003	Ąįįts'ą' nihdeeginjil, gaa Diik'eegwaadhat Jesus vichį' gąąh'in kwaa.
42024004	Zhat nigiilzhii ts'ą' deegwiizhik t'igwii'in gaagiindaii kwaa, gwiizhit khan hee dinjii neekwaii vagwach'aa ch'ahdrii giveeghaii nadhat nagwaanąįį.
42024005	Gwint'aii gąąnjat ts'ą' nankat nikiigogwąh'ee gwiizhit ąįį zheekat gwich'in neekwaii jyaa goovahnyąą, “Dinjii gwandaii gwiizhit jaghaii tth'ank'it gwizhit vinkeegǫh'in?
42024006	Dzaa dhidii kwaa t'inchy'aa, gwandaii needhidlit. Galilee dhidii dąį', deenakhwahnyąą ganoondaii.
42024007	‘Gwidinji' dinjii iizųų nąįį antł'eehahchyaa ts'ą' gigiihahtsak. Ąįįtł'ęę drin tik gwiindhat tł'ęę neegweheendaii.’”
42024008	Ąįįtł'ęę tr'injaa nąįį giiginjik anaanjik,
42024009	Tth'ank'it gwats'an oo'ee neegiijil ts'ą' jii datthak giitsyaa 11 chan ts'ą' ch'izhii nąįį haa googwaandak.
42024010	Ąįį tr'injaa t'ee Mary Magdalene, Joanna, James vahan Mary, nąįį haa, Jesus vitsyaa nąįį ts'ą' goovandah deegwiizhik goovaagogwaandak.
42024011	Gaa vitsyaa nąįį ąįį tr'injaa deeginyąą zhyaa t'igwinyąą giindhan ts'ą' gwik'iinjigiighit kwaa.
42024012	Gaa Peter ąįį ndak ninehjin ts'ą' tth'ank'it gwats'ą' hilgik, gwizhit gwąąh'in, gaa yagwach'aa zhrįh nah'in, gaa ch'akwaa. Ąįįtł'ęę dizheh gwits'eehoozhii, deegwiizhik t'igwinyąą li' niindhan.
42024013	Izhit drin gootee dinjii neekwaii nąįį Jerusalem gwats'an 7 mile Emmaus kwaiik'it gwats'ą' gee'al.
42024014	Deegwiizhik datthak geenjit nihłaa geegiginkhii.
42024015	Geegoogwaandak ts'ą' geegiginkhii gwiizhit Jesus gooveeghaih niinzhii ts'ą' goovaa ahaa,
42024016	giiyąąh'in gaa adan t'inchy'aa giiyaandaii kwaa.
42024017	Jesus t'agoovahnyąą, “Oh'al gwiizhit jidii eegoohkhii?” Khaihłan nagadhat ts'ą' goonin kat tr'igwidii dha'aii.
42024018	Ch'ihłak dinjii Cleopas oaazhii ąįį yuahkat, “Nan zhrįh Jerusalem gwizhit aakin inlii juk k'ehdąį' gwanaa gwats'an deegwiizhik gaanandaii kwaa?”
42024019	“Jaghaii, deegwiizhik?” goovahnyąą. “Jesus, Nazareth gwats'an deeginlik reh,” ginyąą. “Ąįį dinjii t'ee łyaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nilii, dee'ya' chan ts'ą' deiinyą' datthak geenjit t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa chan ts'ą' dinjii datthak haa giishoo'ąhłii.
42024020	Giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį chan ts'ą' Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį tr'ahaahkhwaa eenjit gwintł'eegiiyahchįį tł'ęę t'ee gigiiyiłtsak.
42024021	Ąįįts'ą' Israel gwich'in nąįį neehahshii ji', tr'oonyaa eenjit veenjit niinjich'aradhat! Izhit gwizhrįh nakwaa, juk t'ee k'ehdąį' gehnaa hee t'igwiizhik.
42024022	Diitee gwats'an tr'injaa lat łyaa geegwaroolii kwaa diineenjit t'igiizhik. Vanh gineech'ihii'aii gwiizhit, tth'ank'it gwats'ą' gahaajil.
42024023	Gaa khyų' giichį' kantii. Oo'ee neegiijil ts'ą' zheekat gwich'in diits'ą' igwiilkįį ts'ą' tth'aii hee Jesus gwandaii diigahnyąą.
42024024	Diilak nąįį zhat nagaajil akhai' ąįį tr'injaa deegiinyą' chy'aa tth'aii nihk'it t'oonchy'aa googwąąh'ya', gaa adan ąįį giiyąąh'ya' kwaa.”
42024025	Tł'ęę Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą, “Łyaa tr'agǫhjik, deegwahtł'oo zhyaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii deegiinyą' gaa gwik'iinjuhkhit kwaa!
42024026	Christ Diik'eegwaadhat jyahts'ą' t'ee khaiinjich'ohoodhat, ąįįtł'ęę geh'an t'ee zheekat gwizhit vich'eegwąhndit.”
42024027	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit deevaraiinyą' datthak eegoovaagwaandak, oondaa nijin Moses vidęhtły'aa chan ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nąįį dagogwąąntł'oo izhit gwats'an hee.
42024028	Nijin kwaiik'it gwats'ą' geedaa geenigiinjil dąį' Jesus ąįį gehgoo heekhaa k'it t'ii'in.
42024029	Gaa zhak giiyuunjik ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Diinaa niinkhaa. It'ee niighit kwaa tǫǫ gweheelyaa.” Ąįįts'ą' t'ee goovaanihdineezhii ts'ą' naahaa.
42024030	Vakat ch'ara'aa ts'ą' goovaanaadii, łųhchy'aa oonjik ts'ą' “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa mahsį',” nyąą. Ąįįtł'ęę łeeyiiłnaii ts'ą' goovantł'eeyahtsit.
42024031	Jesus t'inchy'aa łee giiky'aanjik, gaa goovandah hiljii naanaii.
42024032	Jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Nijin dzaa gwats'ą' tr'eedaa dąį', Dęhtły'aa Choh kat geediinaagwaandak gwiizhit łyaa shoo diizhit dha'aii k'it t'oonchy'aa.”
42024033	It'ee zhat nineegehjin ts'ą' Jerusalem gwits'eegahoo'oo, izhit t'ee gah vitsyaa 11 nąįį chan ts'ą' ch'izhii nąįį łigiiljil ts'ą'
42024034	jyaa ginyąą, “Diik'eegwaadhat neegwiindaii t'oonchy'aa. Simon Peter ts'ą' vigwiilkįį!”
42024035	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee ąįį dinjii neekwaii nąįį gee'al gwiizhit goots'ą' deegwiizhik chan ts'ą' Diik'eegwaadhat łųhchy'aa nihtr'aahnaii jyąhts'ą' juu nilii giiky'aanjik geegoovaagogwaandak.
42024036	Ąįį dinjii neekwaii nąįį jii kwaii geegoovaagwaandak gwiizhit khanhee Diik'eegwaadhat gootee nadhat naanaii ts'ą' jyaa goovahnyąą, “Tsinehdan nakhwaa oolį'!”
42024037	Łyaa gihilghaa ts'ą' gąąnjat, ch'anky'aa t'inchy'aa giiyuunyąą.
42024038	Gaa jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jaghaii noojat ts'ą' jidii datthak geenjit gwik'iinjuhkhit kwaa?
42024039	Shakwai', shanli' haa nǫh'in ąįįtł'ęę shįį t'ihchy'aa shaakhwahandaii. Tth'an, shatthąį' haa shakat noonjii ji' t'ee gwahǫǫh'yaa, duuyeh ch'anky'aa jyaa t'inchy'aa.”
42024040	Jyaa nyąą ts'ą' danli', dakwai' haa goots'ą' agwaahch'in.
42024041	Googaa tth'aii gwik'iinjigiighit kwaa, gaa łi'didlii giiyaandaii haa goozhit shoh dha'aii, ąįįts'ą' Jesus goovahkat, “Dzaa nik'ee tr'ihee'aa khwa'įį?”
42024042	Łuk dhichy'aa giiyantł'ahtsit,
42024043	ts'ą' goovandah iin'al.
42024044	Ąįįtł'ęę jyaa goovahnyąą, “Tth'aii nakhwaa dhiidii dąį' jii kwaii t'ee geenakhwaagwahaldak, Moses vidęhtły'aa, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii goodęhtły'aa chan ts'ą' Psalms gwakat deesharaiinyą' datthak gwik'it gweheelyaa.”
42024045	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat gwigweheetth'ak eenjit t'aih goots'an iłtsąįį,
42024046	tł'ęę jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jii t'ee gwadanakhwatł'oo: Christ khaiinjich'iheedhat, ąįįtł'ęę drin tik gweheedhaa ts'ą' neegweheendaii.
42024047	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat vitsyaa nąįį giiginjik eech'oohąąhchyaa gwinyąą. Nakhwatr'agwaanduu akhagoiinyąą tł'ęę Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa neenjit oo'an gweheelyaa. Jerusalem gwizhit tr'ookit jii gwandak gwintł'eegihee'aa ąįįtł'ęę dohju' hee jii nankat dinjii datthak chan.
42024048	Jidii gǫǫh'ya' łyaa geegohoondak yuu.
42024049	Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą nakhwats'an hahtsyaa Shiti' diginjik shats'an iłtsąįį haa. Gaa ąįį t'aih yeendaa gwats'an nakhwats'an heelyaa gwats'ą' Jerusalem nagahoo'yaa gwizhrįh.”
42024050	Kwaiik'it gwachoo goovaacheehoozhii ts'ą' Bethany kwaiik'it hee goovaanoozhii. Izhit hee ndak nąąhjik ts'ą' gook'aa ginkhe' goovaagweheezyaa geenjit.
42024051	Gook'aa ginkhii gwiizhit, zheekat gwats'ą' goołeedahoodhat.
42024052	Giits'ą' khadigiinjii. Ąįįtł'ęę Jerusalem gwats'ą' shoh goozhit dha'aii ts'ą' geedaa.
42024053	Izhit hee niighyuk Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoo gwizhit Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deegihiił'ee, agahnyąą.
43001001	Tr'ookit dąį' gwats'an, Ginjik ch'adąį' hee gwandaii, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa haa nilii ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa nilii.
43001002	Tr'ookit dąį' gwats'an Ginjik, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa haa nilii.
43001003	Ginjik k'iighai' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa jidii datthak iłtsąįį, ch'ihłak gaa veentak tr'iłtsąįį kwaa.
43001004	Jidii gwandaii dhidlit kwaii datthak vagwandaii ts'an t'igwiizhik, ąįį vagwandaii t'ee juu nąįį datthak eenjit ch'ahdrii nilii.
43001005	Ąįį vagwandaii t'ee dinjii nąįį eenjit ch'ahdrii nilii, tǫǫ chan duuyeh yąąhkyaa.
43001006	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ąįį dinjii John oaazhii jii nankat gwats'ą' hił'e',
43001007	ąįį dinjii nąįį ts'ą' ąįį Aadrii eegwahaandak eenjit. Juu nąįį datthak jii gaageheendaii ts'ą' gwik'iinjigeheeghit eenjit Ch'aadrii eegavaagwaandak.
43001008	Adan ąįį Aadrii t'arahnyąą kwaa; Aadrii eegwahaandak eenjit gwizhrįh ginkhe' t'arahnyąą.
43001009	Ąįį Aadrii t'ee łyaa łi'didlii t'arahnyąą, dząą nankat gwats'ą' haazhii ts'ą' juu nąįį datthak ach'ahdrii.
43001010	Ąįį Ginjik vik'iighai' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa nan iłtsąįį, gaa dząą nankat dhidii dąį' dinjii nąįį giiyaandaii kwaa k'it t'iginchy'aa.
43001011	Danahkat gwats'ą' haazhii gaa zhat dinjii nąįį giitr'ii'ee.
43001012	Goolat nąįį zhrįh eechįį t'ii'in ts'ą' giik'iinjiighit; Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vigii giheelyaa eenjit t'aih goots'an iłtsąįį.
43001013	Jii dinjii nąįį łyaa giik'iinjiighit, ts'ą' izhit geh'an chan gooneegahoodlit, dagahan akwat digiti' ts'an nakwaa gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an gooneegahoodlit ts'ą' Gooti' nilii.
43001014	Ginjik ąįį dinjii dhidlit ts'ą' diitee gwinch'į', vich'eegwahdrii gwarąąh'ya', ąįįt'ee ch'eet'igwiniindhan ąįįts'ą' łi'didlii haa vizhit deedąą'ąį' nilii. Adan zhrįh Gwiti', Vidinji' nilii geh'an ts'ą' jii ch'eegwahdrii shroodiinyąą vats'an dhidlit.
43001015	John chųų gwats'an ąhtsii yeeginkhe'. Jyaa yahnyąą, “Jii dinjii eegiihkhii t'ihnyąą, nijin jii jyaa nakhwaiinyą' dąį', ‘Shatąįį k'eeheedik gaa shandaa hil'ee shigweheelyaa gwats'ą' dąį' gwats'an gwandaii geh'an.’”
43001016	Vich'eet'igwiniidhan haa gweedhaa datthak diitee googwąąnchy'aa diits'ą' nizįį.
43001017	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa yeenii Moses k'iighai' diineenjit Law intł'eiin'ąįį gaa Jesus Christ ch'eet'igwiniindhan chan ts'ą' łi'didlii haa diitł'eiin'ąįį.
43001018	Dinjii ch'ihłak gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa dandee haa nah'in kwaa gaa Vidinji' Jesus Christ zhrįh yaa nilii ts'ą' yeediinaagwildak.
43001019	Jews khaihkwaii nąįį, digigiinkhii chan ts'ą' Levite nąįį haa John ts'ą' googihił'e', jii giiyųąhkat eenjit “Juu inlii?”
43001020	Zhazhat John nagwąąh'įį kwaa ts'ą' gwinzii gavaagwildak, “Christ t'ihchy'aa kwaa.”
43001021	“Juu inlii gǫ', Elijah inlii?” giiyahnyąą. “Nakwaa, ąįį t'ihchy'aa kwaa.” John nyąą. “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii inlii?” giiyahnyąą “Nakwaa,” gavahnyąą.
43001022	“Juu inlii diinaa gwandak, juu naroohaahkat eenjit diihił'e' nąįį gavaa gwarahaandak eenjit. Juu inlii?” giiyahnyąą.
43001023	John jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jidii ihłii nakhwaagwahaldak: ‘Shįį t'ee oo'at nangwinjir gwa'an ihshral ts'ą' jyaa dihnyąą Diik'eegwaadhat tąįį gwinjik veenjit k'igwąą'ee nagoh'ąįį!’” (Jii t'ee Isaiah, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii yadaantł'oo)
43001024	-
43001025	Pharisee nąįį juu gihił'e' nąįį John goahkat, “Christ inlii kwaa akwat Elijah chan inlii kwaa, akwat Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii inlii kwaa. Gwiizhit jaghaii chųų gwats'an ąhtsii?”
43001026	John jyaa gavahnyąą “Chųų gwats'an ałtsii; gaa nakhwatee dinjii vaakhwandaii kwaa nadhat t'oonchy'aa.
43001027	Shatąįį k'eeheedik, gaa vakwaiitryaa dineehałchaa eenjit gaa hool'ee kwaa.”
43001028	Jii t'igwiizhik t'ee Bethany kwaiik'it gwizhit t'igwiizhik Jordan han gwinjik ndųhts'ąįį, nijin John chųų gwats'an ąhtsii izhit.
43001029	Gęhdaa drin John ąįį Jesus yats'ą' ahaa niił'in ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Jii t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidivii Gii tsal t'inchy'aa. Jii nankat gwatr'agwaanduu oo'an gwihilii t'inchy'aa!
43001030	Jii dinjii eegiihkhii t'ihnyąą, nijin jii nakhwaagwaldak dąį', ‘Dinjii shatąįį k'eeheedik gaa shandaa hil'ee, shigweheelyaa gwats'ą' dąį' gwats'an gwandaii geh'an.’
43001031	Shįį gaa juu t'inchy'aa vaashandaii kwaa, gaa Israel gwich'in nąįį yaaheendaii eenjit vats'an chųų dhałtsąįį.”
43001032	Jii t'ee John jyaa diinyą': “Dove chiitsal daagąįį zheekat gwats'an yakat needaanąįį gwik'it Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą yakat needaanąįį ts'ą' yaa nilii.
43001033	Tth'aii nihk'it vaashandaii kwaa, gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa chųų gwats'an hałtsyaa eenjit shihił'e' ąįį jyaa shaiinyą', ‘Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą dinjii kat needahąądhal; ąįįts'ą' ąįį dinjii t'ee Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą haa chųų gwats'an hahtsyaa.’
43001034	Jii gwał'ya' t'ihnyąą,” John gavahnyąą, “Jii dinjii łi'haa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' t'inchy'aa.”
43001035	Gęhdaa drin chan hee zhat John, ditsyaa neekwaii haa zhat nigiilzhii,
43001036	Nijin Jesus gehgoo ahaa nah'in dąį', “Jii t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidivii Giitsal t'inchy'aa!” John goovahnyąą.
43001037	Ąįį vitsyaa neekwaii jyaa nyąą giiyiitth'ak ts'ą' Jesus haa gahaa'oo.
43001038	Jesus neediil'ee ts'ą' giitąįį adaa gwąąh'in ts'ą' gavaahkat, “Jidii keegǫh'in t'akhwa'in?” “Geech'ǫąąhtan, nijin gwinch'įį?” giiyahnyąą.
43001039	“Aanaii, gahǫǫh'yaa,” gavahnyąą. Ąįįts'ą' t'ee giiyaahaa'oo ts'ą' nijin gwich'įį googwąąh'ya' ts'ą' giiyaaniihaa (khaa gwilii geh'an).
43001040	Andrew, John deiinyą' gwiitth'ak ąįįtł'ęę Jesus haa haazhii. (Simon Peter voondee nilii.)
43001041	Andrew łyaa khan doondee Simon kantii ts'ą' yagwąh'ąįį. Googwahkhan jyaa yahnyąą, “Messiah vagwarąh'ąįį!” (Greek ginjik t'ee Christ t'agahnyąą.)
43001042	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Simon ąįį Jesus ts'ą' hiłchįį. Jesus yąąh'in ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Simon, nan John vidinji', noozhri' Cephas oohaazhyaa.” (Peter gwinyąą t'igwinyąą, “kii” chan ginyąą t'igwinyąą).
43001043	Gęhdaa drin Jesus Galilee nahkat gwats'ą' heekhaa nigwiin'ąįį. Philip agwąh'ąįį ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Shaa hinkhaii!”
43001044	Philip t'ee Bethsaida kwaiik'it gwats'an ahaa, nijin Andrew chan ts'ą' Peter haa gwigwich'įį.
43001045	Philip ąįį Nathaniel agwąh'ąįį ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Moses va-law dęhtły'aa kat yeeginkhe' akwat Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nąįį dęhtły'aa kat jyąhts'ą' gwadagaantł'oo. Jesus t'inchy'aa, Nazareth gwats'an Joseph ąįį vigii nilii.”
43001046	“Nazareth nijin ji' gweheezyaa li'?” Nathaniel nyąą “Aanaii ts'ą' gwąąh'in,” Philip yahnyąą.
43001047	Nijin Jesus ąįį Nathaniel yats'ą' ahaa gwąąh'in dąį', jyaa yahnyąą, “Jii t'ee łyaa Israel gwich'in nilii, dinjii łi'didlii nilii!”
43001048	Nathaniel yuahkat, “Nats'ąą shaanandaii?” Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Philip nagwahah'aa gwats'ą' dąį' ts'iivii vakat Figs nahshii t'eh dhindii naał'ya'!”
43001049	“Geech'ǫąąhtan, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' t'iinchy'aa łee Israel gwi-King t'iinchy'aa łee!” Nathaniel yahnyąą.
43001050	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Ts'iivii vakat Figs nahshii t'eh dhindii naał'ya' naiinyą' geh'an gwizhrįh gwik'iinjinghit? Jii kwaii andaa ts'ą' gwihil'ee t'igwii'in gwahąąh'yaa t'oonchy'aa!”
43001051	Ąįįts'ą' jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jii t'ee łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak: zheekat nihky'aa t'igweheenjyaa gahǫǫh'yaa ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa zheekat gwich'in nąįį k'iidak, k'iidąą haa Gwidinji' ts'ą' nigiheedaa!”
43002001	Galilee nahkat gwizhit Cana kwaiik'it goo'aii, zhat Jesus vahan dhidii, izhit drin tik gwiindhat ąįįtł'ęę zhat nihłeegwirihiłchįį.
43002002	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus chan ts'ą' ditsyaa nąįį haa geedan chan zhat nihłeegwirihiłchįį aanaii googahnyąą ts'ą' gwats'ą' gahaajil.
43002003	Nijin jak chų' datthak geenį' dąį', Jesus vahan t'iiyahnyąą, “Jak chų' gavaanaanįį.”
43002004	“Ni'ęę, jyaa dini'in shahaiinjyaa kwaa goo'aii t'oonchy'aa. Zhat tth'aii shaa nigwiighit kwaa.” Jesus yahnyąą.
43002005	Jesus vahan ąįį juu zhat yeenjit tr'agwah'in nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Deenakhwahnyąą gwik'it t'akhwa'in.”
43002006	Izhit geeghaih chųų eenjit kii tyah choh nihk'iitik dhidlii, (ch'ihłak gaa 20 akwat 30 gallon ootą'). Jews nąįį shragoodiinyąą neegeheelyaa eenjit dik'eech'agahtryaa geenjit.
43002007	Jesus ąįį juu zhat gwitr'it t'agwah'in nąįį t'ahnyąą, “Jii tyah kwaii chųų vizhit deedoohjyaa.” Chųų vizhit deedąą'ąį' giiyiłtsąįį.
43002008	Ąįįtł'ęę jyaa gavahnyąą, “Et'ee valat khanohjyaa ts'ą' zhit juu gach'ah'aa ąįį vats'ą' hohkaii.” Giits'ą' yahaakaii,
43002009	ts'ą' yaalaii, ąįį chųų t'ee jak chų' dhidlit. Ąįį jak chų' nijin gwats'an t'inchy'aa yaandaii kwaa gaa zhit juu yeetr'agwah'in nąįį gaagiindaii.
43002010	Ąįį juu veegwarąhchįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Lęįį nąįį jak chų' ch'andaa nizįį tr'ookit gagahnįį ąįį datthak giinjik ąįįtł'ęę jak chų' daatł'oo kwaa gagahnįį. Gaa nan ąįį ndaagwąą'ąį' dohju' hee jak chų' nizįį juk gąhnįį.”
43002011	Jesus jii tr'ookit gwitr'it gwihil'ee t'iizhik Cana kwaiik'it, Galilee nahkat gwizhit. Izhit t'ee dich'eegwahdrii gwizhrįh nigwiin'ąįį, ts'ą' vitsyaa nąįį giik'iinjiighit.
43002012	Jii jyaa digwiizhik ąįįtł'ęę Jesus, dahan ditsyaa dachaa nąįį haa Capernaum kwaiik'it gwats'ą' gahaajil ts'ą' zhat drin nitsya' gaak'į'.
43002013	It'ee khaiinjii Jews nąįį eenjit Passover nigwiindhat ąįįts'ą' Jesus Jerusalem gwats'ą' haazhii.
43002014	Kharigidiinjii Zheh gwachoh gookwantee nihdeegweedii gwizhit dinjii nąįį aak'ii, divii chan ts'ą' chiitsal kwaii t'įį laraa gihilii gwąąh'in, ąįįts'ą' zhit juu ch'adanh gwalaraa ookwat nąįį chan vakaii'aa, ts'ą' dilk'ii nah'in.
43002015	Ąįįts'ą' zhat gwa'an tły'ah haa viitrii iłtsąįį haa Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh gwizhit gwats'an divii, aak'ii haa cheehaanzhit; ąįį ch'adanh gwalaraa ookwat nąįį vakaii'aa ts'ą' giilk'ii izhit vakaii'aa khatąąnahjil ts'ą' goolaraa datthak neiinjil.
43002016	Ąįį juu dziitsal dove laraa t'įį hilii nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Juk zhat cheegavahohłii! Jii Shiti' vizheh ch'ookwat zheh goo'įį kwaa!”
43002017	Vitsyaa nąįį Dęhtły'aa Choh kat jii, jyaa digwinyąą gineegaandaii, “Nizheh gwachoh łyaa tr'ihkhit geenjit yinjiihooł'ee ts'ą' ąįį geenjit shrii tr'igwirehee'aa!” gwinyąą.
43002018	Izhit zhat Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį jii giiyųąhkat, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an ni'in ji', diinandah geegwaroolii kwaa t'ini'in lee.”
43002019	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jii Kharigidiinjii Zheh an goodlit ji' drin tik ts'ą' ndak nineegwahałtsyaa.”
43002020	“Drin tik ąįįtł'ęę ndak nineegwahahtsyaa? Jii Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh łyaa 46 years gwahaadhat ąįįtł'ęę dohju' hee gęhdaa tr'igiinjik t'oonchy'aa?” giiyahnyąą.
43002021	Gaa Jesus ąįį zhit Kharigidiinjii Zheh geeginkhii dąį' adan ideeginkhii t'inyąą.
43002022	Nijin niindhat ąįįtł'ęę vineegwiindaii dąį' vitsyaa nąįį jii deenyąą chy'aa giinaandaii. Jesus deiinyą' akwat Dęhtły'aa Choh kat deegwinyąą datthak gwik'iinjigiighit gaadlit.
43002023	Passover ch'ara'aa gwizhit gweedhaa dąį' Jesus Jerusalem dhidii, geegwaroolii kwaa gwinlęįį t'iizhik giiyąąh'ya' ts'ą' giik'iinjiighit.
43002024	Gaa Jesus gootr'oahnyąą, dinjii datthak goovaandaii geh'an.
43002025	Dinjii eevaaragwaandak gwat'aahchy'aa kwaa ch'adąį' hee goodrii zhit t'oonchy'aa gavaandaii.
43003001	Izhit dąį' Jews khaihkwaii tee gwa'an dinjii Nicodemus oaazhii dhidii, Pharisees chan nilii.
43003002	Ch'ihłan khaa Jesus eenihkhee ts'ą' yuahkat, “Geech'ǫąąhtan, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa eenjit geech'ǫąąhtan eenjit nihił'e' naagwiindaii. Ch'ihłak gaa duuyeh Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vehdan geegwaroolii kwaa t'ii'in vaagwiindaii.”
43003003	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Łi'didlii haa naagwahaaldak, dinjii chan vineegahoodlit ji' gwizhrįh K'eegwaadhat Veegwinii'ee gwahąąh'yaa t'oonchy'aa.”
43003004	Nicodemus jyaa yahnyąą, “Dinjii vaghaii lęįį gwiizhit nats'ąą vineegweheelyaa t'iinyąą? Duuyeh dahan zhit nidii ts'ą' chan vineegwiilii t'oonchy'aa!”
43003005	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Łi'didlii haa naagwahaaldak, dinjii chųų akwat Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą haa vagoodlit ji' gwizhrįh K'eegwaadhat Veegwinii'ee nihdeeheehaa.
43003006	Dinjii ąįį dinjii ts'an vigwilik, gaa dinjii Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą zhit vigwilik, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an nilii.
43003007	‘Chan nineegweheelyaa,’ nakhwaihnyąą ąįį łyaa t'igwinyąą eenjit gwik'iinjuhkhit.
43003008	Ahtr'aii dąį' nijuk ohtr'aii niindhan datthak gwik'it ahtr'aii dohtth'ak gaa nijin gwats'an akwat nijin gwats'ą' t'inyąą vaanandaii kwaa. Ąįį juu Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą haa vigwilik gwik'it t'inchy'aa.”
43003009	“Jii nats'ąą t'agwaiinyąą,” Nicodemus yahnyąą.
43003010	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Israel gwizhit łyaa geech'ǫąąhtan hil'ee inlii gwiizhit jii geenjit gaanandaii kwaa?
43003011	Łi'didlii haa naagwahaaldak, jidii gaagwiindaii gwizhrįh geegirinkhii, jidii gwarąąh'ya' gwizhrįh chan geegirinkhii googaa nakhwatee ch'ihłak gaa shik'iinjiighit kwaa.
43003012	Dząą nijin nankat t'igwii'in geenaagwaldak dąį' shik'iinjiinghit kwaa; akwat zheekat geenaagwaldak ji' izhit chan shik'iinjihįįnghit kwaa.
43003013	Ąįįts'ą' ch'ihłak gaa zheekat gwats'ą' haazhii ts'ą' oodaa nidii kwaa, Gwidinji' zhrįh jyaa diizhik.”
43003014	“Deenaadąį' Moses nangwinjir gwa'an gwandah gyųų choh dachan kat diłchaa, izhit gwik'it Gwidinji' cross kat ndak tr'ihiłchįį.
43003015	Juu gik'iinjiighit nąįį khit gwigweheendaii eenjit.
43003016	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa łyaa dinjii datthak eet'iindhan geenjit it'ee zhrįh Didinji' gwantł'ąhchįį, ąįįts'ą' juu yik'injiighit nąįį nigiheedhaa kwaa ts'ą' khit gwigweheendaii eenjit.
43003017	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Didinji' nankat dinjii an hahtsyaa eenjit gwats'ą' hił'e' kwaa gaa dinjii neehahshii eenjit.
43003018	“Juu Gwidinji' k'injiighit duuyeh an ilii; gaa juu gwik'iinjiighit kwaa ąįįt'ee ch'adąį' an dhidlit, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa et'ee zhrįh Vidinji' k'injiighit kwaa geh'an.
43003019	Jii t'ee jyąhts'ą' dinjii an heelyaa t'agwarahnyąą: Jii nankat datthak k'ąą adrii gwilii, gaa dinjii nąįį tǫǫ ąįį geet'igiindhan, ąįį googwitr'it gwiizųų geh'an.
43003020	Ąįį juu vigwitr'it gwiizųų nąįį ch'aadrii itr'igii'ee ts'ą' duuyeh ch'aadrii zhit ga'oo, vigwitr'it gwiizųų ąįį gwizhrįh nagwa'aii gitr'ii'ee geh'an.
43003021	Gaa zhit juu vigwitr'it gwinzii nąįį shoo haa ch'aadrii zhit ga'oo, dee'in ąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa k'iighai' t'ii'in gwigweheechy'aa eenjit.”
43003022	Jii ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus ditsyaa nąįį haa Judea nahkat gwats'ą' gahaajil. Zhat ch'ihłee gwizhrįh gavaa iindi' ts'ą' lęįį nąįį chųų ts'an dhidlit.
43003023	Aenon gwizhit John chųų gwats'an ąhtsii, Aenon t'ee Salim geeghaih goo'aii ts'ą' zhat gwizhrįh chųų gwanlii. Lęįį nąįį chųų goots'an tr'ahahtsyaa eenjit giiyeenineedal.
43003024	Zhat dąį' John tth'aii zheegwaazhrąįį nigiiyąąhchįį kwaa.
43003025	Jews nąįį tee gwats'an dinjii ch'ihłak ąįį John vitsyaa nąįį haa gwantł'oo shroogogoonyąą eenjit giiyaa nihzheedagąąn'ee.
43003026	John ts'ą' nigiinjil ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Geech'ǫąąhtan, dinjii Jordan han gwinjik ndųhts'ąįį, naa indi' ts'ą' veeginkhe', vanandaii? Juk chųų gwats'an ąhtsii ts'ą' juu nąįį datthak yats'ą' hijyaa t'arahnyąą!”
43003027	John jyaa gavahnyąą, “Zheekat gwats'an jidii gwitr'it diinantł'eegwariin'ąįį zhrįh eenjit gwitr'it gwarahąąh'yaa goo'aii.
43003028	Nakhwandah jii jyaa diinyą' ganoondaii, ‘Christ t'ihchy'aa kwaa gaa shįį tr'ookit vits'ii shirihił'e'.’
43003029	Zhit juu veegwarąhchįį t'ee va'at ts'anyahaa'yaa. Ąįį juu veegwarąhchįį vijyaa veeghaii nadhat ts'ą' yinkeech'oołk'įį, yideezhuh diitth'ak dąį' shoh ilik. Jyąhts'ą' t'ee shįį chan shoo'ihłik, gwitr'it shintł'eegwiriin'ąįį gęhdaa tr'iinjik geh'an.
43003030	Adan nitsii heelyaa, shįį ąįį jyaa dagwahtł'oo sheegwehee'aa kwaa.”
43003031	“Zheekat gwats'an ahaa ts'ą' juu nąįį datthak andaa hil'ee. Juu nankat gwats'an ahaa chan nankat gwats'an nilii ts'ą' nankat gwiky'aa gwizhrįh ginkhii. Juu zheekat gwats'an ahaa t'ee juu nąįį datthak ęhdak dhidii.
43003032	Jidii gwaak'įį akwat gwąąh'ya' haa eegwaandak. Ch'ihłak gaa yiginjik k'injiighit kwaa.
43003033	Dinjii yiginjik k'eegwahthat t'ee łi'didlii nilii giiky'aandak.
43003034	Juu hił'e' t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa viginjik eegwaandak t'oonchy'aa, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ąįį deegwahtł'oo Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą hahtsyaa gwik'it yats'an iłtsąįį geh'an.
43003035	Gwiti' łyaa Didinji' eet'iindhan ts'ą' jidii datthak yantł'eegwiin'ąįį.
43003036	Juu Gwidinji' k'injiighit t'ee khit gweheendaii. Juu Gwidinji' viginjik k'it t'ii'in kwaa t'ee duuyeh khit gwandaii, gaa khit geenjit Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa yagwahąąhshii.”
43004001	Zhat dąį' Jesus ąįį John andaa ts'ą' vitsyaa nąįį gwilii ts'ą' datthak chųų goots'an ąhtsii gwinyąą ąįį Pharisee nąįį gwigwiitth'ak.
43004002	Jesus ąįį chųų gwats'an ąhtsii kwaa gaa vitsyaa nąįį t'ii'in ąįį t'agoogwahnyąą.
43004003	Jesus nijin jyaa digwinyąą gwiitth'ak dąį', Judea nahkat gihłeehoozhii ts'ą' Galilee nahkat gwits'eehoozhii,
43004004	Samaria nahkat t'ee, Galilee gwats'ą' hee goo'aii ts'ą' zhat gehgoo haazhii.
43004005	Jesus Samaria nahkat gwizhit kwaiik'it Sychar goozhii k'idik. Deenaadąį' izhit geeghaih t'ee Jacob didinji' Joseph nan intł'eiin'ąįį goo'aii.
43004006	Izhit t'ee Jacob vichųų deek'it goo'aii ąįįts'ą' Jesus niighyuk niinzhii ts'ą' cheendak ts'ą' zhat chųų tr'oonjii deek'it eeghaii naadii. Drin tł'an gweedhaa gwiizhit.
43004007	Samaria gwats'an tr'injaa zhat chųų hoondal eenjit k'idik ts'ą' Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Chųų shintł'eiinkaii.”
43004008	(Vitsyaa nąįį kwaiik'it shih gooheekwat eenjit nigijyaa gwiizhit.)
43004009	Ąįį tr'injaa jyaa yahnyąą, “Jews nąįį tee gwats'an iinlii, shįį ąįį Samaria gwats'an ihłii, jaghaii chųų shaiinyąą t'iinyąą?” (Jews nąįį duuyeh gaa Samaria gwich'in nąįį k'it zhit ch'aga'aa).
43004010	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa jidii neenjit di'įį gaanandaii akwat juu ihłii shaanandaii ji', oohaahkat ts'ą' chųų gwandaii nintł'eeheekaa.”
43004011	Ąįį tr'injaa jyaa yahnyąą, “Tyah ni'įį kwaa, nanzhit k'iizhak chųų ts'ą' niighit. Nijin chųų gwandaii oohiindal t'iinyąą?
43004012	Yeenii diilak Jacob jii chųų deek'it diinantł'eegwiin'ąįį; adan, didinji', dinin nąįį haa datthak gwats'an chųų geenį'. Jacob vandaa neegoo'aii yiindhan lee t'iinyąą?”
43004013	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Juu dząą chųų eenį' t'ee chan hee chųų haał'yaa.
43004014	Gaa juu chųų vintł'eiinkaii duuyeh chan chųų dahłįį neelii. Ąįį chųų vintł'eehihkaa ąįį vizhit han gwinjik chųų ninlaii k'it t'inchy'aa ts'ą' khit yaa gweheendaii.”
43004015	Ąįį tr'injaa jyaa nyąą, “Jii chųų t'avaiinyąą shintł'eiinkaii! Ąįį ji' chan chųų haał'yaa kwaa, akwat chan dząą chųų kaneehihdyaa kwaa.”
43004016	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Oo'an neehindii ts'ą' nakąį', oo'ee nąąhchįį.”
43004017	Ąįį tr'injaa jyaa yahnyąą, “Shakąį' kwaa t'oonchy'aa.” Jesus jyaa nyąą, “Nakąį' kwaa diinyąą dąį' łyaa t'iinyąą łee.
43004018	Nakąį' ch'ihłoanli' gwiinli', juk ąįį dinjii vaagwinch'įį nakąį' t'inchy'aa kwaa. Łi'didlii haa shaagwadhandak.”
43004019	Ąįį tr'injaa jyaa yahnyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii inlii łee.
43004020	Yeenii diilak nąįį jii ddhah kat Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deegihiił'e' gaa nakhwan Jews nąįį Jerusalem gwizhit Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deerahǫh'e' diinoohnyąą.”
43004021	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Jii ddhah kat akwat Jerusalem gwizhit dinjii nąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deegahah'aa kwaa nigweheedhaa ąįį łyaa t'igwinyąą.
43004022	Samaria gwich'in ǫhłįį ts'ą' juu vats'ą' khadagohjii gaakhwandaii kwaa. Diikhwan Jews gwich'in tr'iinlii ts'ą' juu vats'ą' khadigariinjii gaagwiindaii, Israel gwich'in nąįį k'iighai' neehohshii geh'an.
43004023	Gaa it'ee zhat nigwiighit, juk t'ee łyaa gwik'iinjiighit nąįį digiyinji' zhit łi'didlii haa Gwiti' ts'ą' khadigigiinjii. Ąįį gik'iinjiighit k'it t'inchy'aa t'ee Gwiti' keehi'ik t'inchy'aa.
43004024	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa t'ee Ch'anky'aa nilii, ts'ą' juu yats'ą' khadigiinjii t'ee digiyinji' zhit łi'didlii haa giits'ą' khadigiheejyaa goo'aii.”
43004025	Ąįį tr'injaa jyaa yahnyąą, “Messiah ąįį Christ oozhii ahaa ts'ą' gaashandaii nijin k'idik ji' jidii datthak eediinaagwahaandak vaashandaii.”
43004026	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Shįį nats'ą' ginkhii t'ee adan t'ihchy'aa.”
43004027	Izhit gwiizhit Jesus vitsyaa nąįį oo'ee neegiijil; tr'injaa ts'ą' ginkhii giiky'aanjik dąį' deegiheenjyaa gaa gaagiindaii kwaa. Gootee ch'ihłak gaa ąįį tr'injaa jyaa ahnyąą kwaa, “Jidii yiindhan?” akwat Jesus chan jii agaahkat kwaa, “Jaghaii jii tr'injaa vats'ą' ginkhii?”
43004028	Ąįįtł'ęę ąįį tr'injaa zhat dityaa akhoonyąą ts'ą' kwaiik'it gwits'eehoozhii ts'ą' zhat nąįį jyaa ahnyąą,
43004029	Aanaii ts'ą' jii dinjii yeenii deeshi'yaa datthak geeneeshaagwaandak nǫh'in. Jii dinjii lee Christ t'inchy'aa?
43004030	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee zhat datthak ąįį kwaiik'it chagahaajil ts'ą' Jesus ts'ą' gahaajil.
43004031	Izhit gwiizhit vitsyaa nąįį yaandeegwii'ąįį ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Geech'ǫąąhtan, gwintsal ch'in'aa!”
43004032	Gaa jyaa gavahnyąą, “Shih shi'įį ąįį vaakhwandaii kwaa.”
43004033	Ąįįts'ą' vitsyaa nąįį jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Juu shih yats'ą' hiłtsit t'inyąą li'?”
43004034	Jesus gavahnyąą, “Ąįį juu shihił'e' vik'it t'ooshi'ya' shoonyąą ąįį vigwitr'it t'agwahał'ya' gwizhrįh goo'aii ąįįt'ee shishii k'it t'inchy'aa.
43004035	Jii jyaa dohnyąą chy'aa ganoondaii, ‘Shree drin dǫǫ ts'ą' gwanzhįh khareheelyaa.’ Nakhwaagwahaldak, gwanzhįh deek'it gwinzii gooh'in; gwanzhįh khareheelyaa eenjit et'ee nizįį!
43004036	Ąįį juu gwanzhįh dehk'it gwitr'it t'agwah'in t'ee vagwarookwat, ąįįts'ą' zhit gwanzhįh khaihłan nilii t'ee khit gwarandaii eenjit khaihłan niyilii t'ii'in. Ąįįts'ą' zhit juu gwiiłshįį ts'ą' juu khaihłan niyilii haa nihłaa shoo geelyaa eenjit.
43004037	Jii t'ee łyaa t'igwinyąą, ‘Dinjii ch'ihłak gwąąhshii, dinjii ch'ihłak gwanzhįh khaihłan nilii.’
43004038	Gwanzhįh deek'it gwehkįį tr'agoh'in kwaa izhit gwanzhįh khaihłan nohohłyaa eenjit gwats'ą' nakhwahooł'e'. Ch'izhii nąįį zhat tr'agwah'ya' gaa nakhwan ąįį gwanzhįh nakhwats'an dhidlit.”
43004039	Izhit kwaiik'it gwizhit, Samaria gwich'in lęįį nąįį Jesus k'iinjigiighit, ąįį tr'injaa jii jyaa nyąą geh'an, “Yeenii deeshi'ya' datthak geeneeshaagwaandak.”
43004040	Ąįįts'ą' nijin Samaria gwich'in nąįį giits'ą' haajil dąį' diinaa dhiindii giiyahnyąą, ąįįts'ą' t'ee Jesus zhat drin neekwaii gavaa iindi'.
43004041	Deegavaiinyą' eenjit lęįį nąįį giik'iinjiighit dhidlit
43004042	ts'ą' ąįį tr'injaa jyaa agahnyąą, “Juk et'ee vik'injiriindhat, deediinaiinyą' eenjit kwaa gaa diikhwan chan diits'ą' ginkhe', ts'ą' jii nankat datthak dinjii neehahshii nilii et'ee vaagwiindaii.”
43004043	Drin neekwaii zhat naakhaa ąįįtł'ęę Jesus neehoozhii ts'ą' Galilee gwats'ą' haazhii.
43004044	Jii t'ee Jesus gwehkįį jyaa diinyą', “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nąįį daganahkat gwa'an gooveenjit yinjigihił'ee kwaa.”
43004045	Nijin Galilee k'idik dąį', giiyeenjit shoo dhidlit, Jerusalem gwizhit Passover gwiinli' dąį' ch'aga'aa gwiizhit deezhik datthak giiyąąh'ya' geh'an.
43004046	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus Galilee nahkat gwizhit Cana kwaiik'it gwits'eehoozhii, izhit t'ee chųų ąįį jak chų' iłtsąįį. Izhit gwats'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat vidinji' Capernaum kwaiik'it gwizhit iłts'ik.
43004047	Nijin ąįį dinjii Jesus, Judea nahkat gwats'an Galilee gwats'ą' haazhii gwinyąą gwiitth'ak dąį', yats'ą' haazhii ts'ą' Capernaum gwats'ą' shaa hinkhaii, shidinji' veenjit gwinzii neegwąhtsii yahnyąą, ąįį vidinji' t'ee niheedhaa nigwiindhat.
43004048	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa nakhwandah t'igwiizhik kwaa ji', nakhwatee ch'ihłak gaa duuyeh gwik'iinjiighit ilii!”
43004049	Ąįį nahkat gwats'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat jyaa yahnyąą, “Shigii niheedhaa gwehkįį shaa hinkhaii.”
43004050	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Oo'an neehindii, nidinji' gweheendaii t'inchy'aa!” Ąįį dinjii Jesus viginjik k'iinjindhat ts'ą' oo'an neehoozhii.
43004051	Dizheh gwats'ą' needyaa gwiizhit zhit juu yeetr'agwah'in nąįį gwandak haa giidąąjil, “Nichyaatsal gweheendaii t'oonchy'aa!”
43004052	Nijin nigwiindhat dąį' vidinji' veenjit gwinzii neegahoodlit eenjit gavoahkat, ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “K'ehdąį' drintł'an ęhdaa tr'igwiindhat dąį' ts'ik niindhaa di'įį kwaa dhidlit.”
43004053	Izhit nigwiindhat dąį' Jesus jii jyaa yahnyąą chy'aa ganaanjik, “Nidinji' gweheendaii t'inchy'aa.” Ąįį dinjii dizhehk'ąą haa datthak gwik'iinjigiighit gaadlit.
43004054	Jesus Judea gwats'an Galilee gwats'ą' haazhii dąį' jii gwitr'it gwihil'ee t'iizhik t'ee neekwat gwizhrįh t'iizhik t'avarahnyąą.
43005001	Jii ąįįtł'ęę Jerusalem gwizhit Israel nąįį ch'ara'aa googwahtsii izhit Jesus gwats'ą' haazhii.
43005002	Izhit divii deek'it goo'aii geeghaih chųų dhakaii goo'aii, ąįį eelin zheh gwatsal ch'ihłoanli' goodlii; Hebrew ginjik zhit Bethzatha goozhii.
43005003	Ąįį zheh gwadąįį gwizhit iłts'ik lęįį nąįį k'igilt'aii, vandee kwaa, neehidik kwaa akwat vatthąį' iłchįį nąįį. (Chųų hee tł'ak eenjit nagogwal'in;
43005004	neegwiidhak hee K'eegwaadhat vizheekat gwich'in chųų zhit neediidhak ts'ą' chųų atł'ak gwahtsii. Juu tr'ookit iłts'ik chųų atł'ak zhit gwizhyahkhat t'ee veenjit gwinzii neegwiilik.).
43005005	Izhit dinjii ch'ihłak dhidii, 38 years łąą iłts'ik.
43005006	Jesus zhat k'ilt'aii niyiił'in ts'ą' niighyuk iłts'ik yaandaii; ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Sheenjit gwinzii neegooli' niindhan?”
43005007	Ąįį dinjii jyaa nyąą, “Juu chųų zhit shahahchyaa gaashandaii kwaa; chųų atł'ak dąį' gwizhit hihshyaa gwik'eegwihdaii gwiizhit sharahtee dinjii gwizhyahkhat geh'an.”
43005008	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Ndak niindhat, nichyah oiinjii ts'ą' inkhaa.”
43005009	Izhit zhat ąįį dinjii veenjit gwinzii neekhwadlit gwagwahkhan dichyah oonjik ts'ą' tr'iinzhii. Izhit Neegwaazhii Drin goo'aii,
43005010	ts'ą' Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį ąįį dinjii shranaazhik jyaa agahnyąą, “Juk Neegwaazhii Drin t'oonchy'aa, dii-law zhit nichyah k'eehin'ak kwaa goo'aii gwinyąą.”
43005011	Jyaa gavahnyąą, “Ąįį dinjii sheenjit gwinzii neegwiłtsąįį jyaa shaiinyą', ‘Nichyah oiinjii ts'ą' inkhaa.’”
43005012	Jii giiyųąhkat, “Jii dinjii nichyah oiinjii ts'ą' inkhaa nahnyąą ąįį juu t'inchy'aa?”
43005013	Gaa ąįį dinjii shranaazhik ąįį juu t'inchy'aa yaandaii kwaa, tr'ihkhit dinjii gwanlii tee gwa'an gwiteiinzhii geh'an.
43005014	Ąįįtł'ęę gwandaa Jesus ąįį Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh gookwantee gwizhit yats'ą' tr'ineezhii ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Et'ee neenjit gwinzii akwat natr'agwaanduu akhagoiinyąą, ąįį akwaa ji' gwandaa nidivee gwiizųų gweheelyaa.”
43005015	Ąįį dinjii ąįį Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį ts'ą' haazhii ts'ą' Jesus oozhii ąįį yats'ą' tr'iinjik gavaagwaandak.
43005016	Izhit gwats'an t'ee Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį Jesus tr'ookhwaa giindhan, Neegwaazhii Drin dinjii shrineiinlik geh'an.
43005017	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Shiti' khit gwitr'it t'agwah'in, ąįįts'ą' shįį chan gwitr'it t'agwał'in gwat'aałchy'aa.”
43005018	Jii jyaa diinyą' gwats'an t'ee łyaa geenjit tr'ookhwaa giiyuunyąą. Neegwaazhii Drin gwa-law łeełnaii gwizhrįh geenjit nakwaa gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Shiti' nyąą ts'ą' jyąhts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vagwahtsii veegoo'aii k'it t'inchy'aa geh'an.
43005019	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą: “Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, Gwidinji' duuyeh adakhai' k'eegwiichy'aa t'ii'in, Viti' dee'in gwąąh'in izhit gwizhrįh gwik'it t'ii'in. Gwiti' dee'in, Gwidinji' chan gwik'it t'ii'in t'oonchy'aa.
43005020	Gwiti', Didinji' eet'iindhan ts'ą' dee'in datthak yats'ą' googwaahch'in. Jii dinjii shrineiinlik ąįį gwandaa yats'ą' googwahahchy'aa t'avarahnyąą ts'ą' geegwaroolii kwaa lęįį nakhwandaa t'ihee'yaa.
43005021	Gwiti', dinjii niindhat nąįį ineegwahdaii. Izhit gwik'it Gwidinji' chan juu niindhan nąįį gwandaii intł'ineehee'aa t'avarahnyąą.
43005022	Gwiti' adan zhrįh dinjii eenjit k'eegwaadhat kwaa t'inchy'aa. Gaa Didinji' chan dinjii datthak eenjit k'eegwaadhat eenjit gwiłtsąįį,
43005023	Gwiti' deegwiłtł'oo tr'ihił'ee gwik'it Gwidinji' chan tr'ahah'aa eenjit. Juu Gwidinji' hił'ee kwaa t'ee Gwiti' yihił'e' ąįį chan hił'ee kwaa t'agwarahnyąą.
43005024	“Jii t'ee łi'didlii nakhwaagwahaldak: Juu shiginjik diitth'ak ts'ą' juu shihił'e' k'injiighit ąįįt'ee gwandaii ndaanąą'ąį' kwaa hee'yaa. Ch'adąį' hee niindhat gwats'an neegwiindaii geh'an Ch'aroahkat Drin zhit ji' duuyeh an ilii.
43005025	Jii t'ee łi'didlii nakhwaagwahaldak: khaiinjii zhat nigwiindhat, ch'adąį' hee zhat nigwiindhat, zhit juu niindhat nąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' giheetth'ak ts'ą' juu yiitth'ak gweheendaii.
43005026	Gwiti' dinjii ineegwahdaii eenjit t'aih dii'įį, izhit gwik'it Vidinji' chan dinjii ineegwahahdaii eenjit t'aih intł'eiin'ąįį.
43005027	Ąįįts'ą' Vidinji' ąįį dinjii ts'ą' k'eegwahaadhat eenjit t'aih yintł'eiin'ąįį, Gwidinji' nilii geh'an.
43005028	Jii nakhwarahtee t'agǫǫnjyaa shrǫ'; zhat nigwiighit juu tth'ank'it gwizhit niindhat nąįį datthak nijin giiyeheetth'ak.
43005029	Nijin giiyiitth'ak ji' t'ee tth'ank'it khagiheedaa zhit juu gwinzii t'ee'ya' khaneegiheedaa ts'ą' neegwigweheendaii, zhit juu vigwitr'it gwiizųų nąįį chan, khaneegiheedaa ts'ą' goorahahkat.”
43005030	“Duuyeh shakhai' k'eegwiichy'aa t'ishi'in; Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa jyaa shahnyąą ji' gwizhrįh dinjii ts'ą' k'eegwahaldhat, shįį deegoochy'a' nihthan gwizhrįh gwik'it goo'aii kwaa gaa Shiti' shihił'e' ąįį deegoochy'a' niindhan izhit gwik'it goo'aii.
43005031	“Nijin ideenjit giihkhii dąį' zhit deihnyąą ąįį shats'an gwizhrįh t'igwinyąą kwaa.
43005032	Gaa zhit juu sheenjit ginkhii ts'ą' deeshahnyąą ąįį łi'didlii nilii gaashandaii.
43005033	Ąįį yihił'e' nąįį John ts'ą' nanoozhik ąįįts'ą' łi'didlii haa gavaa ginkhe'.
43005034	Dinjii andah t'iinyą' hįhjyaa gwat'aałchy'aa kwaa; neekhwazhii ji' eenjit gwizhrįh jyaa dihnyąą t'ihnyąą.
43005035	John adrii ts'ą' gach'ahdrii k'it t'inchy'aa, ch'ihłee gwizhrįh va'aadrii eet'ǫhkhya'.
43005036	Gaa jii deihnyąą datthak John deiinyą' andaa gwihil'ee t'ihnyąą. Jidii gwitr'it t'agwał'in t'ee Shiti' geegwitr'it t'agoh'ya' shoonyąą shi'in, izhit deeshi'in gǫǫh'ya'! Gwik'iighai' t'ee Gwiti' shihił'e' gwigweheechy'aa.
43005037	Ąįįts'ą' Gwiti' shihił'e', ąįį nakhwandaa sheeginkhe'. Gwehkįį dohtth'ak kwaa, vinin gaa nǫh'in kwaa,
43005038	nakhwadrii zhit viginjik dhoh'ąįį chan kwaa, juu hił'e' ąįį k'injuhkhit kwaa geh'an.
43005039	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat aakin gǫǫ'įį, gwandaii ndaanąą'ąį' kwaa gaayiitr'ahaatsyaa nohthan geenjit. Ąįįt'ee vizhit shįį sheegirinkhii t'igwinyąą!
43005040	Ąįį googaa gwandaii khwa'yaa eenjit shįį shats'ą' hohjyaa kwaa.
43005041	“Dinjii shihił'ee akwat shihił'ee kwaa nąįį adan goots'an t'oonchy'aa.
43005042	Gaa shįį łyaa nakhwaashandaii; nakhwadrii zhit Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa veenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan khwa'įį kwaa.
43005043	Shiti' voozhri' zhit dząą gwats'ą' hoiizhii gaa shik'iinjuhkhit kwaa; gaa ch'izhii dinjii doozhri' zhit nakhwats'ą' neiinzhii ąįį vik'injahohkhit.
43005044	Nihłeenjit khadhoo'ee łyaa geet'ohthan, gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ch'ihłak zhrįh nilii ąįį hil'ee di'įį ąįį geenjit ninjich'ǫhthat kwaa. Jii kwaii jyaa dohchy'aa gwiizhit nats'ąą gwik'iinjuhohkhit?
43005045	Gwiti' vandah gwiizųų t'ahǫǫ'ya' nakhwahaihjyaa nohthan kwaa. Moses, vit'injyaahchy'aa ąįį jyaa dihee'yaa.
43005046	Moses łyaa vik'injuhkhit ji', shįį chan shik'iinjuhkhit haa nihk'it t'oonchy'aa, deenyąą t'ee shįį sheeginkhii t'inyąą.
43005047	Gaa deenaadąį' Moses deenyąą ts'ą' gwadąąntł'oo ąįį gwik'iinjuhkhit kwaa akwat gwiizhit nats'ąą shiginjik k'injihohkhit?”
43006001	Jii ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus Galilee van ndųhts'ąįį neiinzhii (Tiberias van chan oozhii)
43006002	Gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa haa iłts'ik lęįį nąįį shrineiinlik giiyąąh'ya' geh'an lęįį nąįį giitąįį adaa.
43006003	Jesus taih kat ditsyaa nąįį haa naadii.
43006004	It'ee niighit kwaa Jews Passover ch'arehee'aa geenigwiighit.
43006005	Jesus zhit gwa'an gwąąh'in akhai' lęįį nąįį yats'ą' adaa nigwiił'in ts'ą' Philip jyaa ahnyąą, “Jii dinjii lęįį nąįį nijin shih gavaanchy'aa tr'ooheekwat?”
43006006	(Philip deeheenjyaa li' niindhan eenjit t'inyąą; adan ch'adąį' hee deehee'yaa gaandaii.)
43006007	Philip jyaa yahnyąą, “Jii dinjii nąįį nitsya' giin'al ji' gaa łųhchy'aa $200 gwandaa heelyaa.”
43006008	Vitsyaa ch'ihłak ąįį Simon Peter vachaa Andrew oozhii ąįį t'iiyahnyąą,
43006009	“Yaagha' gwitee gwa'an tsyaa tsal dhidii ąįį łųhchy'aa barley ch'ihłoanli' ts'ą' łuk neekwaii haa di'įį. Gaa jii kwaii duuyeh jii dinjii nąįį datthak eenjit tr'oonadhat!”
43006010	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Dinjii nąįį dook'įį gavahtsii,” (Zhat tł'oo kat goo'aii.) Ąįįts'ą' t'ee dinjii nąįį gaandii; dinjii 5000 andaa t'ąąnchy'aa zhat dilk'ii.
43006011	Jesus łųhchy'aa oonjik, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa mahsį' ahnyąą ts'ą' zhat dinjii dilk'ii nąįį teeyiłtsit. Łuk chan gwik'it t'inlik. Daanchy'aa tr'oo'aa giindhan gwik'it ch'igin'al.
43006012	Datthak gwintł'oo ch'igiin'al, ąįįtł'ęę ditsyaa nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Zhit jidii giiyeech'aa'al kwaii vit'ineegohjii, ch'ihłak gaa zhyaa an oolį' shrǫ'!”
43006013	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee giitineegwįłjik ts'ą', tyah ch'ihłoaatin ants'ą' neekwaii zhit deedigiiyiinlii, ąįįt'ee zhit łųhchy'aa ch'ihłoanli' ts'an reh.
43006014	Ąįį juu zhat dinjii dilk'ii nąįį Jesus gwitr'it gwintsii gwąąh'ya' nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nilii ts'ą' jii nankat gwats'ą' haazhii ąįį t'inchy'aa łee!”
43006015	Jesus et'ee gitr'ii'ee ji' gaa King giihahtsyaa eenjit giiyuuheendal ts'ą' gaandaii. Izhit geenjit neehoozhii ts'ą' adan zhrįh taih tee gwats'ą' haazhii.
43006016	Khaa nigwiighit gwiizhit vitsyaa nąįį ootthan van ts'ą' gahaajil
43006017	ts'ą' tr'ihchoo zhit giinjil ts'ą' van ndųhts'ąįį Capernaum kwaiik'it goo'aii gwats'ą' neegahoojil. Tǫǫ goodlit gaa tth'aii Jesus oo'ee nidii kwaa,
43006018	gwiizhit t'ee gwint'aii hiłtr'aii ts'ą' tit nitsii.
43006019	Vitsyaa nąįį tik akwat dǫǫ mile aanchy'aa niighit oondaa geekwaa gwiizhit Jesus chųų kat ahaa nigwigwiił'in, tr'ihchoo ts'ą' niighit kwaa niinzhii, łyaa datthak gihilghaa.
43006020	“Noojat kwaa, shįį t'ihchy'aa!” Jesus gavahnyąą
43006021	Jyaa diinyą' geh'an it'ee tr'ihchoo zhit giihaahchįį gwiizhit nijin gwats'ą' geedaa chy'aa zhat teeghaih nagwaanąįį.
43006022	Gęhdaa drin ąįį juu oonin Jesus vitsyaa nąįį haa haajil kwaa nąįį tr'ihchoo ch'ihłak tth'aii zhat dhitin łee gwik'igaanjik. Jesus ditsyaa nąįį haa haazhii kwaa gaagiindaii gaa ąįį tr'ihchoo zhat dhitin geh'an giiyehdan haajil łee gwik'igaanjik.
43006023	Gwiizhit Tiberias kwaiik'it gwachoo gwats'an tr'ihchoo lat zhat teedhidlit, geeghaih gwa'an Jesus łųhchy'aa eenjit K'eegwaadhat mahsį' ąįįnyą' ąįįtł'ęę gach'ąh'al izhit.
43006024	Nijin Jesus akwat vitsyaa nąįį haa zhat gwąąh'ya' kwaa dąį', tr'ihchoo zhit giinjil ts'ą' oonin Capernaum gwats'ą' giiyinkeegwahaah'yaa eenjit gwats'ą' gahaajil.
43006025	Nijin ąįį dinjii nąįį van ndųhts'ąįį Jesus agogwąh'ąįį dąį' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Geech'ǫąąhtan, nijin dąį' dząą k'eiindik?”
43006026	Jesus t'agavahnyąą, “Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak: Deenohthan gwik'it łųhchy'aa oo'al ąįį geh'an shinkeegoh'in gaa t'aih haa gwitr'it t'agwał'ya' gǫǫh'ya' geh'an nakwaa.
43006027	Shih khan iizųų ilii ąįį eenjit gwitr'it t'agoh'ya' shrǫ', shih khit vaa gwireheendaii ąįį gwandaa nizįį. Jii shih t'ee Gwidinji' nintł'eeyahahchaa. Gwiti' ąįį Gwidinji' deegwahtł'oo t'aih yintł'eiin'ąįį gwagwaakįį.”
43006028	Ąįįtł'ęę jii giiyųąhkat, “Jidii k'it t'inchy'aa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vigwitr'it t'igwehee'yaa t'agwaiinyąą?”
43006029	“Jii gwitr'it t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa t'akhwa'ya' nakhoonyaa, juu hił'e' ąįį vik'injuhkhit.” Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą.
43006030	Jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Gwarahąąh'yaa ts'ą' gwik'iinjireheeghit eenjit jidii t'aih diinandah t'ini'yaa? Deehini'yaa?
43006031	Yeenii diilak nąįį nangwinjir gwa'an łųhchy'aa giin'al, jii Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit geenjit jyaa digwinyąą: ‘Zheekat gwats'an ch'igihee'aa eenjit łųhchy'aa goots'ą' nahtsit.’”
43006032	“Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak!” Jesus gavahnyąą. “Jidii Moses nakhwantł'in'ąįį t'ee zheekat gwats'an łųhchy'aa t'inchy'aa kwaa. Shiti' ąįįt'ee łųhchy'aa zheekat gwats'an nakhwantł'in'ąįį t'igwii'in.
43006033	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa jidii łųhchy'aa gwantł'ahchak ąįį t'ee zheekat gwats'an nilii ts'ą' jii nankat gwandaii gwats'an ąhtsii.”
43006034	“K'eegwaadhat, jii łųhchy'aa khit geenjit diinantł'ahtsit,” giiyahnyąą.
43006035	“Ąįį łųhchy'aa vik'iighai' gwarandaii, ąįįt'ee shįį t'ihchy'aa,” Jesus gavahnyąą. “Juu shaa nilii nąįį duuyeh goozhit gwiłts'ik. Juu shik'iinjiighit nąįį duuyeh chųų dahłįį.
43006036	Shǫǫh'ya', nakhwaiinyą' gaa reh nihk'it gwik'iinjuhkhit kwaa.
43006037	Shiti' juu shantł'ahchįį ąįį nąįį shats'ą' heedaa. Juu shaa nilii nąįį duuyeh an gavaal'ee.
43006038	Zheekat gwats'an tr'iizhii ts'ą' jidii shi'yaa goo'aii sharahnyąą ąįį gwik'it t'ishi'yaa, shįį shakhai' t'ishi'in kwaa.
43006039	Juu shihił'e' t'ee jii kwaii t'ooshi'ya' shoonyąą: juu shantł'eegoovinlii nąįį gaatr'agwałjii shrǫ' shoonyąą, gaa Khaiinkǫǫ Drinzhit ndaanąą'ąį' ji', datthak gwandaii neegoohałtsyaa eenjit.
43006040	Shiti' jii kwaii gwinkeet'iindhan: Juu Gwidinji' k'injiighit ts'ą' giik'iinjiighit nąįį khit gwarandaii goots'an hałtsyaa. Khaiinkǫǫ Drin ndaanąą'ąį' ji' gwandaii neegoohałtsyaa.”
43006041	Israel gwich'in nąįį giiyeenjit gook'įį gwanlii, jii jyaa nyąą geh'an, “Ąįį łųhchy'aa vik'iighai' gwarandaii, ąįįt'ee shįį t'ihchy'aa.”
43006042	Izhit geh'an jyaa ginyąą, “Joseph vidinji' Jesus lee t'inchy'aa? Vahan, viti' haa gwiindaii t'inchy'aa adan t'inchy'aa ji', nats'ąą zheekat gwats'an ihshyaa nyąą t'inyąą?”
43006043	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Zhyaa gookhii kwaa!
43006044	Juu Shiti' shats'ą' yihił'ee nąįį ji' gwizhrįh shats'ą' heedaa; ts'ą' Khaiinkǫǫ Drin zhit ndaanąą'ąį' ji' gwandaii vats'an neehałtsyaa.
43006045	Yeenii Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nąįį jii dagogwąąntł'oo, ‘Dinjii datthak Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa googwahah'e'.’ Juu Shiti' diitth'ak ts'ą' yats'an googwaa'ee t'ee shaa nilii.
43006046	Gwiti' nah'ya' gwinyąą t'igwinyąą kwaa; juu Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an ahaa zhrįh Gwiti' nah'ya' t'oonchy'aa.
43006047	Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, juu gwik'iinjiighit di'įį t'ee khit gwarandaii hee'yaa.
43006048	Łųhchy'aa vik'iighai' gwarandaii t'ihchy'aa.
43006049	Yeenii nakhwalak nąįį nangwinjir gwa'an manna giin'al, gaa nigiindhat.
43006050	Gaa juu zheekat gwats'an łųhchy'aa a'aa t'ee khit gweheendaii.
43006051	Zheekat gwats'an łųhchy'aa gwandaii ąįį t'ihchy'aa. Juu yiin'al t'ee khit geenjit gweheendaii. Ąįį łųhchy'aa antł'eehałchaa t'ee shatthąį' t'inchy'aa. Jii nankat datthak gwantł'eehałchaa.”
43006052	“Jii gwigwiitth'ak dąį' geenjit Jews nąįį nihzheedagąąn'ee. Jii dinjii nats'ąą datthąį' diihah'aa t'inyąą?” ginyąą.
43006053	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą: “Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak: Gwidinji' vatthąį' in'aa kwaa ts'ą' vadaa ninįį kwaa ji' duuyeh gwarandaii ni'įį.
43006054	Juu shatthąį' a'aa ts'ą' shadaa dinįį t'ee khit gwarandaii hee'yaa, ąįįts'ą' Khaiinkǫǫ Drin zhit ndaanąą'ąį' ji' vineegwahałdaii.
43006055	Shatthąį' t'ee łyaa shih t'inchy'aa, shadaa t'ee łi'haa tr'iheenjyaa eenjit t'inchy'aa.
43006056	Juu shatthąį' a'aa ts'ą' shadaa dinįį t'ee shizhit gwandaii ts'ą' shįį chan vizhit gwįįhdaii.
43006057	Gwiti' khit gwandaii ąįįt'ee shihił'e' ąįįts'ą' veh'an gwįįhdaii. Izhit gwik'it, juu sha'aa t'ee shęh'an gweheendaii.
43006058	Izhit geh'an t'ee jii łųhchy'aa zheekat gwats'an t'inchy'aa; yeenii nakhwalak łųhchy'aa giin'al ts'ą' nigiindhat ąįį łųhchy'aa k'it t'inchy'aa t'arahnyąą kwaa. Jii łųhchy'aa ąįį juu yiin'al ji' khit gweheendaii.”
43006059	Capernaum kwaiik'it gwizhit Israel tr'igiinkhii zheh gwizhit Jesus jii eenjit geech'ǫąąhtan.
43006060	Vitsyaa lęįį nąįį jii datthak eenjit gwigwiitth'ak dąį' jyaa ginyąą, “Jii jidii eech'ǫąąhtan łyaa vagwantrii. Juu yuuhaahky'aa ts'ą' gwik'it t'ihee'yaa?”
43006061	Jesus deeginyąą giiyaagwaandak kwaa gaa jidii eenjit nihzheedagąąn'ee gavaandaii ts'ą' ąįį eenjit jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jii jyaa dihnyą' eenjit akhagohnyą' nohthan?
43006062	Ąįį ji', Gwidinji' gwehkįį nijin gwats'an tr'iinzhii gwits'eehoozhii nǫh'ya' ji' yu'?
43006063	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vanky'aa t'ee gwandaii gwats'an ąhtsii; gwatthąį' ąįį jyaa dagwąhtsii veegoo'aii kwaa. Jii ginjih eenakhwaagwaldak ąįįt'ee łyaa shroodiinyąą ts'ą' gwandaii nilii.
43006064	Googaa nakhwalat nąįį jii deihnyą' gwik'iinjiighit kwaa.” (Tr'ookit dąį' gwats'an Jesus juu gootee gwik'iinjiighit kwaa ts'ą' juu gwintł'eeyahahchyaa.)
43006065	Jii chan jyaanyąą, “Jii geh'an gwizhrįh jyaa nakhwaiinyą' duuyeh ch'ihłak gaa shats'ą' hahaii, Gwiti' jyąhts'ą' yeenjit gwiłtsąįį ji' gwizhrįh!”
43006066	Jii kwaii geh'an, vitsyaa lęįį nąįį akhagiiyuunyąą.
43006067	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus ditsyaa 12 nąįį t'ahnyąą, “Nakhwan chan gavaahohjyaa nohthan?”
43006068	Simon Peter jyaa yahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat, juu vats'ą' tr'iheedaa gǫ'? Gwandaii ndaanąą'ąį' kwaa gweheelyaa eenjit nan zhrįh ginjik ni'įį.
43006069	Ąįįts'ą' juk Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an Shroodiinyąą inlii naagwiindaii ts'ą' gwik'injiriighit.”
43006070	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “12 ǫhłįį ts'ą' gwitee tr'anakhwiilii, gaa nakhwatee ch'ihłak Ch'anky'aa Tr'aanduu nilii!”
43006071	(Simon Iscariot vigii eeginkhii t'inyąą. Judas t'ee Vitsyaa 12 nąįį tee dhidii gaa gwintł'eeyahahchyaa.)
43007001	Jii ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus Galilee nahkat datthak neehidik; Judea nahkat ąįį gwats'ą' neehidik gitr'ii'ee, Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį giiyuukhwaa giindhan geh'an.
43007002	Dinjii chan hee khaihłan niheedaa ts'ą' ąįį eenjit niighit kwaa Israel nąįį tr'ał zheh googwahahtsyaa nineegweedhat (Tabernacles googahnyąą).
43007003	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Jesus vachaa nąįį jyaa yahnyąą, “Dzaa gihłeehinkhaii ts'ą' Judea nahkat gwats'ą' hinkhaii, zhit deeni'in kwaii nitsyaa nąįį googwahąąh'yaa eenjit.
43007004	Ch'ihłak gwinzii shaagoondaii niindhan gwiizhit duuyeh dee'in nagwąąh'įį. Jyaa dini'in akwat jii nankat datthak naagweheendaii gwahtsii.”
43007005	(Vachaa nąįį gaa giik'iinjiighit kwaa).
43007006	Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą, “Tth'aii gwats'ą' hihshyaa eenjit gwinzii zhat shaa nigwiighit kwaa. Nakhwan ąįį nijin ji' hohjyaa gaa gwinzii.
43007007	Jii nankat nąįį juu datthak sheet'iindhan kwaa gaa gootr'agwaanduu gwanlii goovaihnyąą geh'an, nakhwan ąįį jyaa nakhwagahthan kwaa.
43007008	Nijin dinjii khaihłan niinjil gwats'ą' hohjyaa ts'ą' ch'oh'aa. Shįį ąįį zhat nihihshyaa kwaa. Gwats'ą' hihshyaa eenjit tth'aii gwinzii zhat shaa nigwiighit kwaa.”
43007009	Jyaa diinyą' ąįįtł'ęę t'ee adan ąįį Galilee dhidii.
43007010	Vachaa nąįį dinjii khaihłan niinjil gwats'ą' gahaajil ąįįtł'ęę Jesus gweentak gootąįį haazhii.
43007011	Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį dinjii khaihłan niinjil tee giiyinkeegwaah'in, “Adaajii t'inchy'aa?” giiyahnyąą.
43007012	Datthak dinjii khaihłan niinjil tee dagaadzit ts'ą' giiyeeginkhii. Goolat nąįį, “Dinjii nizįį t'inchy'aa giiyahnyąą!” Goolat nąįį, “Akwaa, dinjii nan'ee t'inchy'aa!” giiyahnyąą.
43007013	Gaa ch'ihłak gaa gwandah giiyeeginkhii kwaa, Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį agąąnjat geh'an.
43007014	Drin dǫǫ gwizhit datthak ch'aga'aa ndaanagąąhjik gwiizhit Jesus Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoh gwizhit nihdeiinzhii ts'ą' geech'ǫąąhtan. (Drin nihk'iidǫǫ gwizhit datthak dinjii ch'aga'aa)
43007015	Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį eenjit geegagoolii kwaa t'inyąą ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Jii dinjii gooltin kwaa gwiizhit deegwiłtsii gaandaii t'inyąą?”
43007016	Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą, “Jidii eech'oaałtan shats'an t'igwinyąą kwaa gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa shihił'e' vats'an t'ihnyąą.
43007017	Juu Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa doo'ya' yuunyąą gwik'it t'inchy'aa ąįį t'ee jidii eech'oaałtan ąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an t'igwii'in akwat shats'an t'igwii'in ji' eenjit gaaheendaii.
43007018	Juu deeyiindhan zhrįh gwik'it geech'ǫąąhtan t'ee zhyaa sharahoh'e' niindhan, juu yihił'e' ąįį eenjit hil'ee niindhan ąįįt'ee łi'didlii nilii ts'ą' oots'it t'inyąą kwaa.
43007019	Deenaadąį' Moses va-law nakhwantł'in'ąįį, t'oonchy'aa. Nakhwatee ch'ihłak gaa Law k'eegwahthat kwaa. Jaghaii geenjit shęhdaa tr'agǫh'aa geetr'agoh'in?”
43007020	Izhit zhat dinjii lęįį nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Nizhit ch'anky'aa iizųų dhidii! Juu nęhdaa tr'igwihee'aa gwik'eegwandaii t'igwii'in?”
43007021	Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą. “Gwitr'it gwinzii ch'ihłak t'agwał'ya' ts'ą' datthak nakhwandaa t'igwiizhik.
43007022	Moses nakhwagii chyaatsal vadhah gihłeehoht'ii nakhwaihnyąą geh'an Neegwaazhii Drin chyaatsal vadhah gihłeehoht'ii, (Moses ąįį nakwaa gaa yeenii nakhwalak nąįį tr'ookit khagwigwiin'ąįį.)
43007023	Moses va-law łeehaanaii kwaa eenjit chyaatsal Neegwaazhii Drin vadhah gihłeerahaht'ii goo'aii ji' jaghaii Neegwaazhii Drin dinjii ts'ą' tr'iinjik eenjit shats'ą' nakhwak'įį gwanlii?
43007024	Dinjii gwiizųų t'ii'in dohnyą' shrǫ', nijin gwinzii t'ii'in dąį', K'eegwaadhat jyaa dagoo'ya' shrǫ' diinoohnyąą!”
43007025	Jerusalem gwich'in lat nąįį jyaa diginyąą, “Jii dinjii lee giihaahkhwaa geegwitr'it t'agoogwah'in chy'aa?
43007026	Dzaa gooh'in! Juu nąįį datthak andah ginkhii googaa ch'ihłak gaa k'eegwiichy'aa t'inyąą kwaa. Kįh dilk'ii nąįį Christ t'inchy'aa giiyaandaii t'igii'in gwich'in.
43007027	Gaa Christ nijin vigwiilkįį ji' izhit ch'ihłak gaa nijin gwats'an t'inchy'aa giiyaaheendaii kwaa. Ąįįts'ą' diikhwan ąįį nijin gwats'an t'inchy'aa vaagwiindaii.”
43007028	Jesus Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoh gwizhit gwint'aii ginkhii ts'ą' jyaanyąą, “Shaakhwandaii ts'ą' nijin gwats'an ihshyaa gaakhwandaii? Gaa shakhai' dząą gwats'ą' hoiizhii kwaa, juu dząą gwats'ą' shihił'e' t'ee łi'didlii nilii. Nan ąįį vaanandaii kwaa.
43007029	Gaa shįį ąįį vaashandaii, vats'an tr'iizhii ts'ą' shihił'e'.”
43007030	Ąįįts'ą' zheegwaazhrąįį nihdeegiihahchįį gwik'eegogwandaii, gaa ch'ihłak yakat naanjik kwaa, tth'aii vidrin nigwiighit kwaa geh'an.
43007031	Gaa zhat lęįį nąįį giik'iinjiighit ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą. “Nijin Christ vineegwiilkįį ji', jii dinjii dee'ya' ąįį andaa ts'ą' gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa t'ihee'yaa?”
43007032	Pharisee khaihkwaii nąįį dinjii tee gwa'an dagaadzit Jesus ts'ą' eegiginkhii googiitth'ak, ąįįts'ą' geedan chan ts'ą' giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį haa zheegwaazhrąįį nigiihahchyaa eenjit, gwak'ąąhtii nąįį giiyinkeehił'e'.
43007033	Jesus jyaa nyąą, “Tth'aii gwintsal gwizhrįh nakwaa t'ihihchy'aa, ąįįtł'ęę juu nakhwats'ą' shihił'e' ąįį vats'ą' neehihdyaa,
43007034	Shįį shinkeegoh'in gaa duuyeh shagoh'ąįį, nijuk neehidyaa duuyeh gwats'ą' hohjyaa geh'an.”
43007035	Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Nijuk gwats'ą' heekhaa ts'ą' khyų' vagwarahah'aa t'inyąą? Greek kwaiik'it Jews nąįį tee gwats'ą' hahaii ts'ą' geech'oohąąhchyaa lee t'inyąą?
43007036	Jyaa goovahnyąą, ‘Shikeegohǫǫh'yaa gaa duuyeh shagoh'ąįį, ts'ą' nijuk hihdyaa duuyeh gooh'in.’ Deiinyąą t'inyąą?”
43007037	Ąįį ch'ara'aa drin ndaanąą'ąį' łyaa ch'andaa gwihil'ee. Izhit drin Jesus ndak nidhikhin ts'ą' gwint'aii jyaanyąą. “Juu chųų dahłįį shats'ą' hahaii ts'ą' chųų dinįį.
43007038	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat jyaa digwinyąą, ‘Juu shik'iinjiighit, vidrii zhit gwats'an chųų gwandaii t'iheenjyaa.’”
43007039	Juu yik'injiighit nąįį eenjit Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą ts'an gahaa'yaa eenjit Jesus geeginkhii t'inyąą. Izhit zhat dąį' ąįį Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą tth'aii goontł'eerah'ąįį kwaa, Jesus tth'aii hee niighit kwaa ts'ą' ch'eegwąhndit ilii kwaa geh'an.
43007040	Dinjii tee lęįį nąįį jii jyaa nyąą giiyiitth'ak dąį' jyaa ginyąą, “Jii dinjii Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii t'inchy'aa łee!”
43007041	Ch'izhii nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Christ t'inchy'aa łee?” Gaa ch'izhii nąįį chan jyaa ginyąą, “Christ duuyeh Galilee gwats'an ahaa t'inchy'aa!
43007042	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat, dinjii yeenii King David ts'an deedhaa ts'ą' Bethlehem gwizhit vigweheelyaa ąįįt'ee Christ, dinjii neehahshii heelyaa gwinyąą, ąįį kwaiik'it t'ee David gwiinch'į'.
43007043	Nihłitee giiyeenjit nihzheedagąąn'ee.
43007044	Goolat nąįį zheegwaazhrąįį narohchyaa giiyuunyąą, ch'ihłak gaa giikat naanjik kwaa.”
43007045	Ąįį gwiky'aahtii nąįį, giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį chan ts'ą' Pharisee khaihkwaii nąįį haa ts'eegahoojil, ąįį nąįį googaahkat, “Jaghaii adahaa oo'ee noohchįį kwaa?”
43007046	Ąįį gwiky'aahtii nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Jii dinjii łyaa vik'it t'igwinyąą kwaa t'arahnyąą!”
43007047	“Nakhwan chan neenakhwaiin'ak lee t'ohnyąą,” Pharisee khaihkwaii nąįį jii googaahkat.
43007048	“Diitee gwa'an nik'ee diikhaihkwaii akwat Pharisee khaihkwaii ch'ihłak yik'injiighit haakhwandaii?
43007049	Juk dząą dinjii nąįį Moses va-law haagiindaii kwaa, ąįį geh'an t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa doo'ya' gavoonyąą gwik'it t'iginchy'aa kwaa!”
43007050	Nicodemus t'ee Pharisee ch'ihłak nilii, ąįįt'ee gwehkįį dąį' Jesus eenoozhii ts'ą' nah'ya'. Nicodemus jyaa gavahnyąą,
43007051	“Dii-law zhit duuyeh dinjii tr'ahaahkhwaa gwats'ą' dee'ya' eenjit vęhdaa tr'agwara'aii goo'aii gwinyąą.”
43007052	Ąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Nan chan Galilee gwats'an inkhaa? Dęhtły'aa Choh kat vagwan'ee ąįį ji' t'ee Galilee gwats'an Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii ahaa kwaa gwiky'aahaandal.”
43007053	Ąįįtł'ęę t'ee juu nąįį datthak digizheh gwits'eegahoojil.
43008001	Gaa Jesus ąįį Taih Vakat Olives Nahshii ts'ą' haazhii.
43008002	Gęhdaa vanh dąį' hee Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoh gwits'eehoozhii. Lęįį nąįį yeelin niinjil ts'ą' dhidii ts'ą' geegoovąąhtan.
43008003	Law eech'ǫąąhtan nąįį chan ts'ą' Pharisee nąįį haa dinjii va'at ch'izhii dinjii haa dhichįį ik'igaanjik ąįį nihdeegąąhchįį ts'ą' juu nąįį datthak ts'ą' nigiiyąąhchįį.
43008004	“Geech'ǫąąhtan,” Jesus agahnyąą, “Jii tr'injaa ch'izhii dinjii haa dhichįį vik'igwaanjik.
43008005	Moses dii-law zhit tr'injaa jyaa dii'in t'ee kii haa tr'ahaahkhwaa goo'aii nyąą. Akwat, geenjit deehiinjyaa?”
43008006	Goodhaii nideegiihaatthal eenjit jyaa giiyahnyąą t'iginyąą, gwik'it t'iizhik giiyahaanjyaa eenjit. Gaa Jesus ąįį khatroogwiintthaii ts'ą' nankat danleetth'ak haa ch'adąąntł'oo.
43008007	Zhat nigiilzhii ts'ą' gwintł'oo giiyųąhkat, ndak ninehjin ts'ą' jyaa goovahnyąą, “Nakhwatee juu vatr'agwaanduu gwakwaa, ąįį jii tr'injaa adan tr'ookit kii haa yatthat.”
43008008	Chan hee khatroogwiintthaii ts'ą' nankat ch'adąąntł'oo.
43008009	Nijin jii gwigwiitth'ak dąį', gootee googwąąnchy'aa ts'ą' gihłeegihii'oo, juu vaghaii lęįį nąįį tr'ookit. Jesus zhrįh zhat dhidii, ąįį tr'injaa chan zhat nadhat.
43008010	Ndak ninehjin ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Tr'injaa nijin neegahoojil? Nik'ee gwintł'ee nahahchyaa ch'ihłak dząą dhidii?”
43008011	“Shik'eegwaadhat datthak gihłeegahoojil,” ąįį tr'injaa nyąą. “Akwat, shįį chan duuyeh narahaahkhwaa geenjit gwintł'ee nahałchįį t'oonchy'aa, oo'an neehiindii ts'ą' chan natr'agwaanduu neegooli' shrǫ'!” Jesus yahnyąą.
43008012	Nijin chan hee Jesus goots'ą' neegeedi', “Jii nankat gwach'aadrii ihłii. Juu shaa ahaa t'ee gwandaii aadrii hee'yaa ts'ą' chan duuyeh tǫǫ gwizhit ahaa.”
43008013	Ąįį Pharisee khaihkwaii nąįį jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Et'ee nahzhrįį ideenjit ginkhii akwat deiinyąą datthak zhyaa t'iinyąą.”
43008014	“Nakwaa!” Jesus gavahnyąą, “Shahzhrįh ideenjit giihkhii ji' gaa deihnyąą datthak łi'didlii nilii t'inchy'aa, nijin gwats'an ihshyaa akwat nijin gwits'eehihdyaa gaashandaii geh'an. Nakhwan ąįį nijin gwats'an tr'iizhii akwat nijin neehihdyaa gaakhwandaii kwaa.
43008015	Dinjii vidrii zhit doonchy'aa gaakhwandaii kwaa gwiizhit jyaanchy'aa dohnyąą, shįį ąįį duuyeh dinjii agwarahahshįį eenjit gwantł'ałchįį.
43008016	Gaa jyaa dihiinjyaa ji', łi'didlii haa t'ihihjyaa, shįį zhrįh jyąhts'ą' sheegoo'aii kwaa, Gwiti' shihił'e' chan shaa t'inchy'aa.
43008017	Nakhwa-law zhit gwadanakhwatł'oo, nijin vandah t'igwiizhik neekwaii nąįį łi'didlii t'igwinyąą ginyąą dąį' gwizhrįh łi'didlii nilii.
43008018	Ideenjit giihkhii ąįįts'ą' Shiti' shihił'e' chan sheenjit ginkhii.”
43008019	“Niti' adaajii?” giiyahnyąą. “Shaakhwandaii kwaa ts'ą' Shiti' chan vaakhwandaii kwaa, shaakhwandaii ji' Shiti' chan vaakhwahandaii goo'aii t'oonchy'aa.” Jesus gavahnyąą.
43008020	Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoh gwizhit jii kwaii jyaa nyąą, ąįį nijin gwizhit gwintł'eegaandak goo'aii gwizhit. Ąįįts'ą' t'ee ch'ihłak gaa zheegwaazhrąįį niyąąhchįį kwaa, tth'aii zhat veegoo'aii kwaa geh'an.
43008021	Jesus chan hee jyaa dagoovahnyąą, “Hihshyaa t'oonchy'aa; shikeegohǫǫh'yaa gaa nakhwatr'agwaanduu zhit nahohthaa nijuk hihshyaa izhit duuyeh gwats'ą' hohjyaa.”
43008022	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Israel gwakhaihkwaii nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Nijin gwats'ą' hihshyaa ąįį duuyeh gwats'ą' hohjyaa nyąą akwat adahaaghwaa lee t'inyąą?”
43008023	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Yeezhak gwats'an ohdaa gaa shįį ąįį yeedak gwats'an ihshyaa. Dzaa nankat gwats'an tr'oojil gaa shįį ąįį nankat gwats'an ihshyaa kwaa.
43008024	Ąįį geh'an t'ee nakhwatr'agwaanduu zhit nahohthaa nakhwaihnyąą. ‘Juu Ihłii Ąįį Ihłii.’ Gwik'injuhkhit kwaa ji' t'ee ąįį geh'an nakhwatr'agwaanduu zhit nahohthaa.”
43008025	“Juu inlii?” giiyahnyąą? Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Juu ihłii tr'ookit dąį' gwats'an nakhwaihnyąą ąįį ihłii t'oonchy'aa.
43008026	Deekhwa'ya' eenjit gwintł'ee nakhwahałchyaa, gaa juu shihił'e' ąįį Łi'didlii nilii, ąįįts'ą' jidii vats'an gwiihtth'ak ąįį zhrįh jii nankat eegwahaaldak t'ihnyąą.”
43008027	Gwiti' eeginkhii t'inyąą giiyaandaii kwaa.
43008028	Ts'ą' t'ee Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Nijin Gwidinji' ndak gahoohchįį t'ee ‘Juu Ihłii Ąįį Ihłii!’ gaakhwahandaii, izhit t'ee shakhai' t'ihnyąą kwaa ts'ą' Gwiti' jidii geeshoołtin ąįį gwaałtan t'ihnyąą gaakhwahandaii.
43008029	Juu shihił'e' ąįį shaa nilii, akhashoonyąą kwaa, doo'ya' shoonyąą gwik'it t'ishi'in geh'an.”
43008030	Lęįį nąįį Jesus deiinyą' giik'injiighit.
43008031	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee juu gootee giik'iinjiighit nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Jii geenakhwaałtan kwaii gwik'eegǫhthat ji', łyaa shitsyaa ǫhłįį,
43008032	łi'didlii haakhwahandaii, ts'ą' gadanakhwahahchyaa.”
43008033	“Abraham vats'an direedhaa, ąįįts'ą' ch'ihłak gaa ts'an tr'iinli' kwaa. Deiinyąą t'iinyąą, ‘Gadanakhwahałchyaa,’ diinyąą dąį'?” giiyahnyąą.
43008034	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Łi'didlii eenakhwaagwahaldak: juu datr'agwaanduu gwahtsii t'ee tr'aanduu goots'ą' k'eegwaadhat k'it t'oonchy'aa.
43008035	Ąįį juu slave nilii nąįį digizheh k'ąą gwizhit dagalak nąįį tee gwats'an giheelyaa kwaa gaa Gwidinji' ąįį khit zhat gwats'an heelyaa.
43008036	Gwidinji' gadanakhwaahchįį ji', t'ee łyaa khit geenjit gadahohdaa.
43008037	Abraham ts'an dohthaa gaashandaii, ąįį googaa shęhdaa tr'agahoh'aa geetr'agoh'in, jidii geenakhwaałtan gwik'iinjuhkhit kwaa geh'an.
43008038	Jidii Shiti' shats'ą' gwigweełch'in ąįį geenakhwaagwaldak, gaa nakhwan ąįį nakhwati' deenakhwahnyąą ąįį gwizhrįh gwik'eegǫhthat.”
43008039	“Diilak t'ee Abraham t'inchy'aa,” giiyahnyąą. “Abraham vats'an dohthaa ji', nakhwan chan vigwitr'it t'agahoh'yaa.
43008040	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an łi'didlii diitth'ak ąįį geenakhwaagwaldak gwizhrįh t'ishi'ya'. Ąįį googaa shęhdaa tr'agahoh'aa geetr'agoh'in. Abraham jyaa dee'ya' kwaa t'oonchy'aa!
43008041	Nakhwati' dee'ya' ąįį vik'it t'akhwa'in,” Jesus gavahnyąą. “Kwaiitak-gii tr'inlii kwaa, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa zhrįh diiti', diikhwan zhrįh vidinji' łi'didlii tr'iinlii,” ginyąą.
43008042	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa nakhwati' nilii ji', sheet'ahoohkhyaa, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an ihshyaa ts'ą' juk dząą dhidii geh'an. Shakhai' dząą gwats'ą' hoiizhii kwaa gaa dząą gwats'ą' shihił'e'.
43008043	Jaghaii deiinyąą t'iihnyąą datthak gaakhwandaii kwaa? Deiinyąą t'ihnyąą ąįį goohtth'ak nohthan kwaa geh'an t'oonchy'aa.
43008044	Nakhwati' Ch'anky'aa Tr'aanduu vigii ǫhłįį ts'ą' nakhwati' nilii ts'ą' doo'ya' nakhoonyaa gwik'it t'akhwa'in. Tr'ookit dąį' gwats'an dinjii aghan nilii. Ch'ihłok gaa łi'didlii nilii kwaa, łi'didlii vizhit kwaa geh'an. Oots'it zhrįh gwizhit nilii geh'an tr'oots'it gwiti' nilii.
43008045	Łi'didlii eegiihkhii geh'an shik'injuhkhit kwaa.
43008046	Nakhwatee ch'ihłak nik'ee vandah shatr'agwaanduu gwałtsii shąąh'ya'? Łi'didlii eegiihkhii t'ihnyąą ji' jaghaii shik'injuhkhit kwaa?
43008047	Juu Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an ahaa t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa viginjik oołk'įį. Nakhwan ąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an ohdaa kwaa, ąįį geh'an ch'oodǫǫhk'įį kwaa t'oonchy'aa.”
43008048	Israel nąįį Jesus jyaa gahnyąą, “Samaria gwich'in inlii ts'ą' nizhit ch'anky'aa iizųų dhidii ąįį łyaa lee t'igwinyąą?”
43008049	“Shizhit ch'anky'aa iizųų kwaa t'oonchy'aa,” Jesus gavahnyąą, “Shiti' hooł'e', gaa nakhwan ąįį shahooh'ee kwaa.
43008050	Sharahoh'e' yiihthan kwaa, gaa ch'ihłak zhrįh sharahoh'e' yiindhan, ts'ą' adan ąįį jidii gwiizųų akwat gwinzii haa heenjyaa.
43008051	Jii t'ee łyaa łi'didlii. Juu shik'eegwahthat t'ee duuyeh niighit.”
43008052	Israel nąįį jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Et'ee nizhit ch'anky'aa iizųų dhidii naagwiindaii! Abraham chan niindhat, yeenii Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nąįį chan niinjik, googaa gwiizhit jyaa diinyąą, ‘Juu shik'eegwahthat t'ee duuyeh niighit.’
43008053	Diilak Abraham chan ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nąįį niinjik. Abraham vandaa t'agwahtsii sheegoo'aii diinyąą lee t'iinyąą? Jidii ihłii niindhan?”
43008054	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Ideenjit zhrįh yinjiihooh'ee ji', ąįį yeenjihooh'ee giilį' nilii. Shiti' sheeyinjihił'ee. Ąįįt'ee nakhwan chan Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vohnyąą reh.
43008055	Ch'ihłok gaa vaakhwandaii kwaa gaa shįį ąįį gwinzii vaashandaii. Vaashandaii kwaa dihnyąą ji' t'ee nakhwak'it oohihts'it. Gaa vaashandaii ts'ą' viginjik k'eegwałthat.
43008056	Nakhwalak Abraham nijin drin shahąąh'yaa ji' geenjit shoo nilii, ch'adąį' gwąąh'ya' ts'ą' shoo dhidlit.”
43008057	Jews nąįį jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Tth'aii googaa 50 years old inlii kwaa gwiizhit Abraham nah'ya'?”
43008058	“Łi'didlii haa giihkhii! Abraham vehkii dąį' gwats'an Shįį Ihłii!” Jesus gavahnyąą
43008059	Kii giiyeenjit teegwįłjik gaa Jesus gweentak Kharigidiinjii Zhee Gwachoh cheehoozhii.
43009001	Jesus ahaa gwiizhit dinjii vandee kwaa ts'ą' vagoodlit niił'in.
43009002	Vitsyaa nąįį giiyuahkat, “Geech'ǫąąhtan, vandee kwaa ts'ą' vagoodlit ąįį juu vatr'agwaanduu t'oonchy'aa? Adan vats'an akwat viyehghan nąįį?”
43009003	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Vandee kwaa ąįį adan vatr'agwaanduu akwat viiyehghan gootr'agwaanduu gwadrąįį t'oonchy'aa kwaa. Gaa jii dinjii vandee kwaa ąįį, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vat'aii gwizhrįh eegweheechy'aa eenjit vaagweech'in neegahoodlit.
