43009004	Tth'aii drin gwanlii gwiizhit juu shihił'e' ąįį nihk'it vigwitr'it t'agwarahah'yaa gwizhrįh goo'aii. Et'ee tǫǫ gweheelyaa ts'ą' duuyeh tǫǫ gwitr'it t'agwarah'in.
43009005	Dzaa nankat dhiidii gwiizhit, jii nankat eenjit aadrii ihłii.”
43009006	Jii jyaa diinyą' ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus nankat haazhree ts'ą' łųh niłtraa ąįį dinjii vaagweech'in kwaa andee kat giinjik ts'ą'
43009007	jyaa yahnyąą, “Oo'an Siloam teełtin gwats'ą' hinkhaii zhat chųų haa neech'aanjii.” Ąįįts'ą' ąįį dinjii zhat gwats'ą' haazhii ts'ą' neech'aanjik ts'ą' vaagweech'in ts'ą' k'inidik.
43009008	Ąįį yeeghaii gwich'įį nąįį chan ts'ą' juu khit ch'oodiikwat yąąh'in nąįį ch'agoahkat, “Jii dinjii lee dhidii ts'ą' ch'oodiikwat chy'aa?” giiyahnyąą.
43009009	Goolat nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Adan t'inchy'aa,” goolat nąįį chan jyaa ginyąą “Adan t'inchy'aa kwaa, gaa yigwich'in.” Ąįį dinjii jyaa gavahnyąą “Ąįį dinjii t'ee shįį t'ihchy'aa.”
43009010	“Nats'ąą naagweech'in needhindlit?” giiyahnyąą.
43009011	“Dinjii Jesus oaazhii ąįį nankat haazhree ts'ą' łųh niłtraa ąįį shandee kat giinjik ts'ą' jyaa shahnyąą, ‘Oo'an Siloam teełtin gwats'ą' hinkhaii zhat chųų haa neech'aanjii.’ Zhat gwats'ą' hoiizhii neech'aaljik ts'ą' shaa gweech'in needhiidlit,” goovahnyąą.
43009012	“Adaajii?” giiyahnyąą. “Adaajii vaashandaii kwaa,” goovahnyąą.
43009013	Ąįįtł'ęę t'ee ąįį dinjii vandee kwaa iinli' chy'aa Pharisee nąįį ts'ą' giihiłchįį.
43009014	Nijin ąįį Jesus dinjii andee łųh t'iinlik dąį' vaagweech'in neeyiłtsąįį drin Neegwaazhii Drin gwanlii.
43009015	Pharisee nąįį ąįį dinjii nats'ąą vaagweech'in neekhwadlit eenjit giiyųąhkat. Goovaagwaandak, “Shandee łųh t'inlik ąįįtł'ęę neech'aaljik ts'ą' juk shaagweech'in,” nyąą.
43009016	Pharisee lat nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Jii dinjii juu t'iizhik Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an t'inchy'aa kwaa, Neegwaazhii Drin jyaa dihee'yaa kwaa goo'aii ąįį gwik'eegwahthat kwaa geh'an.” Goolat nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Nats'ąą dinjii vatr'agwaanduu gwanlii ąįį gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa t'ihee'yaa?” ąįįts'ą' t'ee datthak geenjit nihzheedagąąn'ee.
43009017	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Pharisee nąįį chan hee giiyųąhkat, “Naagweech'in neegwiłtsąįį akwat veenjit deehiinjyaa?” “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nilii t'inchy'aa,” jyaa nyąą.
43009018	-
43009019	Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį ąįį dinjii vandee kwaa iinli' ąįįtł'ęę vaagweech'in neekhwadlit ąįį gwik'iinjigiighit gitr'igii'ee, ąįįts'ą' t'ee giiyehghan nąįį jii oahkat, “Jii lee nigii tsyaa? Vandee kwaa ts'ą' vagoodlit vohnyąą gwiizhit jaghaii juk vaagweech'in gǫ'?”
43009020	Ąįį viyehghan jyaa ginyąą, “Diigii t'inchy'aa ts'ą' vandee kwaa ts'ą' vagoodlit vaagwiindaii.
43009021	Gaa jaghaii juk vaagweech'in neekhwadlit akwat juu vaagweech'in neeyiłtsąįį vaagwiindaii kwaa. Oohkat, vaghaii lęįį t'inchy'aa ts'ą' adakhai' nakhwaagwaandak!”
43009022	Ąįį viyehghan nąįį Israel kįh dilk'ii nąįį agąąnjat geh'an jyaa diginyąą t'iginyąą, ąįį juu Jesus ąįį Christ t'inchy'aa nyąą t'ee Israel tr'igiinkhii zheh cheerahahchyaa ch'adąį' ginyą' geh'an.
43009023	Izhit geh'an t'ee “Vaghaii lęįį t'inchy'aa ts'ą' oohkat!” googahnyąą.
43009024	Chan hee ąįį dinjii vandee kwaa iinli' chy'aa aanaii giiyahnyąą ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vandah łi'didlii haa geegwandak! Jii dinjii vatr'agwaanduu gwanlii ts'ą' vaagwiindaii.”
43009025	“Vatr'agwaanduu gwanlii akwat vatr'agwaanduu gwakwaa ji' gaa vaashandaii kwaa t'inchy'aa,” ąįį dinjii nyąą. “Ch'ihłak gwizhrįh gaashandaii, shandee kwaa gwiili' gaa juk shaagweech'in neegakhwadlit.”
43009026	“Deeniinlik? Nats'ąą naagweech'in neegwiłtsąįį?” giiyųąhkat.
43009027	“Ch'adąį' nakhwaagwaldak t'oonchy'aa, gaa khų' ch'oodǫǫhk'įį. Jaghaii chan hee geenakhwaagwaldak yuuhthan? Nakhwan chan vitsyaa ǫhłį' nohthan?” gavahnyąą
43009028	Ąįįts'ą' shruk haa giits'ą' khaginkhee, “Ąįį dinjii vitsyaa iinlii; diikhwan ąįį vitsyaa tr'iinlii.
43009029	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa, Moses ts'ą' giinkhe' gaagwiindaii; ąįį dinjii t'avaiinyąą, nijin gwats'an tr'iinzhii gaa vaagwiindaii kwaa t'inchy'aa!”
43009030	Ąįį dinjii jyaa gavahnyąą, “Łyaa shandaa t'ohnyąą, nijin gwats'an tr'iinzhii vaakhwandaii kwaa gaa shaa gweech'in neegwiłtsąįį!
43009031	Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vatr'agwaanduu gwanlii nąįį oołk'įį kwaa vaagwiindaii. Dinjii nikiigwah'ee ts'ą' doo'ya' gavoonyąą gwik'it t'inchy'aa nąįį oołk'įį vaagwiindaii.
43009032	Jii nan goodlit dąį' gwats'an dinjii ch'izhii dinjii haagweech'in neegwiłtsąįį gwinyąą gwiriitth'ak kwaa.
43009033	Jii dinjii Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an t'inchy'aa kwaa ji' duuyeh k'eegwiichy'aa t'ii'in.”
43009034	Jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Tr'agwaanduu gwitr'it gwizhit nagoodlit ts'ą' gwizhit diink'iindhat. Geediinǫąąhtan gwik'eegwiindaii lee t'iinyąą?” Ąįįts'ą' Israel tr'igiinkhii zheh gwizhit cheet'eegiiheełnaii.
43009035	Ąįį dinjii cheet'eeheełnaii gwinyąą ąįį Jesus gwiitth'ak. Yagwąh'ąįį ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą, “Gwidinji' k'injiinghit?”
43009036	Ąįį dinjii jyaa nyąą, “Juu t'inchy'aa veeshaagwandak vik'injihihthaa eenjit!”
43009037	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Ch'adąį' nah'ya' t'inchy'aa, ąįį juu t'avaiinyąą et'ee juk zhat nats'ą' giihkhii.”
43009038	“K'eegwaadhat iinlii it'ee nik'iinjihkhit!” Ąįį dinjii yahnyąą ts'ą' yats'ą' nikiigwiintthaii.
43009039	Jesus jyaa nyąą, “Dinjii oohaałkat eenjit dząą nankat gwats'ą' hoiizhii t'ishi'in. Vaagweech'in kwaa nąįį haagweech'in neegwahałtsyaa ts'ą' juu vaagweech'in adoodiinyąą nąįį chan haagweech'in kwaa neehałtsyaa eenjit.”
43009040	Pharisee lat juu zhat yaadilk'ii nąįį jyaa nyąą giiyiitth'ak dąį' jii giiyųąhkat, “Diikhwan chan diinaagweech'in kwaa diinyąą lee t'inyąą?”
43009041	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Nakhwaa gweech'in kwaa ji', duuyeh nakhwatr'agwaanduu gwilii gaa ‘Diinaagweech'in,’ dohnyąą gwiizųų t'ohnyąą gaakhwandaii gaa jyaa dohnyąą t'ohnyąą ąįį ji' tth'aii nakhwatr'agwaanduu gwanlii.”
43010001	“Łi'didlii eenaagwahaldak! Juu divii dehk'it goo'aii ąįį gindeiinvyaa k'it k'ii'ee nihdeiinzhii kwaa ts'ą' ch'adanh k'ii'ee gwats'ą' haazhii t'ee ch'an'įį ts'ą' dinjii łi'didlii nilii kwaa t'oonchy'aa.
43010002	Gaa divii k'ąąhtii nąįį gindeiinvyaa k'it gwizhrįh nihdeegadal.
43010003	Gindeiinvyaa k'ąąhtii nąįį nihdeegiiyahchik; didivii tee ch'oaazhri' gwizhrįh giiyiitth'ak ts'ą' giits'ą' chagahdal ts'ą' jyąhts'ą' cheegavahaazhik.
43010004	Datthak cheegoovaahchik dąį' goots'įį ahaa ts'ą' giitąįį adaa, giideezhuh diitth'ak ts'ą' giiyaandaii geh'an.
43010005	Ch'izhii dinjii ąįį duuyeh tąįį geedaa; t'oohłii galgahahdaa, giideezhuh haagiindaii kwaa geh'an.”
43010006	Jesus jii gwandak gwah'įį gwizhit geegavaagwaandak gaa deegavahnyąą ąįį deegwinyąą t'igwinyąą gaagiindaii kwaa.
43010007	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus chan hee jyaa nyąą, “Łi'didlii eenakhwaagwahaldak: Shįį t'ee divii nąįį eenjit gindeiinvyaa ihłii.
43010008	Juu shehkii nihdeiinjil nąįį t'ee ch'an'įį giinlii ts'ą' łi'didlii giinlii kwaa; gaa divii nąįį googoołk'įį kwaa.
43010009	Shįį t'ee gindeiinvyaa t'ihchy'aa juu shik'iighai' gindeiinvyaa k'it nihdeiinzhii t'ee neegoorahahshii, nihdineeheedik ts'ą' chineeheedik ts'ą' tł'oo chyah nizįį hee'aa.
43010010	Ch'an'įį nąįį ch'igiheen'įį, dinjii ęhdaa tr'agwa'ak akwat an googwahahtsyaa eenjit gwizhrįh nihdeegadal. Shįį ąįį gwinzii gogweheendaii ji' eenjit dząą nankat gwats'ą' hoiizhii t'ishi'in.
43010011	“Divii k'ąąhtii nizįį ihłii. Divii k'ąąhtii nizįį didivii eenjit naheedhaa ji' gaa t'inchy'aa.
43010012	Divii k'ąąhtii nilii kwaa ąįį laraa t'įį divii k'ąąhtii ts'ą' divii di'įį kwaa ąįį zhoh niił'in dąį' divii akhoonyąą ts'ą' zhoh goolat teegwįłjik ts'ą' shrihteegaajil.
43010013	Ąįį divii laraa t'įį k'ąąhtii ąįį t'oohłii divii ts'į' neehilgit, zhyaa laraa t'įį tr'agwah'in geh'an divii eenjit niinjich'adhat kwaa.
43010014	-
43010015	“Divii k'ąąhtii nizįį ihłii. Gwiti' shaandaii ts'ą' shįį chan vaashandaii, izhit gwik'it shidivii nąįį haashandaii ts'ą' geedan chan shaagiindaii. Gooveenjit ji' gaa nihihthaa.
43010016	Goolat nąįį ch'adanh giilk'ii. Oo'ee neegoohihłyaa, goots'ą' giihkhii dąį' shigiitth'ak ts'ą' nihteeneegiheedaa ts'ą' ch'ihłak giheelyaa ts'ą' divii k'ąąhtii ch'ihłak zhrįh gook'eehąąhtyaa.
43010017	“Gwiti' sheet'iindhan geh'an nihihthaa galjat kwaa, ąįįtł'ęę neegwihįhdaii chan sheenjit gwiłtsąįį.
43010018	Ch'ihłak gaa gwįhdaii shihłeegwehee'aa kwaa, shakhai' gwintł'eehih'aa. Shakhai' gwintł'eehih'aa ts'ą' shakhai' chan noohihdal. Jii t'ee Shiti' jyąhts'ą' sheenjit gwiłtsąįį.”
43010019	Jii ginjik kwaii eh'an chan hee nihzheedagąąn'ee.
43010020	Gootee lęįį nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Vizhit ch'anky'aa iizųų dhidii! Vagwandaii iizųų! Jaghaii oodǫǫhk'įį t'ohchy'aa?”
43010021	Gaa ch'izhii nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Dinjii vizhit ch'anky'aa iizųų gwiizhit jyąhts'ą' ginkhii kwaa t'oonchy'aa! Nats'ąą ch'anky'aa iizųų dinjii vandee kwaa haagweech'in neegwahahtsyaa?”
43010022	Et'ee khaii gwanlii Jerusalem gwizhit Hanukkah khaihłan nineegiidal nineegwiidhat;
43010023	Jesus ąįį Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh gwizhit Solomon's Porch gwagwaanyąą gwizhit gwa'an neehidik.
43010024	Nijin ąįį Jews nąįį Jesus eelin nigiilzhii ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą dąį', “Deegwiłkhyuk diits'ą' gwit'eh gwaha'aa t'inchy'aa? Łi'didlii haa diinaa gwandak nan lee Christ inlii?”
43010025	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Ch'adąį' hee nakhwaagwadhaldak gaa shik'iinjuhkhit kwaa; nakhwandah Shiti' voozhri' zhit t'ishi'in gooh'in t'ee juu ihłii gwigweech'in.
43010026	Gaa shik'iinjuhkhit kwaa geh'an shidivii ǫhłii kwaa.
43010027	Shidivii nąįį shiginjik haandaii, shįį chan goovaashandaii ts'ą' shatąįį geedaa.
43010028	Khit geenjit gwigweheendaii nigwiin'ąįį, ts'ą' duuyeh gahchįį; ch'ihłak gaa duuyeh shats'an yan'įį.
43010029	Shiti' shintł'eegoovinlii ts'ą' ch'andaa t'aht'aii, ts'ą' duuyeh gaa Shiti' vats'an gooroonjii.
43010030	Gwiti', shįį haa ch'ihłak tr'iinlii.”
43010031	Ąįįts'ą' Jews nąįį chan hee Jesus eenjit kii tee gwigwįłjik.
43010032	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Nakhwandah gwitr'it gwinzii gwinlęįį t'ishizhik, ąįįt'ee Gwiti' shintł'eegwiin'ąįį; ąįį gwitee jidii shrit t'ishizhik eenjit kii haa shohohkhwaa?”
43010033	Israel nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Ąįį gwitr'it gwinzii kwaii eenjit kii haa narahaahkhwaa t'igwii'in kwaa gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vinehts'į' ginkhii ąįį eenjit. Dinjii zhrįh iinlii, gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa hinlyaa gwik'eegwiindaii!”
43010034	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Nakhwa-law Dęhtły'aa Choh kat jii deegwinyąą khit ts'ą' łyaa łi'didlii ąįį gaagwiindaii; ‘Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ǫhłįį,’ nyąą,
43010035	zhit juu Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Viginjik antł'inlii nąįį.
43010036	Shįį ąįį, Gwiti' gwiteetr'ashąhchįį ts'ą' nankat gwats'ą' shihił'e'. Nats'ąą Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' ihłii dihnyąą eenjit vinehts'į' giihkhii shohnyąą t'ohnyąą?
43010037	Shiti' vigwitr'it t'agwał'in shi'in kwaa ji' shik'iinjuhkhit kwaa.
43010038	Gaa nihk'it t'ishi'in ts'ą', shik'iinjuhkhit kwaa ji' gaa Shiti' vigwitr'it t'ishi'in ąįį geenjit shik'iinjuhkhit. Ąįį ji' t'ee Gwiti' shizhit t'inchy'aa akwat chan Gwiti' shizhit t'inchy'aa shaakhwandaii eenjit.”
43010039	Chan hee zheegwaazhrąįį nigiihahchyaa gwik'igogwandaii, gaa goovantł'ee tr'ineezhii.
43010040	Jesus chan hee Jordan han gwinjik nineezhii ts'ą' nijin John tr'ookit vats'an chųų dhidlit izhit dhidii.
43010041	Lęįį nąįį yats'ą' haajil ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “John jyaa dagwahtł'oo gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa t'iizhik, gaa jii dinjii daiinyą' datthak łi'didlii.”
43010042	Ąįįts'ą' zhat dinjii gwanlii lęįį nąįį giik'iinjiighit.
43011001	Dinjii Lazarus oaazhii Bethany kwaiik'it gwizhit gwich'įį ąįį iłts'ik naanaii. Bethany gwizhit t'ee Mary chan ts'ą' veejii Martha haa gwigwich'įį.
43011002	(Jii Mary t'ee gwehkįį K'eegwaadhat vakwai' kat gwanzhįh chų' gwinzii vagwaatsan t'inlik ts'ą' dikiighai' haa yach'ąhjik ąįį voondee Lazarus ąįį iłts'ik.)
43011003	Ąįį tr'injaa neekwaii t'ee Jesus ts'ą' nideech'igiin'ąįį, “K'eegwaadhat, nijyaa gwilęįį iłts'ik,” giiyahnyąą.
43011004	Nijin Jesus jyaa ginyąą gaviitth'ak dąį' jyaa nyąą, “Jii ts'ik haa niheedhaa kwaa t'inchy'aa, gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vich'eegwahdrii gwizhrįh nagwahaatth'aa ąįįts'ą' gwik'iighai' shįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' shich'eegwahahdrii.”
43011005	Jesus ąįį Martha chan ts'ą' vijuu Mary, Lazarus nąįį haa eet'iindhan.
43011006	Nijin Jesus Lazarus iłts'ik gwinyąą gwiitth'ak dąį', drin neekwaii gwahaadhat gaa nihk'it zhat dhidii.
43011007	Ąįįtł'ęę ditsyaa nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Judea gwits'eerahoojyaa.”
43011008	“Geech'ǫąąhtan,” vitsyaa nąįį yahnyąą, “Niighit kwaa gwanaa dąį' Judea nąįį kii haa narookhwaa nagoonyąą; chan hee zhat gwits'eehindyaa lee t'iinyąą?”
43011009	Jesus jyaa nyąą, “12 hrs. gwizhrįh drin goo'aii, izhit gwizhrįh dinjii vaagweech'in ts'ą' duuyeh gat'aadhak.
43011010	Gaa tǫǫ gwiizhit zhit gwa'an neehidik ji' git'eehaadhak, ąįį dinjii vizhit tǫǫ gwanlii geh'an.”
43011011	Jesus jyaa nyąą, “Diijyaa Lazarus naachįį, gaa vats'ą' hihshyaa ts'ą' khakihih'aa.”
43011012	Vitsyaa nąįį t'igiiyahnyąą, “K'eegwaadhat, dhichįį t'inchy'aa ji', veenjit gwinzii neegweheelyaa t'inchy'aa,” ginyąą.
43011013	Gaa Jesus ąįį Lazarus niindhat nyąą t'inyąą, zhyaa dhichįį yahnyąą t'inyąą giiyuunyąą.
43011014	Ąįįts'ą' łyaa gwinzii gavaagwaandak, “Lazarus niindhat t'inchy'aa,
43011015	gaa nakhweh'an vaa iidi' kwaa eenjit shoo ihłii shik'injahohkhit eenjit. It'ee vats'ą' tr'ahoojyaa.”
43011016	Thomas (Twin chan oozhii) ąįį ch'izhii Jesus vitsyaa nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Geech'ǫąąhtan datthak vaa tr'ahoojyaa, nireheedhaa eenjit.”
43011017	Nijin Jesus k'idik dąį', drin dǫǫ gwanaa dąį' hee giiyaahtsii łee.
43011018	Bethany kwaiik'it t'ee Jerusalem gwats'ą' mile neekwaii goo'aii,
43011019	ts'ą' Israel lęįį nąįį Mary, Martha, haa goochaa niindhat geenjit gavaatr'igwigwidii
43011020	Nijin Martha ąįį Jesus ahaa gwiitth'ak dąį' dizheh gwats'an yats'ą' chiinzhii, gaa Mary ąįį zhat gwizhit dhidii.
43011021	Martha ąįį Jesus jyaa dahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat, dząą iindi' ji' duuyeh diichaa niighit!
43011022	Juk zhat Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa oahkat ji' nik'eegwahahthat gaashandaii.”
43011023	“Nachaa neegweheendaii t'inchy'aa,” Jesus yahnyąą.
43011024	“Drin ndaagwąą'ąį' ji' neegweheendaii ąįį gaashandaii,” Martha yahnyąą.
43011025	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Shįį t'ee niindhat nąįį khakihlii tł'ęę neegogwandaii neegoovałtsii.
43011026	Juu shik'iinjiighit nąįį t'ee nigiindhat ji' gaa neegwigweheendaii giheelyaa. Shik'iinjiighit eenjit khit gweheendaii ts'ą' duuyeh niighit jii nik'ee gwik'iinjinghit?”
43011027	“Aahą' K'eegwaadhat, Christ, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' inlii ts'ą' dząą nankat gwats'ą' hinkhaa naashandaii,” Martha yahnyąą.
43011028	Ąįįtł'ęę t'ee Martha dizheh nihdineezhii ts'ą' gweentak dijuu Mary oozhrii, “Geech'ǫąąhtan dząą dhidii, ts'ą' nǫh'ya' noonyąą,” jyaa yahnyąą.
43011029	Nijin Mary gwaak'įį dąį' khan yats'ą' haazhii.
43011030	(Jesus ąįį kwaiik'it gwats'ą' niighit kwaa nijin Martha yąąh'ya' chy'aa tth'aii hee dhidii.)
43011031	Nijin ąįį Israel gwich'in yaatr'igwidii nąįį khan chiinzhii giiyąąh'in dąį' giitąįį haajil, tth'ank'it gwats'ą' heekhaa ts'ą' tr'igwiheedii t'ii'in giiyuunyąą.
43011032	Nijin Mary ąįį Jesus ts'ą' tr'iinzhii ts'ą' niyiił'in dąį' yakwai' eeghaii nikiigwiintthaii. “K'eegwaadhat, dząą iindi' ji' duuyeh shachaa niighit!” yahnyąą.
43011033	Nijin Jesus, Mary chan ts'ą' tr'igwidii nąįį gwąąh'in ts'ą' adan chan haa tr'igwigwidii.
43011034	“Nijin vanǫǫhjik?” goovahnyąą. “Aanaii ts'ą' gwąąh'in!” giiyahnyąą.
43011035	Jesus iintrii.
43011036	Ts'ą' Israel gwich'in nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Deegwahtł'oo yeet'iindhan nǫh'in!”
43011037	Gaa goolat nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Dinjii vandee kwaa gaa haagweech'in neegwiłtsąįį! Lazarus niheedhaa gwits'į' yits'iheenjyaa shrǫǫ?”
43011038	Chan hee gwintł'oo gitr'ii'ee ts'ą' Jesus yatth'ank'it gwats'ą' haazhii, ąįį tth'ank'it kii zhit gweedii ąįį gwadąįį kii dha'aii.
43011039	“Gwadąįį kii gihłeehoh'ąįį!” Jesus gavahnyąą. Lazarus niindhat ąįį veejii Martha jyaa nyąą, “Juk t'ee drin dǫǫ okhwatsii t'inchy'aa, K'eegwaadhat, vatthąį' tr'ahaatsan.”
43011040	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Gwik'iinjuhkhit ji' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vich'eegwąhndit hǫǫh'yaa nakhwaihnyąą gaanoondaii?”
43011041	Gwadąįį kii gihłeegahaa'aii. Jesus yeedak gwąąh'in ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Shoodǫǫhk'įį geenjit mahsį', Shiti'.
43011042	Khit ts'ą' shoodǫǫhk'įį gaashandaii, gaa jii dinjii nąįį dząą giilk'ii geh'an t'ihnyąą, shohǫǫh'e' ąįį gaagiheendaii eenjit.”
43011043	Ąįį jyaa diinyą' tł'ęę gwint'aii khashraa'iintrat ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Lazarus, cheehinkhaii!”
43011044	Ąįį dinjii niindhat chy'aa chiinzhii, vanli', vakwai' haa gwach'aa vanooljik, vinin kat chan gwach'aa t'inchy'aa. “Gwach'aa vakat gihłeehohłii ts'ą' vanoohjii,” Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą.
43011045	Israel gwich'in lęįį nąįį Mary haa neegihiidal nąįį Jesus deezhik googwąąh'ya', ts'ą' giik'injiighit.
43011046	Gaa goolat nąįį Pharisee nąįį ts'ą' neegahoojil ts'ą' Jesus deezhik geegoovaagwaandak.
43011047	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee jii Pharisee chan ts'ą' giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį haa Israel gwakhaihkwai' nąįį ts'ą' giginkhe' ąįįtł'ęę jyaa ginyąą. “Deereheelyaa? Gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa lęįį t'ii'in!
43011048	Jyąhts'ą' datthak zhyaa tr'ąąh'in ji' juu nąįį datthak giik'iinjiheeghit, ts'ą' Roman gwakhaihkwaii nąįį dząą gwats'ą' giheedaa ts'ą' Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh chan ts'ą' jii nahkat datthak an googwahahtsyaa!”
43011049	Gootee dinjii ch'ihłak, Caiaphas, oaazhii ąįį zhat dąį' ndak khii giinkhih choh nilii ąįį jyaa nyąą, “Gaa deegwii'in gaakhwandaii kwaa t'ohnyąą!
43011050	Jii nahkat datthak an gweheelyaa gwits'į' dinjii nąįį eenjit gwizhrįh dinjii ch'ihłak ąįį tr'iiłkhwąįį ji' ts'ąįį gweheezyaa nik'ee gaakhwandaii?”
43011051	Zhyaa t'inyąą kwaa gaandaii gaa zhat dąį' ndak khii giinkhih choh ts'ą' Israel gwich'in nąįį eenjit niheedhaa yaandaii t'iiyahnyąą, ąįį
43011052	nąįį zhrįh eenjit kwaa gaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vigii nąįį, an-nihłik gwa'an gwigwich'įį nąįį ch'ihłak neehahtsyaa eenjit.
43011053	Izhit drin gwats'an t'ee Israel gwakhaihkwaii nąįį Jesus nats'ąą gahaahkhwaa geegiginkhii.
43011054	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Jesus gaandaii ts'ą' Judea nahkat gwandah neehidik kwaa, gaa neehoozhii ts'ą' nangwinjir gwa'an kwaiik'it Ephraim gwats'ą' haazhii ts'ą' ditsyaa nąįį haa dhidii.
43011055	Israel gwich'in nąįį Passover it'ee khaiinjii geenigwiindhat, ts'ą' dinjii lęįį nihky'aa nanhtee gwats'an Jerusalem gwats'ą' gahaajil, Passover gwats'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa eenjit shriitr'eedagahaachyaa.
43011056	Datthak Jesus keegihi'ik, Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh gwizhit khaihłan nigiinjil ts'ą' nihłaagwaakat, “Veenjit deeyųųhthan? Łyaa duuyeh dząą gwats'ą' hahaii gwich'in, shrǫǫ ohnyąą?” nihłagaanyąą.
43011057	Pharisee chan ts'ą' giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį haa juu Jesus nah'ya' ji' geegǫǫndak ginyąą, zheegwaazhrąįį nigiihahchyaa geenjit.
43012001	Passover gwats'ą' drin nihk'iitik gwiizhit Jesus, Bethany kwaiik'it gwats'ą' haazhii, izhit Jesus Lazarus niindhat dąį' ineegwahdaii ąįį zhat gwich'įį.
43012002	Izhit giiyeenjit vikeech'iłchy'aa, ts'ą' Martha yeenach'aahtsit, izhit zhat Lazarus vakat ch'ara'aa ts'ą' yaa dhidii.
43012003	Ąįįts'ą' Mary ąįį gwanzhįh gwinzii vagwaatsan chų' oonjik ts'ą' Jesus vakwai' kat t'inlik ąįįtł'ęę dikiighai' haa yach'ahjii ąįį yihił'ee geh'an t'iiyah'in. Ąįį vichų' zheh gwizhit datthak neech'iinthaii.
43012004	Jesus vitsyaa ch'ihłak, Judas Iscariot oaazhii ąįįt'ee gwintł'eeyahahchyaa ąįį jyaa nyąą,
43012005	“Jaghaii jii gwanzhįh chų' $300. Denarius vit'ii hohłii kwaa ts'ą' neeshraahchy'aa nąįį antł'ohłii kwaa?”
43012006	Neeshraahchy'aa nąįį eenjit niinjich'adhat kwaa gaa ch'an'įį nilii t'inyąą. Laraa dhah neeha'ak ts'ą' yats'an ch'an'įį t'inyąą.
43012007	Gaa Jesus jyaa nyąą, “Mary vihłeehiindii! Shireheetsii drin ji' eenjit yit'eehaahchy'aa t'iiyah'in vaanigwiin'ąįį kwaa!
43012008	Gweedhaa datthak neeshraahchy'aa nąįį gweheelyaa, gaa shįį ąįį khit geenjit nakhwaa hihdyaa kwaa.”
43012009	Jews lęįį nąįį Jesus, Bethany dhidii gwinyąą gwigwiitth'ak ts'ą' zhat gwats'ą' gahaajil. Jesus eenjit gwizhrįh kwaa gaa Lazarus chan, ąįįt'ee Jesus yineegwahdaii reh.
43012010	Ąįįts'ą' giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį Lazarus chan gahaahkhwaa eenjit gwigwiłtsąįį.
43012011	Deezhik veh'an Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį akhagoonyąą ts'ą' dinjii lęįį nąįį teehaajil geh'an Jesus k'injigiighit.
43012012	Ąįįtł'ęę gęhdaa drin dinjii lęįį nąįį Jesus Jerusalem gwats'ą' ahaa gwinyąą gwigwiitth'ak eenjit zhat Passover giilk'ii.
43012013	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee ts'iivii Palm ąįį vachan kwaii goonjik ts'ą' giidivee haajil, gazhral ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą “Hosanna! Juu K'eegwaadhat voozhri' zhit ahaa ąįį Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vaa oolį'! Israel gwi-King Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vaa oolį'!”
43012014	Jesus łąįį choh tsal (Donkey) agwąh'ąįį kat daandii, Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit jyaa deegwiinyą' gwik'it:
43012015	“Zion kwaiik'it gwachoo gwich'in nąįį, noojat shrǫ'! Et'ee nakhwa-King nakhwats'ą' ahaa, łąįį choh tsal (Donkey) kat doodii.”
43012016	Vitsyaa nąįį deegwinyąą t'igwinyąą gaagiindaii kwaa. Gaa nijin Jesus neegwiindaii dąį' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vich'eegwąhndit yintł'eiin'ąįį Dęhtły'aa Choh kat jyaa deegwinyąą, ąįįts'ą' giiyeenjit jyaa diizhik gineegaanjik.
43012017	Lazarus tth'ank'it gwizhit gwats'an Jesus yineegwahdaii dąį' juu andah t'iizhik nąįį deezhik geegoogwaandak.
43012018	Ąįį geenjit t'ee giits'ą' haajil gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa t'iizhik giiyeegwiitth'ak.
43012019	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Pharisee nąįį jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Gooh'in, łyaa gaayiich'arahtsii kwaa! Gooh'in, jii nahkat datthak giitąįį hijyaa!”
43012020	Juu Jerusalem gwizhit Passover gwats'ą' haajil ts'ą' khadigigeheejyaa eenjit nąįį tee gwa'an Greek nąįį dilk'ii.
43012021	Philip ts'ą' (Bethsaida kwaiik'it Galilee nahkat gwats'an ahaa) nigiinjil ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Jesus tr'ǫǫh'ya' tr'oonyaa.”
43012022	Philip ąįį Andrew ts'ą' haazhii, ts'ą' nihłaa Jesus ts'ą' gahaa'oo ts'ą' Jesus haa googwaandak.
43012023	Jesus jyaa goovahnyąą, “Et'ee juk Gwidinji' vich'eegwąhndit vintł'eerehee'aa.
43012024	Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak! Tł'ooli' tsal naadhak ts'ą' nan zhyaadhak ąįįtł'ęę an ilik gwik'it neet'eehaldhal ts'ą' nihihthaa, an dhidlit ji', tł'ooli' lęįį vats'an haahshii.
43012025	Juu dagwandaii zhrįh hił'ee ji', an heelyaa. Juu dagwandaii hił'ee kwaa ji' khit geenjit gwandaii hee'yaa.
43012026	Juu sheenjit gwitr'it t'agoh'ya' niindhan ji' shatąįį heekhaa gwizhrįh, shitsyaa heelyaa ts'ą' nijin dhidii shaa heedyaa eenjit. Shiti', juu shaa t'inchy'aa hił'ee t'inchy'aa.”
43012027	“Et'ee łyaa shidrii zhit tr'igwidii dha'aii gaa reh deehihjyaa gǫ'? ‘Shiti', jii kwaii shats'ą' t'agǫǫ'ya' shrǫ'!’ Gaa ąįį geenjit dząą gwats'ą' hoiizhii, khaiinjich'ashahadhat gwahaał'yaa eenjit.
43012028	Shiti', Noozhri' hil'ee ąhtsii!” Ąįįtł'ęę zheekat gwats'an khagiriinkhee, “Hil'ee dhałtsąįį ts'ą' chan jyaa dineehihłyaa.”
43012029	Ąįį zhat dilk'ii nąįį zheekat gwats'an girinkhii gwigwiitth'ak ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Nagoahtan lee t'igwinyąą? Ch'izhii nąįį chan zheekat gwich'in yats'ą' ginkhii t'inyąą!”
43012030	Gaa Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jii girinkhii goohtth'ak sheenjit t'igwinyąą kwaa gaa nakhwan ąįį nakhweenjit t'igwinyąą.
43012031	Et'ee juk jii nankat Ch'aroohahkat Drin nigwiindhat Ch'anky'aa Tr'aanduu kįh dhidii ąįį charahahchyaa gwik'it t'ishi'in shi'in. It'ee neerahoojyaa.
43012032	Nijin nankat gwats'an deeshiriłchįį ts'ą' sharoołkhwąįį ji' juu nąįį tthak shats'ą' giheedaa.”
43012033	(Nats'ąą khaiinjich'iheedhaa ts'ą' niheedhaa ąįį geegwaandak t'inyąą.)
43012034	Zhat dilk'ii nąįį jyaa ginyąą: “Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit Christ khit geenjit gweheendaii gwinyąą. Nats'ąą Gwidinji' ndak deerahahchyaa deenyąą t'iinyąą? Gwidinji' ąįį juu t'arahnyąą?”
43012035	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą “Tth'aii gwintsal gwizhrįh nakhwaa ch'ahałdrii t'oonchy'aa. Tǫǫ gweheelyaa gwehkįį deekhwa'yaa goo'aii gwik'it t'akhwa'in. Nakhwaa tǫǫ nagwahaadhal gwits'į'. Juu tǫǫ gwizhit dinjii nilii t'ee nijuk ahaa gaaheendaii kwaa geh'an.
43012036	Tth'aii drin gwanlii dąį' vat'oohchy'aa. Khit naa ch'ahaadrii eenjit.” Jesus jyaa diinyą' ąįįtł'ęę t'oołii neehoozhii ts'ą' goh'it idiildii.
43012037	Gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa lęįį gavandah t'iizhik googaa giik'iinjiighit kwaa.
43012038	Isaiah, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nilii ąįį jii kwaii łi'didlii heelyaa nyąą: “K'eegwaadhat, juu yik'injiheeghit? Juu yat'aii nah'ya'?”
43012039	Khyų' giik'iinjiighit geh'an Isaiah jii jyaa diinyą':
43012040	“Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa goovaagweech'in kwaa gwiłtsąįį, niinjich'agadhat kwaa gooviłtsąįį, goovaagweheechy'aa kwaa eenjit, googwandaii ninjich'iheedhat kwaa, Duuyeh goots'ą' tr'ihihdal eenjit shats'ą' gihijyaa.”
43012041	Isaiah, Jesus vich'eegwąhndit gwąąh'ya' geh'an jyąhts'ą' yeeginkhii t'inyąą.
43012042	Zhit dąį' Israel kįh dilk'ii lęįį nąįį giik'iinjiindhat gaadlit gaa Pharisee nąįį eenagogwaah'įį, Israel nąįį tr'igiinkhii zheh chagoorahahchyaa, kwaa gwits'į'.
43012043	Dinjii deenyąą ąįį gwik'it geedaa ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa deenyąą ąįį gwik'it geedaa kwaa.
43012044	Jesus gwint'aii khaginkhee ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Juu shik'injiighit t'ee shįį zhrįh shik'injiighit kwaa gaa juu shihił'e' chan k'injiighit t'oonchy'aa.
43012045	Juu shąąh'in t'ee juu shihił'e' chan nah'in t'oonchy'aa.
43012046	Jii nankat gava aadrii ihłii ts'ą' gwats'ą' hoiizhii, ąįįts'ą' juu shik'injiighit ji' duuyeh tǫǫ dhidii.
43012047	Juu shiginjik diitth'ak gaa gwik'eegwahthat kwaa ji', duuyeh an ałtsii eenjit gwantł'ałchįį. Dinjii an hałtsyaa eenjit nankat gwats'ą' hoiizhii kwaa, gaa dinjii neehałshii eenjit gwizhrįh.
43012048	Juu shaa t'inchy'aa kwaa ts'ą' shiginjik diitth'ak kwaa ąįįt'ee an yahahtsyaa veenjit dhidii. Khaiinkǫǫ Drin ndaanąą'ąį' ji' deihnyą' t'ee an yahahtsyaa!
43012049	Aahą', jii deihnyą' ąįį shįį zhrįh shats'an t'igwinyąą kwaa gaa Gwiti' shihił'e' ąįį deiinyąą shahnyąą gwik'it giihkhii t'ihnyąą.
43012050	Viginjik k'iighai' t'ee khit gwireheendaii. Deihnyą' datthak t'ee Gwiti' deiinyąą shahnyąą gwik'it giihkhii t'ihnyąą.”
43013001	It'ee Passover ch'arehee'aa gwats'ą' drin nigwiindhat. It'ee Jesus vidrin eenigwiindhat ts'ą' jii nankat gihłeeheekhaa ts'ą' Gwiti' ts'ą' heekhaa gaandaii. Dzaa nankat juu yaa t'iinchy'a' nąįį eet'iinghya' ts'ą' ndaagwąą'ąį' gwats'ą' gooveet'iindhan.
43013002	Jesus ditsyaa nąįį haa khaa neech'aga'aa. Ch'anky'aa Tr'aanduu ąįį Simon Iscariot vidinji' Judas ąįį ch'adąį' hee Jesus gwintł'eehahchyaa gwiłtsąįį.
43013003	Jesus ąįį Gwiti' t'aih datthak yintł'eiin'ąįį gaandaii; Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an tr'iinzhii ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'ą' heekhaa gaandaii.
43013004	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus vakaii'aa ts'an ndak nidhikhin, ts'ą' ankhii dagwach'aa gihłeehaalii, ts'ą' dohshroo dazhrak tł'an diłchaa.
43013005	Ąįįtł'ęę vizhit neech'araanjii zhit chųų gwizhinjaa ts'ą' ditsyaa nąįį kwai' k'eech'ąhtryaa ąįįtł'ęę ąįį dazhrak tł'an dohshroo haa gooch'ahjii.
43013006	Simon Peter ts'ą' niinzhii, ąįį t'iiyahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat, shakwai' k'eech'ahąhtryaa?”
43013007	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Juk deeshi'in gaakhwandaii kwaa, gaa nahgwan gaakhwahandaii.”
43013008	Peter t'iiyahnyąą, “Duuyeh, ch'ihłok, gaa shakwai' k'eech'ąhtryaa t'oonchy'aa!” Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Nakwai' k'eech'ałtryaa kwaa ji', shitsyaa neenilyaa kwaa t'oonchy'aa.”
43013009	Simon Peter t'iiyahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat, shakwai' zhrįh k'eech'ohtryaa shrǫ'! Akwat, shanli' chan ts'ą' shiki' haa chan k'eech'ąhtryaa!”
43013010	Jesus t'inyąą, “Juu gwinzii dik'eech'aahtryaa t'ee vakat shrąįh kwaa ts'ą' dik'ineech'aatryaa t'ee vakat shrąįh kwaa ts'ą' dik'ineehaatryaa gwat'aahchy'aa kwaa, vakwai' zhrįh. Datthak nakhwakat shrąįh kwaa nakhwatee ch'ihłak zhrįh.”
43013011	Jesus ch'adąį' hee gootee juu gwintł'eeyahahchyaa gaandaii, ąįį geh'an jyaa nyąą, “Datthak nakhwakat shrąįh kwaa gaa ch'ihłak zhrįh.”
43013012	Datthak gookwai' k'eech'ąhtryaa tł'ęę Jesus ankhii dagwach'aa neenaazhii ts'ą' vakaii'aa ts'ą' neenakhwadii. “At'ohju' deenakhwiilik deeshi'in nik'ee gaakhwandaii?” gavahnyąą.
43013013	“Shigeech'ǫąąhtan chan ts'ą' Shik'eegwaadhat shohnyąą, ąįįt'ee gwinzii t'oohnyąą, ąįį adan t'ihchy'aa.
43013014	Nakhwak'eegwaadhat, nakhwageech'ǫąąhtan ihłii, ts'ą' at'ohju' nakhwakwai' k'eech'ałtryaa. Nakhwan chan, nihłakwai' k'eech'ohtryaa.
43013015	Shik'it t'akhwa'yaa eenjit t'ishi'in, nakhweenjit deeshizhik gwik'it t'akhwa'yaa eenjit.
43013016	Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, slaves ąįį dinjii yits'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat ąįį andaa hil'ee kwaa; dinjii hil'e' ąįį juu yihił'e' andaa veegoo'aii kwaa.
43013017	It'ee łi'didlii haa khwandaii: izhit gwik'it t'akhwa'in ji' gwintł'oo shoohohłyaa!”
43013018	“Datthak nakhweegihkhii t'ihnyąą kwaa; ąįį juu nąįį teegǫǫłjik nąįį haashandaii. Gaa jii Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit deegwiinyą' gwik'it t'igiheenjyaa eenjit, ‘Dinjii juu shishii in'al t'ee shits'į' t'iheechy'aa.’
43013019	Jii gwik'it t'igweheenjyaa gwehkįį juk nakhwaagwaldak t'ihnyąą, ąįįts'ą' nijin gwik'it t'igwiizhik ‘Juu Ihłii Ąįį Ihłii!’ gwik'iinjuhohkhit geenjit.
43013020	Jii t'ee łi'didlii: juu vats'ą' ch'ahooł'e' ąįį k'injinghit ąįįt'ee shik'iinjiighit, ąįį juu shik'iinjiighit, t'ee juu shihił'e' ąįį k'injiighit.”
43013021	Jesus jyaa diinyą', ąįįtł'ęę łyaa tr'igwidii, ts'ą' gwinzii akǫǫ t'agoovahnyąą: “Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwaldak: nakhwatee ch'ihłak gwintł'eeshahahchyaa.”
43013022	Datthak nihłitee googwąąh'in ts'ą' juu t'ahnyąą ąįį gaagiindaii kwaa.
43013023	Vitsyaa nąįį tee juu Jesus yeet'iindhan ąįį yeeghaii dhidii.
43013024	Ąįį dinjii ąįį Simon Peter t'iiyahnyąą, “Juu t'ahnyąą ąįį geenjit oahkat lee?”
43013025	Ąįį dinjii Jesus eeghaii naadii ts'ą' yuahkat, “Shik'eegwaadhat, juu t'aiinyąą?”
43013026	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Łųhchy'aa teehałchaa ts'ą' vintł'eehałchaa, ąįį dinjii t'aihnyąą.” Ąįįts'ą' t'ee łųhchy'aa oonjik ts'ą' teeyahtsit ts'ą' Simon Iscariot vidinji' Judas intł'eeyahtsit.
43013027	Judas łųhchy'aa oonjik googwahkhan Satan vizhit diindhat. Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Khan deehini'yaa goo'aii gwik'it t'ini'in!”
43013028	Ąįį vakaii'aa ts'ą' yaadilk'ii nąįį ch'ihłak gaa Judas jaghaii t'inyąą giiyaandaii kwaa.
43013029	Judas ąįį laraa k'ąąhtii nilii ts'ą' Jesus vitsyaa lat nąįį ch'ara'aa drin eenjit ch'oiinkwat yahnyąą giiyuunyąą, ąįį akwaa ji' neeshraahchy'aa nąįį ts'iinyąą yahnyąą giiyuunyąą.
43013030	Khaa gwanlii ts'ą' Judas łųhchy'aa oonjik tł'ęę zhat cheehoozhii.
43013031	Judas cheehoozhii ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus jyaa nyąą, “It'ee Gwidinji' vich'eegwahdrii gwizhrįh nagwaatth'at. It'ee Gwidinji' vik'iighai' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vich'eegwahdrii gwizhrįh nagwaatth'at.
43013032	Ąįįts'ą' vik'iighai' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vich'eegwahdrii gwizhrįh nagwaatth'at ji', zhazhat Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa adakhai' Gwidinji' vich'eegwahdrii gwizhrįh nigwehee'aa.
43013033	Shigii nąįį, it'ee niighit kwaa gwizhrįh nakhwaa t'ihihchy'aa. Shinkeegahoo'yaa gaa Jews nąįį deegavaiinyą' juk nakhwaagwaldak, ‘Nijuk hihshyaa duuyeh gwats'ą' hohjyaa.’
43013034	Jii t'ee juk gwizhrįh nakhwaagwahaldak jyaa khwa'in nakhwaihnyąą, nakhwatee googwąąnchy'aa ts'ą' nihłeenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan khwa'įį. Nakhweenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan shi'įį, ts'ą' nakhwan chan nihłeenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan khwa'įį.
43013035	Ch'eet'igwiniindhan nihłeenjit khwa'įį ji', juu nąįį datthak shitsyaa ǫhłįį nakhwaaheendaii.”
43013036	“K'eegwaadhat, nijin gwats'ą' hiinkhaii?”, Simon Peter yahnyąą. “Nijin gwats'ą' hihshyaa duuyeh gwats'ą' hinkhaii t'oonchy'aa,” Jesus yahnyąą, “Gaa nahgwan ji' hee shatąįį hinkhaa t'oonchy'aa,” nyąą.
43013037	“K'eegwaadhat, jaghaii juk naahihshyaa kwaa gǫ'?” Peter nyąą. “Neenjit nihihthaa ji' gaa,” Peter yahnyąą.
43013038	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Łyaa sheenjit nihiindhaa ji' gaa lee t'iinyąą? Łi'didlii haa naagwahaldak: vanh rooster khakeehee'aa gwehkįį tik łąą shaanandaii kwaa hinjyaa t'oonchy'aa.”
43014001	“Nakhwadrii zhit tr'agohdii ts'ą' nakhweenjit goozųų shrǫ'!” Jesus gavahnyąą. “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vik'injuhkhit, ts'ą' shįį chan shik'iinjuhkhit.
43014002	Shiti' vizheh gwizhit gwintsii, ts'ą' izhit nakhweenjit shrigwihihłyaa. Jyąhts'ą' nakhwadivee goo'aii kwaa ji' duuyeh jyaa nakhwaihnyąą.
43014003	Ąįįts'ą' hoiizhii ąįįtł'ęę izhit nakhweenjit shrigwiilik ąįįtł'ęę, oo'ee neehihdyaa ts'ą' adahaa nakhwahaalchyaa, nijin t'ihchy'aa izhit shaa t'ahohchy'aa eenjit.
43014004	Nijin gwats'ą' hihshyaa ąįį nats'ąą gwats'ą' hohdaa gaakhwandaii.”
43014005	Thomas jyaa yahnyąą, “K'eegwaadhat, nijin gwats'ą' hinkhaa t'iinyąą, gaagwiindaii kwaa. Nats'ąą gaagweheendaii?”
43014006	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Shik'iighai' shatąįį gwats'ą' hohdaa t'igwinyąą, łi'didlii ihłii, gwandaii ihłii; shik'iighai' gwizhrįh dinjii Gwiti' ts'ą' niheehaa goo'aii.
43014007	It'ee shaakhwandaii akwat Shiti' chan vaakhwahandaii ts'ą' juk gwats'an vaakhwandaii hohłyaa, nǫh'ya' t'inchy'aa.” Jesus gavahnyąą
43014008	Philip jyaa yahnyąą, “K'eegwaadhat, Gwiti' diits'ą' agwąąhkįį; ąįį gwizhrįh gwit'eegwaahchy'aa.”
43014009	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Łyaa niighyuk nakhwaa t'ihchy'aa gwiizhit tth'aii shaakhwandaii kwaa Philip? Juu shaa'ya' t'ee Gwiti' chan nah'ya' t'oonchy'aa. Jaghaii gwiizhit ‘Gwiti' diits'ą' agwahch'in!’ diinyąą?
43014010	Gwiti' vizhit t'ihchy'aa ts'ą' Gwiti' shizhit t'inchy'aa ąįį nik'ee gwik'iinjinghit Philip? Jidii ginjik nakhwats'an dhałtsąįį t'ee shats'an t'igwinyąą kwaa. Gwiti' shizhit t'inchy'aa ąįį digwitr'it t'agwah'in t'igwinyąą.
43014011	Gwiti' vizhit t'ihchy'aa ts'ą' Gwiti' shizhit t'inchy'aa ąįį gwik'iinjuhkhit. Akwaa ji', gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa t'agwał'ya' gǫǫh'ya' gwik'iighai' gwik'iinjuhkhit.
43014012	Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, juu shik'iinjiighit ąįį chan jidii gwitr'it t'agwał'ya' gwik'it t'ihee'yaa. Aahą', shandaa gaa gwitr'it t'agwahah'yaa. Shįį ąįį Gwiti' vats'ą' hihshyaa geh'an.
43014013	Ąįįts'ą' jidii shoozhri' zhit ach'oohkat datthak gwik'it gweheelyaa gwahałtsyaa. Gwidinji' vik'iighai' Gwiti' vich'eegwahdrii gwigweheechy'aa eenjit.
43014014	Shoozhri' zhit jidii ach'oohkat, nakhwak'it shi'yaa.”
43014015	“Sheenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan khwa'įį ji', shiginjik k'eegohohthat t'akhwa'in.
43014016	-
43014017	Gwiti' nakhweenjit oohaałkat ts'ą' nakhwats'eheenjyaa nakhwats'ą' niheehaa, ąįįt'ee Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą łi'didlii t'arahnyąą. Ąįį khit ts'ą' nakhwaaheelyaa. Jii nankat dinjii nąįį an-giihaa'aa, giiyąąh'in kwaa ts'ą' giiyaandaii kwaa geh'an. Gaa nakhwan'ąįį vaakhwandaii. Juk nakhwaa t'inchy'aa ts'ą' nakhwazhit t'iheechy'aa.
43014018	“Duuyeh akhanahoihnyąą; nakhwats'ą' neehihdyaa.
43014019	It'ee niighit kwaa jii nankat gihłeehihshyaa gaa khit nakhwaahihłyaa, ts'ą' chan neegwihįhdaii ts'ą' nakhwan chan neegohǫhdaii t'oonchy'aa.
43014020	Izhit drin ji' Gwiti' vizhit t'ihchy'aa ts'ą' nakhwan chan shizhit t'ohchy'aa, ts'ą' nakhwazhit t'ihchy'aa gwik'eehoondal t'oonchy'aa.
43014021	“Juu ch'iitth'ak ts'ą' shik'eegwahthat, ąįįt'ee sheenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan di'įį. Juu sheenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan di'įį t'ee Shiti' chan yeenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan di'įį. Shįį chan veenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan shi'yaa ts'ą' vats'ą' adagwahaalkyaa.”
43014022	Judas Iscariot ąįį nakwaa gaa ch'izhii Judas ąįį jyaa yahnyąą, “K'eegwaadhat, jaghaii diits'ą' adagwahaankyaa gwiizhit jii nankat ąįį nakwaa?”
43014023	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Juu sheenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan di'įį t'ee shiginjik k'eegwahahthat. Shiti' chan yeenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan hee'yaa, ts'ą' Shiti', shįį haa vats'ą' nirehee'al ts'ą' vizhit t'igweheechy'aa.
43014024	Juu sheenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan di'įį kwaa t'ee duuyeh shiginjik k'eegwahthat. Jii jyaa danakhwaihnyąą t'ee shats'an t'inchy'aa kwaa gaa Gwiti' shihił'e' vats'an t'igwinyąą.
43014025	“Tth'aii nakhwaa dhiidii dąį' jii kwaii nakhwaagwaldak t'ihnyąą.
43014026	Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą gwits'inyaa nilii ts'ą' shoozhri' zhit Gwiti' yahah'aa ąįį jidii datthak eegavąąhtan ts'ą' deenakhwaiinyą' datthak gineehoondaii nakhwahahtsyaa.
43014027	“Tsinehdan nakhwaa akhoohįįhjyaa; shats'an tsinehdan nakhwantł'eehihłyaa. Ąįį tsinehdan jii nankat duuyeh gwintł'eeyah'ąįį t'arahnyąą gaa shįį ąįį ts'anhan'yaa eenjit nintł'eehih'aa. Tr'agohdii ts'ą' nakhwayinji' zhit goozųų shrǫ', noojat shrǫ'!
43014028	Jii jyaa nakhwaiinyą' shoodǫǫhk'į', ‘Neehihdyaa gaa nakhwats'eehihdyaa.’ Sheet'ǫhthan ji', Gwiti' vits'eehihdyaa geenjit shoohohłyaa, shandaa veegoo'aii geh'an.
43014029	Jii deegweheenjyaa diinyą' ąįį gwik'it gweheelyaa gwats'ą' nakhwaagwaldak t'ihnyąą, gwik'it goodlit ji' gwik'iinjuhohkhit geenjit.
43014030	It'ee nahgwan gwizhrįh nakhwaa neegihihjyaa. Jii nankat gwizhrįh gwakhaihkwaii choh ahaa. Shandaa t'aih di'įį kwaa.
43014031	Gaa jii nankat dinjii nąįį datthak Gwiti' veet'iihthan gaageheendaii gwizhrįh; ąįį geh'an jidii doo'ya' shoonyąą datthak gwik'it t'ishi'in shi'in. “It'ee neerahoojyaa.”
43015001	“Shįį t'ee łyaa gwanzhįh vakat gwąąhshii t'ihchy'aa, ąįįts'ą' Shiti' chan gwanzhįh nahshii nilii.
43015002	Jidii shakat gwanzhįh dachan gwinzii nahshii kwaa t'ee gihłeehaht'aa, jidii shakat gwinzii vakat gwąąhshii t'ee gwinzii k'ąąhtii ts'ą' shriiyuunyąą ąįįt'ee vakat gwanzhįh lęįį neehaanzhii eenjit.
43015003	Gwandak Nizįį eenakhwaagwadhaldak ąįį haa ch'adąį' hee shroodiinyąą dhoodlit t'oonchy'aa.
43015004	Khit shaa ǫhłįį ts'ą' shįį chan khit nakhwaa hihłyaa, gwanzhįh dachan ch'ihłak duuyeh adakhai' gwąąhshii. Vakat gwanzhįh nahshii, vadachan lęįį khaihłok nahshii ji' gwizhrįh. Izhit gwik'it shaa ǫhłįį ji' gwizhrįh nakhwats'an gwahąąhshįį k'it t'igwehee'yaa.
43015005	“Jak vakat nahshii ihłii, nakhwan chan jak t'an ǫhłįį. Juu shaa nilii t'ee vaa ihłii ts'ą' vats'an gwąąhshii; shehdan ji' duuyeh.
43015006	Juu shaa nilii kwaa t'ee charahahchyaa, jak dachan akharoonyąą ts'ą' dhagaii gwik'it; ąįį k'it t'inchy'aa jak dachan t'ee khaihłan nirilii ts'ą' kǫ' zhit tr'ahk'an t'inchy'aa.
43015007	Shiginjik ohtą' ts'ą' shaa ǫhłįį ji', jidii ach'oohkat datthak nakhwats'an hałtsyaa.
43015008	Jyąhts'ą' t'ee Shiti' vich'eegwahdrii gwigweech'in t'agwarahnyąą, gwintł'oo nakhwats'an gwąąhshii, jyąhts'ą' t'ee shitsyaa hohłyaa.
43015009	Shiti' sheet'iindhan gwik'it shįį chan nakhweenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan shi'įį. Shich'eet'igwiniindhan zhit gǫhdaii.
43015010	Shiginjik k'eegohthat ji', shich'eet'igwiniindhan zhit t'ahohchy'aa. Shiti' viginjik k'eegwałthat ts'ą' vich'eet'igwiniindhan zhit t'ihchy'aa gwik'it.
43015011	“Sheeshroonchy'aa nakhwazhit t'iheechy'aa ts'ą' nakhwazhit ch'eeshroonchy'aa deedahaan'ai' eenjit.
43015012	Shiginjik zhit jyaa digwinyąą gwik'it t'ohchy'aa, nihłeet'oohthan, nakhweet'iindhan gwik'it.
43015013	Dinjii dijyaa, nąįį haa eenjit oo'an dahaachyaa t'ee łyaa vich'eet'igwiniindhan nitsii t'arahnyąą.
43015014	Shiginjik k'it ohdaa ji' shijyaa hohłyaa.
43015015	Et'ee chan duuyeh dinjii vitsyaa yeetr'agwah'in neehanzhok k'it t'anakhwahał'yaa kwaa, ąįį ch'itsyaa dee'in t'ii'in yaaheendaii kwaa geh'an. Shijyaa ąįį nakhwahaihjyaa, jidii Shiti' vats'an gwiihtth'ak datthak geenakhwaagwaldak geh'an.
43015016	Shįį ąįį gwitee tr'ashǫǫhchįį kwaa gaa shįį ąįį gwitee tr'anakhwaałchįį ts'ą' nakhwats'an gwanzhįh haahshii. Ąįį gwanzhįh khit ts'ą' gweheendaii. Ąįįts'ą' shoozhri' zhit jidii ach'oohkat Gwiti' nats'an yahahtsyaa t'oonchy'aa.
43015017	Izhit geenjit jii jyaa danakhwahaihjyaa, nihłeenjit ch'eet'igwiniindhan khwa'įį.”
43015018	“Jii nankat dinjii nąįį nitr'ii'ee ji', shįį tr'ookit sheet'igiinghya' kwaa jyaa gineehandaii yuu.
43015019	Jii nankat ts'an inlii ji', vats'an iinlii ts'ą' geh'an neet'iheenghyaa. Gaa shįį ąįį jii nankat gwats'an gwitee tr'anąąłchįį ts'ą' jii nankat gwats'an iinlii kwaa. Ąįį geh'an jii nankat dinjii nąįį nitr'ii'ee t'oonchy'aa.
43015020	Jii deenakhwaiinyą' gineehoondaii yuu, ‘Dinjii vitsyaa yeetr'agwah'in ts'ą' neeyahanzhok ąįį yandaa ts'ą' veegoo'aii kwaa t'oonchy'aa.’ Khaiinjich'ishiriłthat ji', nakhwan chan gwik'it t'anakhwagahah'yaa. Shiginjik k'eegwigwiłthat ji', nakhwaginjik chan k'eegogwahahthat t'oonchy'aa.
43015021	Gaa shats'an ǫhłįį geh'an jyaa nakhwagahah'yaa; juu shihił'e' ąįį gaagiindaii kwaa geh'an.
43015022	Dząą gwats'ą' hoiizhii ts'ą' goots'ą' giihkhe'. Akwaa ji' duuyeh datr'agogwaanduu gwizhrįh nagogwa'aii, ąįį geh'an datr'agogwaanduu eenjit deegiheenjyaa gaa gaagiindaii kwaa.
43015023	Juu sheet'iindhan kwaa chan Shiti' eet'iindhan kwaa t'oonchy'aa.
43015024	Gooteegwitr'it t'agwał'ya' kwaa ji' duuyeh datr'agogwaanduu oo'an gwigwihilii, izhit duuyeh gaa t'igwee'ya' kwaa t'oonchy'aa izhit geh'an deeshi'ya' googwąąh'ya' ts'ą' Shiti' shįį haa diitr'igii'ee.
43015025	Gaa jii łyaa gwik'it t'igweheenjyaa goo'aii, goo-law zhit deegwinyąą gwik'it gweheelyaa eenjit, ‘geenjit gwakwaa shitr'ii'ee,’
43015026	“Gwits'inyaa k'eeheedik, ąįįt'ee Gwiti' vats'an Ch'anky'aa łi'didlii nilii. Gwiti' vats'an nakhwats'ą' nihih'aa ts'ą' sheegwahaandak.
43015027	Ąįįts'ą' nakhwan chan, sheegohoondak tr'ookit dąį' gwats'an shaa ǫhłįį geh'an.”
43016001	“Teehohdaa gwits'į' jii kwaii nakhwaagwaldak t'ihnyąą.
43016002	Israel gwich'in nąįį ditr'igiinkhii zheh kwaii gwats'an cheenakhwagahahchyaa. Ąįįts'ą' juu nęhdaa tr'igwiin'ąįį chan Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vaa ihłii shi'in heenghyaa ąįį chan gwats'ą' gweedhaa.
43016003	Shįį akwat Gwiti' haagiindaii kwaa geh'an jii kwaii jyaa danagahah'yaa.
43016004	Gaa nijin jii kwaii jyaa danagahah'yaa nigwiindhat ji' gaanahandaii ts'ą' naagwaldak chy'aa gineehandaii eenjit. Tr'ookit naa iidi' dąį' jii kwaii geenaagwaldak kwaa.”
43016005	“Juk juu shihił'e' ąįį vits'eehihdyaa; gaa nakhwatee ch'ihłak gaa jii shǫąąhkat kwaa, ‘Nijin gwats'ą' hinkhaa?’
43016006	It'ee nakhwaagwaldak, ts'ą' nakhwadrii zhit tr'igwidii dha'aii.
43016007	Gaa jii t'ee łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwaldak: hoiizhii ji' gwizhrįh nakhwadiveegweheezyaa. Hoiizhii kwaa ji', Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą gwits'inyaa duuyeh nakhwats'ą' hahaii. Gaa shįį hoiizhii ji' t'ee nakhwats'ą' nahałchyaa.
43016008	Ąįįts'ą' nijin k'idik ji', jii nankat gwidinjii nąįį gootr'agwaanduu gwiizųų t'igii'in gaagavahąhdaii, ąįįts'ą' nats'ąą gootr'agwaanduu gweheezyaa chan gaagavahąhdaii, nats'ąą neegeheezhii akwat goorahahkat drin nigweheedhaa chan eenjit gaagavahąhdaii.
43016009	Shik'iinjigiighit kwaa geh'an gootr'agwaanduu gwanlii ąįį giizųų, ts'ą'
43016010	jidii gwinzii ginyąą chan zhyaa t'iginyąą, Gwiti' vats'ą' hihshyaa ts'ą' neeshahǫǫ'yaa kwaa geh'an.
43016011	Ts'ą' Ch'aroohahkat Drin geenjit chan, jii nankat Ch'anky'aa Tr'aanduu gwats'ą' k'eegwaadhat, ch'adąį' hee gwizhrįh narąhchįį.
43016012	“Łyaa tth'aii gwinlęįį eenjit nakhwaagwahaldak gaa tr'ihkhit lęįį ts'ą' gineehoondaii kwaa.
43016013	Gaa nijin Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą łi'didlii nilii k'idik ji' łi'didlii zhit gwizhrįh t'ahohchy'aa. Adan zhrįh vats'an t'igwinyąą kwaa gaa jidii gwehkįį gwiitth'ak akwat yeendaa deegweheenjyaa kwaii geegwahaandak.
43016014	Deenakhwaiinyą' datthak geenakhwaaneegwahaandak jyąhts'ą' t'ee ch'agwąhdit shintł'eegwehee'aa.
43016015	Jidii Shiti' vats'an nilii jii datthak chan shats'an; ąįį geh'an t'ee Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą jidii vintł'eegwiriin'ąįį datthak geenakhwaaneegwahaandak t'oonchy'aa.”
43016016	“It'ee nahgwan chan neeshahǫǫ'yaa kwaa; ąįįtł'ęę gwats'an nahgwan chan neeshahǫǫ'yaa.”
43016017	Vitsyaa lat nąįį jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Deiinyąą t'inyąą li'? Jyaa diinahnyąą, ‘It'ee nahgwan chan neeshahǫǫ'yaa kwaa ts'ą' ąįįtł'ęę gwats'an nahgwan chan neeshahǫǫ'yaa.’ Jii chan jyaa nyąą, ‘Gwiti' vats'ą' hihshyaa geh'an.’”
43016018	“‘Jii nahgwan it'ee,’ nyąą ąįį deenyąą t'inyąą?” Nihłagaanyąą, “Jidii eeginkhii t'inyąą vaagwiindaii kwaa!” ginyąą.
43016019	Jesus ąįį giiyuuhkat giindhan gavaandaii ts'ą' jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jyaa nakhwaiinyą', ‘It'ee nahgwan chan neeshahǫǫ'yaa kwaa ąįįtł'ęę gwats'an nahgwan chan neeshahǫǫ'yaa.’ Jii geenjit nihłookat lee t'ohnyąą?
43016020	Jii t'ee łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, hohtree ts'ą' tr'agohohdii, gaa jii nankat gwich'in nąįį shik'injiighit kwaa nąįį geenjit shoo heelyaa, tr'agohohdii gaa shoo ąįį neehohłyaa.
43016021	Nijin tr'injaa tr'iinin haa iłts'ik dąį' khaiinjich'iighit ts'ą' vaa shroonchy'aa kwaa. Gaa nijin tr'iinin igwilik ąįįtł'ęę khaiinjich'iighit chy'aa ganaandee, vigii nankat niinzhii eenjit shoo nilii geh'an.
43016022	Ąįį geh'an juk tr'agohdii ts'ą' nakhwaa shroonchy'aa kwaa t'oonchy'aa, gaa chan neenakhwahaal'yaa ts'ą' nakhwadrii zhit shoo neehee'aa, ąįį shoo t'ee duuyeh nakhwałeeraha'aii t'inchy'aa.
43016023	Izhit zhat drin nigwiindhat ji' shahohkat kwaa. Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, shoozhri' zhit Gwiti' jidii eenjit oohkat nakhwats'an hahtsyaa t'inchy'aa.
43016024	Gwehkįį shoozhri' zhit tth'aii ch'oohkat kwaa akwat: jidii ach'oohkat ąįį nakhwak'eegwahaadhat t'oonchy'aa, shoh nakhwazhit deedahaa'aii t'oonchy'aa.”
43016025	“Jii kwaii t'ee gwandak zhit geenakhwaagwaldak t'ihnyąą. Gaa zhat nigwiindhat ji' duuyeh gwandak zhit nakhwaagwaldak, gaa juk Gwiti' gwinzii nakhwąnin ts'ą' veegihihkhyaa.
43016026	Izhit drin nigwiindhat ji' shoozhri' zhit oohohkat; nakhweenjit oohaałkat t'ihnyąą kwaa,
43016027	Gwiti' nakhweet'iindhan geh'an. Sheet'ǫhthan akwat Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vats'an ihshyaa ąįį gwik'iinjuhkhit geh'an nakhweet'iindhan.
43016028	Gwiti' vats'an ihshyaa ts'ą' nankat gwats'ą' hoiizhii; ąįįts'ą' it'ee nankat gihłeehihdyaa ts'ą' Gwiti' vits'eehihdyaa.”
43016029	Ąįįts'ą' vitsyaa nąįį jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Gwąąh'in, gwandak zhit nakwaa gaa gwinzii diinin ts'ą' diinaa goondak.
43016030	Juk it'ee jidii datthak gaanandaii gwik'igwaanjik; ts'ą' naroahkat gaa gwit'eegwaahchy'aa kwaa łee. Jii geh'an Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa ts'an tr'iinzhii gwik'injiriighit.”
43016031	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą: “It'ee shik'iinjuhkhit?
43016032	Ch'adąį' hee zhat nigwiindhat, shrihtee hohdaa ts'ą' nakhwazheh gwits'eehohdaa ts'ą' shįį zhrįh hihdyaa. Gaa shahzhrįh hihdyaa kwaa gaa Gwiti' shaa t'inchy'aa geh'an.
43016033	Shaa tsinehdan hohłyaa geh'an nakhwaagwaldak t'ihnyąą. Jii nankat gogwantrii datthak gahǫǫh'yaa. Gaa nihk'it nakhwaa shroonchy'aa! Jii nankat gaayiidhałtsąįį!”
43017001	Jesus jyaa diinyą' ąįįtł'ęę zheekat k'iidak gwąąh'in ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Shiti', it'ee zhat nigwiindhat. Nidinji' nich'eegwahdrii vintł'eiin'ąįį, ąįįts'ą' Gwidinji' nich'eegwahdrii nintł'ineehee'aa eenjit.
43017002	Dinjii datthak teegwahąhdal eenjit t'aih vintł'eiin'ąįį, ts'ą' juu yaanilii nąįį gwandaii ndaanąą'ąį' kwaa teeheelyaa eenjit.
43017003	Jii jyąhts'ą' t'ee gwandaii ndaanąą'ąį' kwaa khwa'įį: Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa łi'didlii ch'ihłak zhrįh inlii, ts'ą' Jesus Christ, khadhoo'ee ąįį juu nąįį datthak goovaaheendaii eenjit.
43017004	Gwitr'it shintł'eegwin'ąįį datthak gęhdaa tr'iijik ts'ą' jyąhts'ą' t'ee nich'eegwahdrii nankat neenjit googwahaałkyaa.
43017005	Gwiti' neeghaih ch'eegwahdrii shintł'eegwiin'ąįį, jii nan goodlit gwats'ą' ch'eegwahdrii nan, shįį haa tr'ii'įį ąįį reh.
43017006	“Dinjii nankat gwats'an oodhiinjik ts'ą' shintł'eegoovinlii, ąįį nąįį ts'ą' neegiihkhe'. Nats'an giinlii, ts'ą' shintł'eegaviinlii. Niginjik k'eegwigwiłthat,
43017007	ąįįts'ą' juk jidii shintł'eegwiinlii datthak nats'an t'inchy'aa gaagiindaii.
43017008	Jidii niginjik shintł'eiin'ąįį datthak goovintł'eiilii, ts'ą' giik'iinjiighit nats'an tr'iizhii ąįį łi'deegwidlii gaagiindaii, ts'ą' shahooh'e' gwik'iinjigiighit.
43017009	“Gooveenjit khagidihjii, juu nits'į' t'inchy'aa nąįį eenjit khagidihjii kwaa, gaa juu shintł'eiinlii nąįį eenjit khagidihjii, nats'an giinlii geh'an.
43017010	Juu shats'an nilii nąįį nats'an giinlii, ts'ą' juu nats'an nilii nąįį shats'an giinlii. Ąįįts'ą' gooveh'an ch'eegwahdrii shats'an goodlit.
43017011	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee nats'ą' hihshyaa, it'ee nankat gihłeehihdyaa, gaa geedan ąįį nankat gahaaky'aa. Gwiti' Shroodiinyąą Noozhri' zhit t'aih ni'įį haa gavoiintą', ąįį Noozhri' shintł'eiin'ąįį reh, nan shįį haa ch'ihłak tr'iinlii gwik'it ch'ihłak giheelyaa eenjit.
43017012	Gavaa iidi' dąį', Noozhri' zhit t'aih haa gook'aałti', ąįį noozhri' shintł'eiin'ąįį reh. Gook'aałti', ts'ą' teegahaajil kwaa, dinjii ch'ihłak zhrįh teehaazhii. Ąįįt'ee Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit deegweheenjyaa goo'aii ąįį gwik'it t'igweheenjyaa eenjit.
43017013	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee nats'ą' hihshyaa, gaa jii nankat tth'aii dhiidii gwiizhit jyaa dihnyąą t'ihnyąą, goodrii zhit shoh deedahaan'ai' eenjit.
43017014	Niginjik nankat gavintł'eiinlii ts'ą' lęįį nąįį gaveet'iindhan kwaa ji', nahkat gwats'an giinlii kwaa geh'an, shįį chan nankat gwats'an ihłii kwaa gwik'it.
43017015	Nankat gihłeegavahiinlyaa eenjit t'ihnyąą kwaa, gaa Ch'anky'aa Tr'aanduu ts'į' gook'ąąhtii.
43017016	Nankat gwats'an ihłii kwaa ts'ą' geedan chan nankat gwats'an giinlii kwaa.
43017017	Niginjik łi'didlii zhit shroodiinyąą gavahtsii.
43017018	Nankat gwats'ą' shahooh'e' gwik'it nankat gwats'ą' goohooł'e'.
43017019	Gooveenjit nantł'eedahaalchyaa, geedan chan łi'haa nantł'eedagahaachyaa ji' eenjit.”
43017020	“Geedan zhrįh gooveenjit khadigihjii kwaa, gaa juu shik'injiheeghit nąįį chan shitsyaa nąįį shiginjik eegoogwaandak geh'an.
43017021	Datthak ch'ihłak giheelyaa eenjit gooveenjit khadigihjii. Shiti', shaa inlii gwik'it geedan chan diinaa gooli' ts'ą' shįį chan naa ihłii gwik'it. Ch'ihłak giheelyaa, juu nąįį datthak shahooh'e' gaageheendaii eenjit.
43017022	Nich'eegwahdrii shintł'eiin'ąįį ąįį goovantł'eiin'ąįį, ch'ihłak giheelyaa eenjit, nan shįį haa ch'ihłak tr'iinlii gwik'it.
43017023	Gavaa ihłii ts'ą' nan shaa inlii ts'ą' łyaa ch'ihłak giheelyaa eenjit, shahooh'e' ts'ą' sheet'iindhan gwik'it gaveet'iindhan gaageheendaii eenjit.
43017024	“Gwiti', shintł'eegaviinlii ts'ą' nijin t'ihchy'aa shaa t'agoochy'a' goovoihnyąą ts'ą' nich'eegwahdrii shintł'eiin'ąįį gahąąh'yaa geenjit. Nan gweheelyaa gwehkįį sheet'iinghya' geenjit.
43017025	Gwiti' Łi'didlii Choh! Nankat naagwiindaii kwaa, gaa shįį ąįį naashandaii, ts'ą' shahooh'e' chan gaagiindaii.
43017026	Juu inlii neegiihkhe' ts'ą' naagiindaii ts'ą' khit jyaa shi'yaa, ts'ą' ch'eet'igwiniindhan sheenjit ni'įį goozhit t'oonchy'aa ts'ą' shįį chan ch'eet'igwiniindhan shi'įį goozhit t'oochy'a'.”
43018001	Jyąhts'ą' khadigeedi' ąįįtł'ęę Jesus k'ǫǫ Kidron deetaa ditsyaa nąįį haa neiinzhii. Izhit gwanzhįh deek'it goo'aii, izhit Jesus ditsyaa nąįį haa gwiteiinzhii.
43018002	Judas, Jesus gwantł'ąhchįį ąįį gwanzhįh deek'it nijin goo'aii gaandaii ąįį gwehkįį zhat khit vitsyaa nąįį ninidik yaandaii.
43018003	Judas ąįį gwanzhįh deek'it gwats'ą' ąįį Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh gwak'ąąhtii nąįį akwat Roman niveet'ah'in lęįį nąįį haadlii, ąįįt'ee giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį chan ts'ą' Pharisee nąįį goohił'e': datthak kheeghan akwat chųų daak'a' tyah akwat gał vakat gwaak'a' neegahaazhik.
43018004	Jesus deereheelyaa datthak ch'adąį' hee gaandaii; ąįįts'ą' goots'ą' niinzhii ts'ą' jyaa gavahnyąą: “Juu vinkeegǫh'in t'akhwa'in?”
43018005	“Jesus Nazareth gwats'an,” giiyahnyąą. “Shįį t'ee t'ihchy'aa,” gavahnyąą. Judas, Jesus gwantł'ahchįį chan zhat nadhat.
43018006	Nijin Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą dąį', “Shįį t'ee t'ihchy'aa,” an gagahaajil ts'ą' nan kat oo'an gahaajil.
43018007	Jesus chan hee gavaahkat, “Juu vinkeegǫh'in t'akhwa'in?” “Jesus Nazareth gwats'an,” ginyąą.
43018008	“Shįį t'ee t'ihchy'aa, ch'adąį' nakhwaiinyą'. Shįį shinkeegoh'in t'akhwa'in ji', jii ch'izhii nąįį gavaanagoh'aa shrǫ'!” Jesus gavahnyąą.
43018009	(Deiinyą' chy'aa łi'didlii gweheelyaa ji' eenjit jyaa nyąą t'inyąą: “Ch'ihłak gaa haa tr'igweendaii kwaa, Shiti', juu shintł'eiinlii nąįį tee gwats'an”).
43018010	Peter ąįį kheeghan shrii choh di'įį, khąhnaii ts'ą' ndak khii giinkhih choh vi-slave Malchus oaazhii ąįį shriits'ąįį dzee' gadąąhtrit.
43018011	Jesus, Peter jyaa ahnyąą, “Nizhrii choh gwizhit nąhchįį! Shiti' chųų tyah vizhit khaiinjich'iidhat shintł'eiinkąįį zhit ch'ishinjyaa kwaa shǫįįnyąą?”
43018012	Niveet'ah'in ts'ą' dagakhaihkwai' chan ts'ą' gwak'ąąhtii nąįį haa Jesus goonjik ts'ą' giikat dich'iłchaa,
43018013	ąįįts'ą' Annas tr'ookit ts'ą' giihiłchįį. Caiaphas t'ee vichį' eedhidii ts'ą' zhat dąį' Caiaphas ndak khii giinkhih choh nilii.
43018014	Caiaphas t'ee dinjii ch'ihłak zhrįh dinjii tee gwats'an juu nąįį datthak niindhat eenjit ji' gweheezyaa Jews nąįį ąįįnyą'.
43018015	Peter, ch'izhii ch'itsyaa haa Jesus tąįį gahaa'oo. Ąįį ch'izhii ch'itsyaa t'ee ndak khii giinkhih choh gwinzii yaandaii ąįįts'ą' Jesus zhit giinkhih choh vizheh gokwantee yaa gwats'ą' haazhii.
43018016	Peter ąįį oo'at chiitąįį ohts'ąįį dhidii. Ąįį ch'izhii ch'itsyaa gwinzii giinkhih choh yaandaii chineezhii ts'ą' oo'at chiitąįį nich'it tsal haa giinkhe' ąįįtł'ęę Peter nihdaahchįį.
43018017	Ąįį oo'at chiitąįį ohts'ąįį nich'it tsal ąįį Peter jyaa ahnyąą, “Zhit dinjii vitsyaa ch'ihłak inlii?” “Nakwaa, vitsyaa ihłii kwaa!” Peter yahnyąą.
43018018	Chiitąįį gwiink'oo, ts'ą' ąįį ndak khii giinkhih choh vitsyaa chan ts'ą' geech'agwaa'ya' nąįį haa gwigwiilk'in ąįį eelin giheendhaa eenjit nigiilzhii. Peter chan heendhaa eenjit gootee nadhat.
43018019	Ąįį ndak khii giinkhih choh ąįį Jesus, vitsyaa nąįį akwat geech'ǫąąhtan kwaii eenjit yuahkat.
43018020	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą: “Lęįį nąįį ts'ą' gwandah geech'ǫąąłchya', Israel nąįį tr'igiinkhii zheh kwaii akwat Kharigidiinjii Zheh Gwachoh gwizhrįh gwizhit geech'ǫąąłchya', izhit t'ee Jews nąįį khaihłan nineedal reh. Ch'ihłok gaa nagwąą'įį gwizhit giihkhe' kwaa.
43018021	Jaghaii geenjit shoohkat t'ohnyąą gǫ'? Ąįį juu gwaałchy'a' oohkat. Deegavaiinyą' ąįį geenjit gavoohkat, deihnyą' shaagiindaii.”
43018022	Nijin Jesus jyaa nyąą dąį', zhat gwak'ąąhtii ch'ihłak dhidii ąįį yaant'an ts'ą' jyaa yahnyąą. “Nats'ąą ndak khii giinkhih choh ts'ą' ginkhii t'iinyąą!”
43018023	Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Yee'at k'ii'an t'iinyą' ji', juk dząą gavaagwandak. Gaa deiinyą' eenjit oiints'it kwaa ji', jaghaii shįįt'an ni'in?”
43018024	Ts'ą' t'ee Annas, ąįį Jesus tth'aii vakat ch'adookhwachaa gwizhit ndak khii giinkhih choh Caiaphas ts'ą' niyąąhchįį.
43018025	Gwiizhit Peter ąįį tth'aii hee gwaak'a' gwats'ą' heendhaa eenjit nadhat. Ąįįts'ą' zhat dilk'ii nąįį jyaa giiyahnyąą. “Nan lee zhit dinjii vitsyaa ch'ihłak lee t'iinchy'aa?” Gaa Peter ąįį zhyaa t'igwinyąą gavahnyąą ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Nakwaa, vitsyaa ihłii kwaa.”
43018026	Ąįį ndak khii giinkhih choh vi-slave ch'ihłak ąįį zhit juu Peter yidzee gihłeehiłtrit valak yąąh'ya' ąįį Peter jyaa ahnyąą, “Nanlee gwanzhįh deek'it vaa naał'ya' lee t'iinchy'aa?”
43018027	Chan hee Peter “Nakwaa” nyąą gwiizhit rooster khashraa'iintrat.
43018028	Jesus ąįį Caiaphas vizheh cheegiihiłchįį ts'ą' oo'at Roman khaihkwaii choh vizheh nihdeegiiyąąhchįį. Vanh dąį' gineech'ahoo'aii hee. Jews nąįį Passover ch'igihee'aa eenjit shroodigidiinyąą geh'an khaihkwaii choh vizheh nihdeegijyaa gitr'igii'ee, nihdeegiinjil ji' duuyeh Passover ch'a'aa.
43018029	Ąįįts'ą' ąįį Roman khaihkwaii choh (Pilate) yats'ą' ch'izhii ts'ą' yuahkat, “Jii dinjii jidii eenjit gwiizųų tr'agwah'ya'?”
43018030	Jyaa diginyąą, “Gwiizųų tr'agwah'ya' kwaa ji' duuyeh nats'ą' narąhchįį t'inchy'aa.”
43018031	Pilate jyaa gavahnyąą, “Ts'an oo'įį ts'ą' nakhwa-law zhit deehohłyaa gwik'it t'ohłii.” Jews nąįį jyaa ginyąą “Dinjii drin gwarahahtsyaa geenjit goo'aii kwaa.”
43018032	(Jesus nats'ą' vidrin tr'ahahtsyaa diinyą' chy'aa ąįį gwik'it gweheelyaa eenjit t'igwiizhik)
43018033	Pilate dizheh nihdineezhii ts'ą' Jesus oahkat, “Nanlee Jews nąįį eenjit King inlii?”
43018034	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Nan shǫąąhkat akwat ch'izhii nąįį ts'an sheegwiintth'ak lee t'iinyąą?”
43018035	Pilate jyaa yahnyąą, “Jew ihłii shaiinyąą? Naa gwich'in nąįį akwat ąįį googiinkhii choh nąįį haa shintł'eenagąhchįį t'oonchy'aa. Nigwitr'it deezhik t'igwinyąą?”
43018036	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Shanahkat dząą nankat gwats'an nilii kwaa: shanahkat dząą nankat gwats'an nilii ji', shitsyaa nąįį Jews nąįį intł'eesharahahchyaa gwits'į' nich'itsigahahthat. Nakwaa, shanahkat dząą nahkat gwats'ą' nilii kwaa t'oonchy'aa!”
43018037	Ąįįts'ą' Pilate yuahkat, “King inlii diinyąą lee t'iinyąą?” Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Nan reh King inlii. Shaiinyąą. Ch'ihłak eenjit gwizhrįh shagoodlit ts'ą' nankat gwats'ą' hoiizhii t'ishi'in, łi'didlii eegihihkhyaa eenjit. Juu łi'didlii ts'an nilii ąįįt'ee shoołk'įį.”
43018038	“Ąįį łi'didlii ąįį jidii t'aiinyąą?” Pilate yuahkat.
43018039	Passover nineegwiidhak dąį' dinjii ch'ihłak zheegwaazhrąįį nakhweenjit chinałchik, ąįįt'ee khit jyąhts'ą' nakhweenjit gwik'it goo'aii geh'an. Jews nąįį nakhwa-King nakhweenjit chinoałchyaa shoohnyąą?”
43018040	Datthak gazhral ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Nakwaa, adan nakwaa! Barabbas ąįį gwiindhan.” (Barabbas t'ee Roman nahkat gookat deeheehaa gwik'eegoonjik inli' t'arahnyąą.)
43019001	Ąįįtł'ęę Pilate ąįį Jesus oonjik ts'ą' tr'ąhtrii yeenjit gwiłtsąįį.
43019002	Niveet'ah'in nąįį khoh haa giiyeenjit ts'eh iłtsąįį ąįį giiniin'ąįį, ik Purple ąįį chan giinaahtsųų,
43019003	giits'ą' niinjil ts'ą' shroondaii jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Jews nąįį King niighyuk goondaii!” Ąįįts'ą' giits'ą' nineedal ts'ą' giiyant'an.
43019004	Pilate chan hee chineezhii ts'ą' dinjii nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Gooh'in, jaghaii tr'ahaahkhwaa veegwaał'in kwaa ąįį gahǫǫh'yaa eenjit nakhwats'ą' chahałchyaa.”
43019005	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Jesus chiinzhii, khoh ts'eh naa'aii ts'ą' ik Purple chan naazhii. Pilate dinjii nąįį jyaa ahnyąą, “Gooh'in, jii dinjii nǫh'in!”
43019006	Nijin zhit gwak'ąąhtii chan ts'ą' giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį nigiiyiił'in dąį' gazhral ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Gohtsak! Gohtsak!” Gaa Pilate ąįį jyaa gavahnyąą. “Nakhwan ąįį ǫhjii ts'ą' gohtsak, shįį ąįį jaghaii geenjit tr'ahaahkhwaa veegwaał'in kwaa!”
43019007	Jews nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' ihłii nyąą geh'an dii-law zhit tr'ahaahkhwaa goo'aii gwinyąą.”
43019008	Nijin Pilate jii gwiitth'ak dąį', gwandaa naajat dhidlit.
43019009	Dizheh gwachoh nihdineezhii ts'ą' Jesus jyaa ahnyąą, “Nijin gwats'an inkhaa?” Gaa Jesus yidii ginkhii kwaa.
43019010	Pilate jyaa yahnyąą, “Shats'ą' gihinkhyaa kwaa? Jii ganandaii, nineehįhdal ji' gaa geenjit t'aih shi'įį, ganarahahtsak ji' gaa geenjit t'aih shi'įį.”
43019011	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa t'aih nintł'eiin'ąįį haa sheenjit t'aih ni'įį t'oonchy'aa. Ąįįts'ą' zhit juu nintł'eeshąhchįį ąįį gwandaa vatr'agwaanduu gweheelyaa.”
43019012	Nijin Pilate jii gwiitth'ak dąį' vineeroonjii yuunyąą. Gaa Jews nąįį gazhral ts'ą' jyaa ginyąą, “Jii dinjii vineiinjik ji' t'ee, Rome nahkat gwats'ą' k'eedeegwaadhat Caesar duuyeh nijyaa nilii! Juu King ihłii nyąą t'ee Caesar vijyaa t'inchy'aa kwaa!”
43019013	Nijin Pilate jii gwiitth'ak dąį', Jesus chyąąhchįį ts'ą' oo'at ch'aroahkat deek'it naadii. (Jii t'ee Hebrew ginjik zhit “Gabbatha” t'arahnyąą.)
43019014	Izhit t'ee Passover gwats'ą' drintł'an khaiinjii nigwiindhat. Pilate ąįį Jews nąįį shroondaii jyaa ahnyąą, “Dząą nakhwa-King!”
43019015	Gazhral ts'ą' jyaa giiyahnyąą, “Vęhdaa tr'agǫh'ąįį! Vęhdaa tr'agǫh'ąįį! Cross kat gohtsak!” Pilate gavoahkat, “Nakhwa-King gwałtsak shoohnyąą?” Giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį jyaa ginyąą, “Caesar zhrįh dii-King nilii t'oonchy'aa!”
43019016	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Pilate ąįį Jesus gagahahtsak eenjit gavantł'ahchįį.
43019017	Da-cross ichyaa giiyiłtsąįį ts'ą' oodee taih “Dinjii kiitth'an k'itiltsį',” googwahnyąą gwats'ą' ahaa. (Hebrew ginjik zhit Golgotha goozhii)
43019018	Izhit t'ee cross kat gigiiyiłtsak veeghaih nihts'įį chan dinjii neekwaii gigiłtsak.
43019019	Pilate dęhtły'aa kat gwadąąntł'oo ts'ą' ya-cross kat giłtsak “Jesus Nazareth gwats'an ahaa, Jews nąįį datthak eenjit King Nilii,” vakat gwinyąą.
43019020	Jews lęįį nąįį giikat aakin gwaa'įį, ąįį nijin Jesus giltsak ąįį kwaiik'it gwachoo gwats'ą' nahgǫǫ geh'an. Lęįį nąįį vakat deegwinyąą gaageheendaii eenjit Hebrew, Latin, chan ts'ą' Greek ginjik zhit danohootł'oo.
43019021	Giinkhih kįh dilk'ii nąįį Pilate jyaa agahnyąą, “‘Jews nąįį datthak eenjit King nilii,’ ąįį doiintł'oo shrǫ' gaa jii ąįį diintł'oo, ‘Jii dinjii jyaa nyąą, Jews nąįį datthak eenjit King ihłii.’”
43019022	Pilate jyaa gavahnyąą, “Jidii danoihtł'oo ąįį jyaa deheechy'aa t'oonchy'aa.”
43019023	Niveet'ah'in nąįį Jesus cross kat gigiłtsak ąįįtł'ęę giigwach'aa niveet'ah'in dǫǫ nąįį nihteegiyilzhii. Zhak khii ik chan oonjik, gwach'aa k'eelkai' nilii kwaa ts'ą' ch'ihłak zhrį' nilii.
43019024	Niveet'ah'in nąįį jyaa nihłagaanyąą, “Gwahkwaa łeerahch'aa; juu yuuheendal ji' eenjit, veenjit tseeroo'ya'.” Dęhtły'aa Choh kat deegwinyąą ąįį łi'didlii heelyaa eenjit jyąhts'ą' teegoodhat t'igwinyąą: “Shagwach'aa nihteegilzhii, shi'ik eenjit tseegee'ya'.” Niveet'ah'in nąįį izhit gwik'it t'igiizhik t'agwarahnyąą.
43019025	Va-cross gwats'ą' niighit kwaa vahan nadhat, ts'ą' vahan vijuu, ts'ą' Cleopas va'at Mary ts'ą', Mary Magdalene haa.
43019026	Jesus dahan chan ts'ą' ditsyaa eet'iindhan ąįį zhat nigiilzhii nagooviił'in; ąįįts'ą' dahan jyaa ahnyąą, “Ni'ęę, dząą t'ee nigii.”
43019027	Ąįįtł'ęę ditsyaa jyaa ahnyąą, “Dząą nahan.” Izhit gwats'an ąįį vitsyaa dizheh yaagweheechy'aa eenjit gwits'eeyihiłchįį.
43019028	Jesus et'ee jidii datthak gwik'it t'igwiizhik gaandaii ąįįts'ą' Dęhtły'aa Choh kat deegwinyąą ąįį łi'didlii eenjit jyaa nyąą, “Chųų doiihłii.”
43019029	Hyssop gał ts'iivii k'it t'inchy'aa tsii gwach'aa nagahtsuu ąįį k'ik tyah ghoo zhit jak chų' daatł'oo kwaa dhakaii; ąįį giizhit teegąhtsuu ts'ą' oodak giits'ą' ootą'.
43019030	Jesus jak chų' eenį' ąįįtł'ęę jyaa nyąą, “It'ee ndaagwąą'ąį'!” Ąįįtł'ęę zhak diki' niin'ąįį ts'ą' niindhat.
43019031	Ąįįtł'ęę Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį ąįį dinjii juu gagooriłtsak nąįį gootth'an łeegahahnaii ąįįtł'ęę cross ts'an nineegeheelyaa eenjit Pilate goahkat. Neegwaazhii Drin łyaa shroodiinyąą ts'ą' gwigwihił'ee drin nigwiighit geh'an zhat drin cross kat goochį' dhidlii gitr'igii'ee. Drin ts'ą' gwats'ą' drin gweedhaa geh'an jyaa digiizhik.
43019032	Niveet'ah'in nąįį ąįį dinjii neekwaii Jesus haa gagoogiłtsak nąįį tth'an łeegiiłnaii.
43019033	Gaa nijin Jesus eenigwigwiin'ąįį dąį', ch'adąį' hee niindhat łee ts'ą' giitth'an łeelnaii kwaa.
43019034	Niveet'ah'in ch'ihłak googaa kheeghan ch'ok haa Jesus tseech'iingit, googwahkhan chųų, dah haa khaatil.
43019035	(Shįį t'ee jyaa digwiizhik gwąął'ya' ts'ą' geegihkhe' łi'didlii t'ihnyąą gaashandaii ąįįts'ą' nan chan gwik'iinjihinghit ji' geenjit.)
43019036	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat jyaa digwinyąą. Ąįį łi'didlii heelyaa eenjit, “Vatth'an ch'ihłak gaa łeehaahnaii kwaa.”
43019037	Dęhtły'aa Choh kat ch'adanh chan jyaa digwinyąą, “Dinjii giiyaahgwat aakin giiyaa'įį!”
43019038	Jii ąįįtł'ęę Arimathea kwaiik'it gwachoo gwats'an dinjii Joseph oaazhii ąįį Jesus vichį' ooheendal ji' eenjit Pilate oahkat. (Joseph ąįį Jesus vitsyaa nilii gaa nagwąąh'įį, Jews khaihkwaii nąįį aanjat geh'an.) Pilate ąįį gwik'it t'ini'in yahnyąą ts'ą' t'ee yichi' oonjik ts'ą' oo'an neeyihiłchįį.
43019039	Nicodemus tr'ookit dąį' khaa Jesus nah'ya' chy'aa ąįį Joseph haa haazhii, myrrh, ts'ą' aloes chan gwanzhįh chų' gwinzii vagwaatsan 100 lbs. adahaa haadlii.
43019040	Ąįį dinjii neekwaii nąįį Jesus vichį' neegąhchįį ts'ą' gwach'aa ts'ik jyah giinooandoo, ąįį gwanzhįh gwinzii vagwaatsan haa. Jyąhts'ą' t'ee Jews nąįį dinjii eenagahąhdal dąį' t'igii'in.
43019041	Ąįį nijin Jesus goołkhwąįį geeghaih nahgwan gwanzhįh deek'it goo'aii izhit gwizhit gwa'an kii zhit gweedii goo'aii gwehkįį dinjii gitsii kwaa.
43019042	Et'ee Jews nąįį Neegwaazhii Drin gwats'ą' drin nigwiindhat ąįįts'ą' ąįį kii zhit gweedii goo'aii ąįį geeghaih niighit kwaa goo'aii. Geh'an zhat Jesus vichį' nagąąhchįį.
43020001	Drin Zhit vanh dąį' tth'aii tǫǫ gwanlii gwiizhit Mary Magdalene ąįį kii zhit gweedii gwats'ą' haazhii akhai' gwadąįį kii gihłeerahaa'aii łee gwah'in.
43020002	Gihłeehilgik ts'ą' Simon Peter chan ts'ą' ch'izhii vitsyaa Jesus gooveet'iinghya' nąįį ts'ą' niinzhii ts'ą' jyaa gavahnyąą, “Kiizhit gwats'an K'eegwaadhat goonjik ts'ą' nijin nigiiyąąhchįį gaagwiindaii kwaa!”
43020003	Ąįįtł'ęę Peter chan ts'ą' ch'izhii Jesus vitsyaa haa ąįį kiizhit vatth'ank'it gwats'ą' gahaajil.
43020004	Nihłaagaagal, gaa ch'ihłak ąįį Peter iłeehilgik ts'ą' adan tr'ookit tth'ank'it k'aagak.
43020005	Nihdeekiintthaii ts'ą' gwach'aa ts'ik njyah kwaii nah'in, gaa nihdeiinzhii kwaa.
43020006	Vatąįį Simon Peter k'idik ts'ą' zhazhat kiizhit tth'ank'it nihdeiinzhii. Ąįį gwach'aa ts'ik jyah,
43020007	ąįįts'ą' Jesus viki' kat gwach'aa kwaii niił'in. Ch'izhii gwach'aa ts'ik jyah eeghaii dhidlii kwaa gaa thok tr'aandoo łee.
43020008	Ąįį ch'izhii ch'itsyaa ąįį kiizhit tth'ank'it tr'ookit k'idik chy'aa, adan chan nihdeiinzhii; gwąąh'ya' ąįįtł'ęę gwik'it t'igwiizhik ts'ą' gaandaii.
43020009	(Dęhtły'aa Choh kat niindhat ąįįtł'ęę nineedhikhin varahnyąą ąįį deegwinyąą t'igwinyąą gaagiindaii kwaa.)
43020010	Ąįįtł'ęę vitsyaa nąįį digizheh gwits'eegahoojil.
43020011	Ąįį kii tth'ank'it gokwantee Mary itree ts'ą' nadhat. Tth'aii itree gwiizhit nihdeekiintthaii ts'ą' oozhak gwąąh'in,
43020012	ts'ą' zheekat gwich'in neekwaii nah'in, daagąįį nagaatsuu ts'ą' Jesus nijuk iindi' izhit dagaadii, viki' eeghaii ch'ihłak dhidii, vakwai' ts'ąįį chan ch'ihłak dhidii.
43020013	“Tr'injaa, jaghaii iintree?” giiyahnyąą. Jyaa gavahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat gihłeegihiłchįį ts'ą' nijuk nigiiyąąhchįį gaashandaii kwaa!”
43020014	Nijin jyaa nyąą dąį', neediil'ee akhai' Jesus zhat nadhat nigwiił'in; gaa Jesus t'inchy'aa ts'ą' yaandaii kwaa.
43020015	“Tr'injaa, jaghaii intree? Juu vinkeegwąh'in t'ini'in?” Jesus yuahkat. Gwanzhįh eetr'agwah'in t'inchy'aa yuunyąą, ts'ą' Mary jyaa yahnyąą, “Oodhiinjik t'inchy'aa ji' nijuk nąąhchįį shaagwandak, vats'ą' hihshyaa ts'ą' noohihdal eenjit.”
43020016	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Mary!” Yats'ą' neediil'ee ts'ą' Hebrew ginjik zhit jyaa nyąą, “Rabboni!” (Jii t'ee “Geech'ǫąąhtan” ginyąą t'igwinyąą.)
43020017	“Shakat noonjii shrǫ'!” Jesus yahnyąą, “Tth'aii Shiti' vits'eehihdii kwaa geh'an. Gaa shachaa nąįį goots'eehindii' ts'ą' jii sheenjit gavaa gwandak, ‘Oodak Shiti' vats'ą' hihshyaa, nakhwan chan Nakhwati' Shivit'eegwijyąhchy'aa nilii, nakhwan chan nakhwa-Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa nilii.’”
43020018	Ąįįts'ą' t'ee Mary Magdalene yitsyaa nąįį ts'ą' K'eegwaadhat nah'ya' ts'ą' jii jyaa diiyaiinyą' eenjit geevaagwaandak.
43020019	Drinzhit khaiinjii tǫhtł'an gwa'an zheh gwizhit vitsyaa nąįį gindeiinvyaa gehdeech'igiintin, Jews kįh dilk'ii nąįį agąąnjat geh'an. Ąįįtł'ęę Jesus gootł'an nadhat nagwaanąįį. “Tsinehdan nakhwaa oolį', Shiti' shihił'ee gwik'it shįį chan nakhwahooł'ee,” Jesus gavahnyąą.
43020020	Jii jyaa diinyą' ąįįtł'ęę, danli', ditsęh k'ąą haa goots'ą' agwahch'in. K'eegwaadhat gąąh'in eenjit gwintł'oo shoo giinlii.
43020021	Ąįįtł'ęę chan hee Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Tsinehdan nakhwaa oolį', Shiti' shihił'e' gwik'it shįį chan nakhwayinjihooł'ee!”
43020022	Jii jyaa diinyą', ąįįtł'ęę datthak gook'aa haazhee ts'ą' jyaa gavahnyąą, “Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą ts'an oo'įį.
43020023	Dinjii nąįį atr'agwaanduu gooveenjit oo'an gahohłii ji', gooveenjit oo'an gweheedaa; gooveenjit oo'an gahohłii kwaa ji', duuyeh gooveenjit oo'an gwihijyaa.”
43020024	Jesus goots'ą' nadhat naanaii dąį' vitsyaa ch'ihłak Thomas (Didymus chan oozhii) ąįį zhat dhidii kwaa.
43020025	Ąįįts'ą' vitsyaa nąįį Thomas jyaa agahnyąą, “K'eegwaadhat tr'ąąh'ya'!” Thomas jyaa nyąą, “Vanli' kat gwatsak deek'it shat dha'aii akwat gwatsak deek'it naaljik akwat vitsęh k'ąą naaljik kwaa ji' duuyeh adan t'inchy'aa gwik'iinjihkhit.”
43020026	Ąįįtł'ęę gęhdaa drin deetik vitsyaa nąįį zheh gwizhit khaihłan nineegiijil ts'ą' Thomas zhat goovaadhidii gindeiinvyaa ihdeech'adagąąhtin gaa Jesus zhat gaveeghaii nadhat naanaii ts'ą' jyaa gavahnyąą, “Tsinehdan nakhwaa oolį'!”
43020027	Ąįįtł'ęę Thomas jyaa ahnyąą, “Dząą nanleetth'ak niinchįį, ts'ą' shanli' nah'in; ąįįtł'ęę nanli' nihky'aa noiinjii ts'ą' dząą shitsęhk'aa naanjii. Gwik'iinjiighit ni'įį kwaa ąįį akhagoiinyąą ts'ą' gwik'iinjinghit!”
43020028	Thomas jyaa yahnyąą, “Shik'eegwaadhat, Shivit'eegwijyąhchy'aa!”
43020029	Jesus jyaa yahnyąą, “Shąąh'ya' geh'an gwizhrįh shik'iinjinghit? Juu shąąh'in kwaa gaa shik'iinjiighit nąįį shoo nakhwaa oolį'!”
43020030	Jesus ditsyaa nąįį andah gwinlęįį gwitr'it geegwaroolii kwaa t'iizhik gaa jii dęhtły'aa zhit valak zhrįh danahootł'oo.
43020031	Jii t'ee gwadanakhwatł'oo Jesus t'ee Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Vidinji' nilii ts'ą' Christ chan nilii, gwik'iinjihinghit ji' ąįį nigwik'iinjigwiighit haa voozhri' zhit gwihiindaii geenjit.
43021001	Jii ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus ch'ihłok gwizhrįh van Tiberias khyųų ditsyaa nąįį ts'ą' idineegwiilkįį. Jyąhts'ą' t'igwiizhik t'agwarahnyąą.
43021002	Simon Peter, Thomas, Nathaniel (Galilee nahkat gwizhit Cana goozhii goo'aii gwats'an ahaa), Zebedee vidinjii neekwaii ts'ą' Jesus ch'izhii vitsyaa neekwaii nąįį haa nihłaagiilk'ii.
43021003	Simon Peter jyaa gavahnyąą, “Łuk keeshi'yaa.” “Naa k'eereheedal,” giiyahnyąą. Ąįįts'ą' t'ee giiyaahaajil ts'ą' tr'ihchoo zhit giinjil; gaa zhat tǫǫ datthak łuk ch'ihłak gaa goonjik kwaa.
43021004	Vanh geeneech'ihii'aii gwiizhit Jesus van khyųų nadhat, gaa vitsyaa nąįį Jesus t'inchy'aa giiyaandaii kwaa.
43021005	Ąįįtł'ęę gavahshral ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Tsyaa nąįį, nik'ee łuk oodhoojik?” “Ch'ihłak gaa kwaa,” giiyahnyąą.
43021006	Jesus gavahshral ts'ą' jyaa nyąą, “Nakhwachihvyaa tr'ihchoo eeghaii shriits'ąįį chųhtsuu, izhit łuk oohohdal t'oonchy'aa.” Ąįįts'ą' t'ee izhit chigiiyąąhtsuu akhai' khyų' khaneegiiyahtsuu, łyaa vizhit łuk lęįį geh'an.
43021007	Zhit vitsyaa Jesus yeet'iindhan ąįį Peter t'ahnyąą, “Diik'eegwaadhat t'inchy'aa łee!” Nijin Simon Peter Diik'eegwaadhat t'inchy'aa gwinyąą gwiitth'ak dąį', ankhii dagwach'aa gihłeehiltsuu ts'ą' dhidii ąįįtłęę nineeyaatsuu ts'ą' chųų zhit oondaa hiltłee.
43021008	Teeghaii gwats'ą' niighit kwaa neegeekwaii. Ch'izhii vitsyaa nąįį tr'ihchoo haa teeneegohojil (Chihvyaa vizhit łuk deedąą'ąį' haa).
43021009	Teeneegohojil dąį' zhat gwaak'a' kǫ' zhit łuk chan ts'ą' łųhchy'aa haa ichy'aa googwąąh'in.
43021010	Jesus t'agavahnyąą, “Ąįį łuk t'ohju' gwidiinlęįį lat dząą nohtsit.”
43021011	Simon Peter ąįį tr'ihchoo zhineezhii ts'ą' chihvyaa vizhit łuk choh deedąą'ąį' ąįį teedhiluu, (153 aanchy'aa) łyaa vizhit łuk lęįį gaa chihvyaa łeedhach'aa kwaa.
43021012	Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Aanaii ts'ą' dząą ch'oh'aa.” “Juu inlii?” giiyahaanjyaa eenjit giideetr'oaanyąą. Gook'eegwaadhat t'inchy'aa giiyaandaii geh'an.
43021013	Ąįįts'ą' Jesus gaveeniinzhii ts'ą' łųhchy'aa oonjik ts'ą' gavantł'eech'ąhtsit, łuk chan gwik'it t'inlik.
43021014	Jesus niindhat ts'ą' ninehjin ąįįtł'ęę jii zhat dąį' t'ee ditsyaa nąįį ts'ą' tik agwaanchy'aa idigweelkįį t'agwarahnyąą.
43021015	Ch'igiin'al ąįįtł'ęę, Jesus ąįį Simon Peter jyaa ahnyąą “John vidinji', Simon, jii nąįį andaa ts'ą' łyaa sheet'iindhan?” “Shik'eegwaadhat, aahą' neet'iihthan ts'ą' gaanandaii.” Peter yahnyąą. Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Shidivii tsal nąįį gooch'ah'aa.”
43021016	Chan hee Jesus ąįį Peter jyaa ahnyąą, “John vidinji', Simon, łyaa sheet'iindhan?” “Shik'eegwaadhat, aahą' neet'iihthan ts'ą' gaanandaii.” Peter yahnyąą. Jesus t'iiyahnyąą, “Shidivii nąįį k'ąąhtii.”
43021017	Tik agwaanchy'aa chan Jesus ąįį jyaa yahnyąą, “John vidinji', Simon, sheet'iindhan?” Peter tr'igwidii dhidlit Jesus tik agwaanchy'aa “Sheet'iindhan?” yahnyąą eenjit. “Shik'eegwaadhat, łyaa jidii datthak eenjit gaanandaii; neet'iihthan gaanandaii t'oonchy'aa.” Peter yahnyąą. Jesus jyaa yahnyąą “Shidivii nąįį gooch'ah'aa.
43021018	Łi'didlii haa nakhwaagwahaldak, k'eejit inlii dąį' neenitł'uu ts'ą' deenoo'ya' yiindhan datthak gwik'it t'ini'in, nijin gwats'ą' hoihshi' niindhan chan gwik'it t'ini'in; gaa naghaii lęįį ji' neenigiheetł'uu ts'ą' nijin gwats'ą' hoihshi' niindhan kwaa gaa nihk'it gwats'ą' nigehęę'aa t'oonchy'aa.”
43021019	(Jii Jesus jyaa nyąą t'ee nats'ąą Peter niheedhaa ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa vich'eegwahdrii gwahąąh'yaa t'agwarahnyąą.) Ąįįts'ą' chan jyaa yahnyąą, “Shatąįį hinkhaii!”
43021020	Peter neediil'ee akhai' ąįį juu Jesus ditsyaa nąįį tee ch'andaa yeet'iindhan niił'in, nijin neech'aga'aa dąį' Jesus eeghaii niighit kwaa dhidii chy'aa ąįį niił'in ts'ą' Jesus oahkat. “Diik'eegwaadhat, juu diitee gwintł'ee nahahchyaa t'oonchy'aa?”
43021021	Nijin Peter ąįį dinjii niił'in dąį', Jesus oahkat, “Shik'eegwaadhat, jii dinjii aiiyu'?”
43021022	“K'ineehihdik gwats'ą' goondaii oihnyąą ji', jaghaii geenjit tr'igwiindii? Aanaii, shatąįį hinkhaii!” Jesus yahnyąą.
43021023	Vitsyaa nąįį ąįį gootee dinjii ch'ihłak niheedhaa kwaa łee ginyąą ts'ą' geenihłagogwaandak. Gaa Jesus ąįį dinjii niheedhaa kwaa nyąą t'inyąą kwaa jii ąįį jyaa nyąą t'inyąą; “K'ineehihdik gwats'ą' gwandaii oihnyąą ji', jaghaii geenjit tr'igwiindii?”
43021024	Jii deegwee'ya' gwinyąą t'ee John gwąąh'ya' ts'ą' gwadąąntł'oo; ąįįts'ą' deiinyą' datthak łi'didlii nilii ts'ą' geenjit gaagwiindaii.
43021025	Jesus łyaa ants'ą' gwinlęįį vagwandak gwanlii ts'ą' gaa datthak vik'iteech'adarantl'oo ji', tr'ihkhit dęhtły'aa lęįį heelyaa ts'ą' jii nankat duuyeh yuutą'!
44001001	Shalak Theophilus, shidęhtły'aa zhit nats'ą' ch'adanǫįįtł'oo dąį', nijin Jesus, tr'ookit digwitr'it t'agwah'ya' dąį' dee'ya' ts'ą' jidii eech'oaałtan kwaii vakat danoiitł'oo,
44001002	dahthee zheekat gwits'ee heedyaa gwats'ą'. Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą k'iighai' yeedak neerahoondal gwehkįį dąį', tr'ihił'ee nąįį deegihee'yaa geenjit gwitee tr'agoovinlii goovaagwaandak.
44001003	Nijin tr'iiłkhwąįį tł'ęę drin 40 gąhkhyuk shriit'agwąąnchy'aa, yihił'e' nąįį ts'ą' idigweelkįį. Łyaa neegwiindaii geenjit gwinlęįį gwizhit goots'ą' idigweelkįį ts'ą' giiyąąh'ya' ts'ą' Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Veegwinii'ee eenjit gavaa ginkhe'.
44001004	Nijin khaihłan nigiinjil dąį' Jesus jyaa gavahnyąą, “Dzaa Jerusalem kwaiik'it gwachoh gihłeehohjyaa shrǫ', gaa jidii nakhwantł'eerehee'aa nakhwaagwaldak ąįį Shiti' nakhwantł'eeyehee'aa nyąą chy'aa gwats'ą' nagoodhoo'in.
44001005	John chųų haa chųų nakhwats'an iłtsąįį, gąą ninghit kwaa t'ee Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą nakhwats'an tr'ahahtsyaa t'oonchy'aa,” nyąą.
44001006	Nijin zhat, Yihił'e' nąįį łineegiljil dąį' Jesus goahkat, “K'eegwaadhat, Israel gwich'in tr'iinlii ts'ą' adats'ą' k'eeneegwarahaadhat ji' geenjit juk nik'ee duulee diits'iinyąą?” giiyahnyąą.
44001007	Jesus t'agoovahnyąą, “Nijin Shiti' deegwii'in gwik'it t'igwehee'yaa, niindhan ąįį adah zhrįh gaandaii ąįįts'ą' gwats'ą' k'eegwaadhat t'inchy'aa. Nijin ji' zhat nigweheedhaa, ąįį gaakhwandaii gwat'oohchy'aa kwaa.
44001008	Gaa nijin Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą nakhwak'aa t'iizhik ji' t'aih oohohdal, ąįį haa sheegohoondak ts'ą', Jerusalem kwaiik'it gwizhit, Judea nankak datthak, Samaria nahkat gwizhit ąįįts'ą' nihky'aa nankak datthak sheegohoondak t'oonchy'aa.”
44001009	Jii kwaii datthak gwik'it t'iinyą'. Ąįįtł'ęę giiyąąh'in gwiizhik zheekat k'iidak tr'ineediindhat. Zheek'ǫh zhit gwats'ą' hiljii dhidlit. Izhik gwats'an neegiiyąąn'ya' kwaa.
44001010	Izhik k'iidak tth'aii gwagwah'in gwiizhik khan hee dinjii neekwąįį gwach'aa daagąįį nagaazhii giveeghaii nagadhat nagaanaii.
44001011	“Galilee gwich'in nąįį, jaghaii k'iidak zhee zhit gwizhrįh aakin gǫǫ'įį? Jesus nakhwałeehoozhii ts'ą' zheekat gwats'ą' neeroonjik t'inchy'aa. Nats'ahts'ą' k'iidak tr'ineediindhat gwik'it t'inchy'aa ts'ą' k'ineeheedik t'inchy'aa,” ąįį dinjii neekwąįį nąįį jyaa googahnyąą.
44001012	Ąįįtł'ęę Taih Vakat Olives Nahshii, gwats'an yihił'e' nąįį Jerusalem gwits'ee gahoojil. Kwaiik'it gwachoh geeghaih (½) mile gąhthee goo'aii.
44001013	Ąįįtł'ęę Jerusalem gwizhit nijin zheh gwigwich'įį chy'ąą k'ineegiidal dąį', ch'iyeedak zheh deegaajil. Jii nąįį t'ee goolat zhat dilk'ii, Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, Alphaeus vidinji' James, Simon Zealot nilįį, James vidinji' Judas, jii nąįį giinlii.
44001014	Ąįį nąįį datthak, Jesus vahan Mary ts'ą', Jesus vachaa nąįį ts'ą' tr'injaa lat nąįį haa nigiilzhii ts'ą' datthak khaihłak geenjit gwintł'oo khadigigiinjii.
44001015	Dinjii gwik'injiighit 120 aanchy'aa nąįį khaihłan łineegiljil. Ąįį gootee Peter needhikhin ts'ą' goots'ą' ginkhii.
44001016	“Shijyaa nąįį, jii yeenaa dąį' yeenii King David nats'ąą deegweheenjyaa datthak geeginkhe', Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą yaagwaandak gwik'iighai', Dęhtły'aa Choh zhit gwadanakhwatł'oo gwik'it t'igwiizhik. ‘Judas, Jesus gooheendal eenjit gwats'ą' goovahaadlii,’ gwinyąą.
44001017	Judas diitee ch'ihłak inli'. Adan chan jii gwitr'it t'agwarah'in vats'an dhidlit.” Peter gavahnyąą. Acts
44001018	Tr'agwaanduu gwitr'it t'agwah'ya' gwit'įį larąą oonjik. Ąįį haa nan oiinkwat. Ąįįtł'ęę kheech'ilchaa ts'ą' niindhat. Izhik zhak diki' kat neet'aanąįį, vazhrak łeedhach'aa ąįįts'ą' vits'ik datthak khaiinjil.
44001019	Jerusalem gwich'in nąįį datthak giiyeenjit gwiitth'ak. Ąįįts'ą' ąįį nan Akeldama giiyahnyąą. Digiginjik ky'aa, “Dah deek'it,” ginyąą t'iginyąą.
44001020	“Psalms dęhtły'aa kat gwadanakhwatł'oo, ‘Dinjii ch'ihłak gaa nijin gwich'įį ąįį tr'igwiheechy'aa kwaa gwizhrįh.’ Jii chan gwadanakhwatł'oo. ‘Dinjii ch'ihłak yideek'it gwitr'it neegooheendal gwizhrįh.’”
44001021	-
44001022	“Jii geenjit diitee ch'ihłak yideek'it neegooheendal goo'aii. Dinjii khit diihaa t'inchy'aa nąįį tee gwats'an ch'ihłak Jesus zhik gwa'an diinaa k'eekhwazhii gaandaii nąįį t'ireheelyaa, John chųų yats'an iłtsąįį tr'ąąh'ya' gwats'an yeedak zheekat gwats'ą' neeroonjik gwats'ą' datthak. Diikhwan diitee gwagwaanchy'aa gwats'an ch'ihłak Jesus neegwiindaii geegwahaandak gadhan ji', ąįį t'ireheelyaa.” Peter gavahnyąą.
44001023	Dinjii neekwąįį nąįį igwigweełkįį. Gavoozhri' Joseph ts'ą' Matthias haa goozhii. Joseph voozhri' chan Barsabbas ts'ą' Justus haa oozhii.
44001024	-
44001025	Ąįįtł'ęę khagideedi', “K'eegwaadhat, dinjii teegwagwaanchy'aa ts'ą' jidii yiindhan ąįįts'ą' ninjich'aradhat datthak gaanandaii. Jii geh'an dząą neekwąįį nąįį nadhat, ąįį ch'ihłak diineenjit agwąąhkįį. Judas nijin gwats'ą' heekhaa goo'aii izhik gwats'ą' haazhii. Gąą jii ch'ihłak yideek'it gooheendal. Ąįįts'ą' Tr'ihił'e' nąįį tee ch'ihłak heelyaa ts'ą' diihaa gwitr'it t'agwahah'yaa. Ąįį geenjit diiteetr'ąąhchįį,” giiyahnyąą.
44001026	Ąįįtł'ęę gavoozhri' gwizhit giinlii. Ąįį ts'an ch'ihłak khagąhtsuu. Akhai' Matthias voozhri' khagąhtsuu. Ąįįt'ee Tr'ihił'e' 11 nąįį haa niinzhii ts'ą' 12 neegaadlit.
44002001	Nijin Jews nąįį ch'ara'aa gwagwahtsii dąį', Pentecost Drin goozhii, gavaa ąįį gwizhit nigwiindhat dąį', juu gwik'injiighit nąįį datthak łigeeljil.
44002002	Khants'ą' zheekat gwats'an gwihiilk'įį, ahtr'aii choh nint'aii haa ahtr'aii nagwaanąįį. Zheh gwizhit juu dilk'ii nąįį datthak gwigwiitth'ak.
44002003	Ąįįtł'ęę kwankyaa k'it t'inchy'aa nigiił'in. Ąįįts'ą' lęįį dhidlit. Ąįį ts'an kwankyaa tsal k'it t'inchy'aa gooteegwagwaanchy'aa ts'ą' gooki' k'ąą t'iizhik.
44002004	Ąįįtł'ęę Ch'anky'aa Shroodiinyąą gook'aa t'iizhik gwik'iighai', nihła'adan nankak gwich'in nąįį ginjik ky'aa giginkhii nagaanaii.
44002005	Izhik dąį' Jews lęįį nąįį Jerusalem gwizhit gwigwich'įį, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa eeroołtin giinlii ts'ą' nihła'adan nahkat datthak gwats'an geedaa.
44002006	Nijin deegwiintsai' gwigwiitth'ak dąį', Jews ch'adanh nahkat lęįį nąįį nijin t'igwiizhik, izhik łigeeljil. Izhik dąį' dinjii lęįį nąįį juu gwik'injiighit nąįį googinjik ky'aa giginkhii googiitth'ak.
44002007	Łyaa geegaroolii kwaa t'igwiizhik ts'ą' jyaa diginyąą, “Jii dinjii diiginjik ky'aa ginkhii nąįį datthak Galilee gwich'in nąįį ginlii t'iginyąą!
44002008	Nats'ahts'ą' nijin diigoodlit gwa'an diiginjik ky'aa diits'ą' giginkhii lee t'iginyąą ginyąą?
44002009	-
44002010	Parthia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Cappadocia, Pontus, Asia, Phrygia, Pamphylia, Egypt, Libya nahkat Cyrene geeghaih gwats'an, ąįįts'ą' Rome diilat lęįį nąįį nihła'adan nahkat gwats'an tr'inlii t'oonchy'aa.
44002011	Diilat lęįį nąįį Jews nilįį. Ąįįts'ą' diilat nąįį chan Jews gwich'in nilįį kwaa gaa Jews nąįį k'it gwik'injiighit ąįį geenjit dzaa gwats'ą' nirįįnjil. Diilat nąįį Crete njuu goo'aii gwats'an ąįįts'ą' diilat nąįį Arabia nahkat tr'iinlii. Googaa datthak diiginjik ky'aa gwigwee'in Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa dee'ya' gwinlęįį geegiginkhii. Akhai' diiginjik ky'aa giginkhii gwinzii gooriitth'ak,” datthak jyaa nihłagaanyąą.
44002012	Jii deegwii'in t'igwii'in gaagiindaii kwaa. Ąįįts'ą' geegaroolii kwaa t'igwiizhik, “Jidii eenjit t'igwii'in li'?” gwinlęįį jyaa diginyąą ts'ą' nihłagwaakat.
44002013	Gąą goolat nąįį gooveegeedlaa, “Gwintł'oo jak chų' giinįį ts'ą' ch'aganakhwanį'!” t'iginyąą googahnyąą.
44002014	Ąįįtł'ęę Peter Tr'ihił'e' 11 nąįį haa nidhikhin dąį' gwint'aii ginkhii haa dinjii lęįį nąįį ts'ą' ginkhii, “Shalak Jews nąįį, ąįįts'ą' Jerusalem gwich'in nąįį haa, jii t'igwiizhik geenjit nakhwats'ą' gihihkhyaa gwinzii shoodǫǫhk'įį.
44002015	Ch'iriinįį diinohnyąą gąą ch'iriinįį t'igwii'in kwaa. Dinjii nąįį vanh 9 o'clock gwehkįį ch'igiheenjyaa geenjit tr'ihkhit vanh dąį' gwanlii.
44002016	Gaa jii t'igwiizhik gohtth'ak ąįįts'ą' gooh'in geenjit, Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa Eenjit Ginkhii nilįį Joel oozhii, ąįį deenaadąį' ch'adąąntł'oo.
44002017	‘Khaiinkǫǫ Drin zhit ji' gweedhaa ji', jii kwaii t'ihishi'yaa Vit'eegwijyąhchy'aa nyąą. Shanky'aa Shroodiinyąą dinjii nąįį datthak k'ąą t'ihihłyaa. Nidinji', ts'ą' nichį' nąįį haa sheenjit gigiheehkhyaa giheelyaa. Tsyaa k'eejit nąįį shats'an k'eegwiichy'aa gagwahąh'yaa, gineegiinlyaa k'it t'inchy'aa haa. Ch'anjaa nąįį gineegiinlyaa zhit goots'ą' gwagwahaałkyaa.
44002018	Aahą', shitsyaa sheenjit gwitr'it t'agwah'in nąįį dinjii, akwat tr'injaa nąįį haa jii zhit drin ji' Shanky'aa shroodiinyąą gook'aa t'ihihłyaa. Geedan t'ee sheenjit gigiheehkhyaa geenjit.
44002019	Zheetii gwa'an gwidii'in t'ishi'yaa ts'ą' dzaa nankak chan nindal gwaahchy'aa haa gwigwee'in t'ishi'yaa. Izhit zhat nagwaanąįį ji' dah, kǫ', ts'ą' gwintł'oo łat haa gweheelyaa.
